story:
About this project

Hi guys,

My name is Valya Vasileva and I would like to present my invention – “Quick Make-up Stencils”!

“Quick Make-up Stencils” is a product that helps for creating a professional eye make-up look very easily and effortless under 3 minutes at home.

You can use it with your favorite product - eye shadows, eyeliner, or gel eyeliner.

“Quick Make-up Stencils” have unique, one of a kind design. This make-up tool is very flexible and everyone can create in very short time different professional looks/visions at home!

With “Quick make-up stencils” you can create:

- Classic smokey eye make-up

- Classic eyeliner/ thick or bold eye line as you prefer

- Cat eyeliner

- Dramatic eye make-up

- Smokey cat eye make- up

- Almond eyes make-up

- Fish tail line

- Double Eyeliner

- The most precise outlining of the bottom eyelashes

- Eyelash curling

- Blue Fantasy - almond eyeshadow combined with eyeliner

- Prevent eyeshadow fallout on the face


- 3 different eyebrows shapes - for the perfect fill in and shaping of the eyebrows

All of these are collected in one stencil which you can take everywhere with you. They are very compact, you can carry them in a purse and can be used anywhere. This product has been created with attention to detail and understanding, the template has a unique design, with which you can create different visions, from daily to extreme bold look. Different thickness of eyeliner according to the occasion. Combining different colors you can create unlimited number of visions.

Rewards

I would like to thank all backers of this project in Advance! Here are our rewards:

15 $ - 1 "Quick Make-up Stencils" Set for free (free shipping worldwide)

27 $ - 2 "Quick Make-up Stencils" Sets for free (free shipping worldwide)

40 $ - 3 "Quick Make-up Stencils" Sets for free (free shipping worldwide)

52 $ - 4 "Quick Make-up Stencils" Sets for free (free shipping worldwide)

62 $ - 5 "Quick Make-up Stencils" Sets for free (free shipping worldwide)

100 $ - 10 "Quick Make-up Stencils" Sets for free + USB flash memory with all videos and pics (free shipping worldwide)

200 $ - 20 "Quick Make-up Stencils" Sets for free + USB + eye shadow palette – 32 colors, eyeliner and mascara (free shipping worldwide)

300 $ - 30 "Quick Make-up Stencils" Sets for free + USB + bigger eye shadow palette – 48 colors, eyeliner, mascara and corrective concealer palette – 5 colors (free shipping worldwide)

Every "Quick Make-up Stencils" Set contains 3 stencils and a manual with photos.

 Every reward will be sent 1-2 days after the contribution has been made. No need to wait until the end of the campaign! I ship worldwide in letters with tracking code!

I will be sending rewards during the campaign till all products that I currently have on stock are gone. Every contribution made after that will receive the rewards after the end of the campaign and after I receive the funds to produce the additional rewards!

My Story

Every time I did my eye make-up, I was frustrated how long it takes. Instead of having more time and use it for things that I like to do, I wasted it in front of the mirror. Last year 2014 I started to think about a solution of this problem and about 6 months later (in August) I was ready with the design of “Quick Make-up Stencils”. After one more month I found the best possible material for the stencils, the company that started producing them, the packaging and the manual. I started selling “Quick Make-up Stencils” on eBay in September 2014. Since then many customers bought the product and love it. Here are just some of them:


My Goal

With this indiegogo campaign, I would like to introduce my product to more people that could be interested at and to make the world more beautiful. It is important to me, because I have the huge desire to make everyone's life easier and happier.

WORLDWIDE RETAILERS/DISTRIBUTORS WANTED

I have customers that want to buy the product, but cannot because they either do not have ebay or paypal account and would like to buy it from local stores.

LIKE US ON FACEBOOK

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Quick-Make-up-Stencils/277062299165080

CHECK OUR YouTube CHANNEL

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFIhrmvYPxB7lDDe-buqIwQ

Our eBay Store:

http://feedback.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewF... 

Risks and challenges

At the moment, I face challenges such as:

- how to inform more people about my product and its benefits by advertising

- how to enable the purchase of the product for customers who do not have ebay, paypal account or credit card

- how to bring my other ideas for make-up tools into life

- how to develop international trade mark for make-up tools

There are no risks, because I am already producing and selling the product and everyone can purchase it from all around the world!

EYE MAKE-UP WAS NEVER SO EASY AND PROFESSIONAL GOOD LOOKING!

PLEASE, SPREAD THE WORD OUT AND HELP ME GET AS MUCH ATTENTION AS POSSIBLE! 

PLEASE, USE THE INDIEGOGO SHARE TOOLS TO INFORM YOUR FRIENDS!

THANK YOU VERY MUCH IN ADVANCE!

story:
It’s not only a headset. It’s a different way of trendy lifestyle. No need to put earphones into your ears. And no wires to trouble your exercising. Just for safety and comfort. Just for the street cred. It’s AOS SportsBuddy Bone Conduction Headset.

Answering cell phone while driving is easy to neglect the road conditions, and driving with one hand may lead to rear-end accidents easily. 

The one who is jogging or walking without music outdoors would be boring. When we use  traditional headsets, long cable will bring a lot of inconvenience. Sweating after exercise may cause malfunction of the headsets.There will be many problems of long-term wearing earphones just like tinnitus, ear discomfort and so on.

If you have a SportBuddy Bone Conduction Headset, everything is different. 


Open ears design

You can listen to the music or make telephone calls without earphones into your ears. The sound is delivered through bone. Bone conduction is the transmission of sound to the inner ear through the bones of the skull. Its benefits extend beyond normal hearing ranges to work for those with impaired hearing.FUN FACT: Bone conduction is one of the reasons you get weirded out by your own voice when you hear it played back. The skull conducts lower frequencies better than the air, so people perceive their own voices to be lower and fuller than others do.


Design Features 


Enjoy your life with your Sportsbudy


What is inside?


How to use?

 Use:

1.When your headset is off, hold the switchuntil the red and blue lights flash alternately, accompanied by a beep "enter pairing mode" .You can pair your phone to the headset.

2.You can find the Bluetooth menu on your device, click on Search for devices, and select "AOS-S I" in the list.

3.If connected, you can hear "paired connected" .

4. If it takes more than 3 minutes to separate your headset and the connected device, the headset will automatically shut down to save power. And they will connect again when they are in effective distance.

Wearing  style:

Neckband design, the headphones hanging behind the neck and ear speaker to fit in front of the jaw bone, not on the ear.



Specification


What we need?

So far, from the beginning of the project has already passed more than a year. This year we have experienced a develop concept plan for more than 15 times, to improve the appearance for 6 times , structure changes for 13 times, palm testing for more than 30 times . We hope we can develop a trendy headset which is easier to wear when you are driving or doing sports.

To be comfortable, safe, healthy, smart and stylish is our goal. We spend a lot of fund, materials and human resources on our product. To make a better product, we really need your support and recognition. We will use all the funds for product’s perfection and upgrading. We want to show you our best.


What you get ?


Timeline of SportsBuddy


Ricks&Challengs


The Team

The SportsBuddyteam focuses on the design and fabrication of intelligent Bluetooth devices. Like all good things, the foundation of our team comes from a bunch of friends who are passionate about forward thinking creative design.And we are certainly equipped to confront all challenges! 

With an accumulated ten years of hardware and software tech experience, thirty committed staff, five PHD’s, seven masters and four systems engineers; your faith is well placed in our capable and busy hands.

What you get ?




Timeline of SportsBuddy





Ricks&Challengs



The Team
The SportsBuddyteam focuses on the design and fabrication of intelligent Bluetooth devices. Like all good things, the foundation of our team comes from a bunch of friends who are passionate about forward thinking creative design.And we are certainly equipped to confront all challenges! 

With an accumulated ten years of hardware and software tech experience, thirty committed staff, five PHD’s, seven masters and four systems engineers; your faith is well placed in our capable and busy hands.

story:
After a major success on Kickstarter our production is now up and running. We are now releasing extra pre-order slots here on Indiegogo for those who missed out - Guaranteed production, Guaranteed delivery.

 

 

 

The highly durable watch that pays tribute to the heritage of horology, merged with a bold progressive look. The North Sea is nothing less than a piece of art.

The high quality rubber bracelet comes as standard with the North Sea, but you have the opportunity to add further straps. Do you want to dress it up even more with a croc-grained leather strap or make your watch shark proof with a Milanese mesh strap in steel? 

We have selected only the best quality straps, so your decision might be hard, but never wrong.

Add 40$ for 1x Black or Brown Leather and add 50$ for 1x Steel Mesh. Don't worry, we will double check your choice before delivery.

Our philosophy is simple and can be described in a single sentence:

 "Your watch is ment to be used - Always"

 

We want to create watches with high quality, developed to endure all challenges, occasions and environments in your daily life.

The idea came from E.C.Andersson’s creator when he was sailing along the coastline of Scandinavia – The idea of a watch that could match both the harsh climate out at sea, and the more formal, social environment once docked in harbor. A people’s watch, fitting most wallets, without compromising quality. Mechanical automatic, made of durable materials with a progressive, yet clean design.

A watch made to endure You

 

Many microbrands uses finished cases and put their logo on the dial – Not us. We have designed every detail by ourselves, from the date wheel, to the lugs, case, curved crystal, hands and everything in between. We have been involved in the manufacturing process from the first stroke on the drawing board to full completion.

We wanted to make a watch that pays tribute to the heritage of horology, but merge it with a bold progressive look. It’s made to be highly visible in all conditions, with sharp illuminated indices, a distinct minute frame and a unique, expressive white calendar wheel in contrast to the matte black dial.

Our inspiration is the very first "pillow" oyster case, introduced in the early 1900’s, and our focus group is the modern watch enthusiast, who want to wear quality but refuse to pay for marketing hype.

 

Our strong belief is that 40mm in diameter is, and will always be, the golden measurement for a sports watch. It simply looks great on every wrist, no matter the size or gender of the wearer and it’s certainly timeless, able to be passed on for generations.

The thickness of the watch is 10mm, making the watch look robust, but never chunky.

Most importantly, we wanted a watch that can be used – no matter what. To ensure high standard of quality, we will make sure that every timepiece is handmade and individually tested. Not one watch will leave the factory without living up to our high standard.

We have seen countless microbrands using Miyota, Sellita and other movements built upon the ETA design. Don’t get us wrong, they are decent movements. By trying out the toughness, reliability and service capacity of different movements however, we have become absolutely in love with the SEIKO NH05.

Built like a tank and reliable as a trooper. The SEIKO NH05 won’t let you down even on the most turbulent waters, in office or at the gym. Actually, it’s so robust that you won’t need to service the North Sea in the next decade. And when you do – it will be at a very low cost compare to it's rivals.

We care about each and every one of our supporters, so please don’t hesitate to send us an email of any inquiry regarding the watches, at:

Info@ecandersson.com

You can also find useful information at our website:

ecandersson.com

Or on Facebook:

Facebook.com/ECAnderssonWatches

If you have a minute to spare, we would absolutely love it if you sent a photo of you wearing your very own North Sea when it gets delivered and we’ll post it in our media channels.

Would you like to write about the North Sea, or see more photos of the watch? Just visit ourPress Kit Here

Best regards
/Team E.C.Andersson

story:
LEARN MORE ABOUT STILLA MOTION BY VISITING MYSTILLA.COM
can't wait to see you there!


You don’t have to look for your things if you never lose them.

Stilla Motion is an instant security system that you can take with you wherever you go, and use for whatever you like. Place it in a purse or a stroller, in a backpack or a jacket, and get an instant alarm on your phone or smartwatch the second it moves. And as if that weren’t enough, Stilla Motion also has a strong built-in speaker that will let everybody nearby know if someone is touching your stuff.

 
This Stilla is all about Motion.
The second your belongings move with an activated Stilla attached to them, you will be alerted through your choice of alarm: smartphone, smartwatch, Stilla Motion’s built-in speaker — or all three.
 


Stilla Motion is here to help, with both obvious and creative use cases.

Place it on your stroller and enjoy a day in the park without looking over your shoulder for it — or attach it to the cookie jar and keep sweet-toothed culprits away.


The built-in speaker will act like a tiny but effective car alarm for your belongings.

It will alert anybody nearby when necessary. At the same time, the Stilla Motion app will let you know if you walk out of range. This means you will never again leave a bag or jacket behind like they don’t have feelings too. Pretty smart if we may say so ourselves. 
 


No need to stay attached to your things anymore, let Stilla Motion be that for you.

Attach your Stilla to just about anything that you want. Stilla Motion comes with a protective cover and adhesive tape that allows you to easily fasten wherever you need it.

 


“Ehm, can you watch my…” no more. 

Stilla Motion is easily activated with a quick squeeze, or inside the app. In the app, you can also pick between modes for your protection; choose whether you’d like the built-in sound to go off with the alarm, or if a simple notification to your phone or smartwatch will be enough for now.

 

PERKS

 

 

 


 

                                             

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

1. What is Stilla Motion?
It’s a smart motion sensor. Anything you put Stilla Motion on, in, or at will be in direct connection with you; if the item, surface, or person moves you’ll get an instant notification on your smartphone/smartwatch. Stilla Motion is peace of mind.

2. What problem is Stilla Motion solving?

Rather than solving the problems, Stilla is preventing them. You don’t have to look for your things if you don’t lose them in the first place. With Stilla, your things will be guarded while you pay attention elsewhere.  

You don’t have to worry about leaving your things behind either since you will get a notification to your phone or Smartwatch if you are getting out of Bluetooth range.

3. How does Stilla Motion work?

When the hardware device detects motion, you will get an instant notification. You can choose from different modes that will allow for the device itself to sound when the smartphone/smartwatch is set to silent, or vice versa. Or just have them all making noise simultaneously.

The software uses smart Machine Learning algorithms that are able to separate recurring motion (a bag on the floor of a moving train) from unwanted activity (a bag being lifted up).

4. Let’s say I do lose my items, how do I find them with Stilla Motion?

With the push of a button in the app, you’ll locate your keys, wallet, or purse through a clear signal from the strong 85+ dB speaker in the Stilla device.

The device is also already prepared for coming updates that will include tracking functions with a vast range.

5. What makes Stilla Motion different from what’s already out there?

Other notification devices are triggered by distance, not motion. What distinguishes the motion alarm system, Stilla Motion, from trackers on the market is that it doesn’t just help you find your things — it keeps you from losing them in the first place.

As opposed to motion alarms that are bolted to windows or doors, or built into suitcases, Stilla Motion isn’t a fixed piece of technology. You can use it wherever and whenever. Some days you might need it as extra security in a hotel or hostel, and other days you might bring it to keep an eye on your bag while at a busy concert.

The user experience is uncomplicated while the technology stays sophisticated. User friendliness and innovation is key for us, and we aim to soon create an open source Stilla in order to let the maker community use the hardware to what best fits their needs.

6. What will the Stilla Motion cost?

During the Indiegogo campaign, early supporters will be able to purchase Stilla Motion for as low as $29. After the campaign, Stilla will retail for ~$49.

7. What about Shipping cost and Value Added Tax?

The shipping cost and value added tax are not included and will vary by country.

8. What are your long-term plans for Stilla?

We are makers, and we know that amazing things are created everyday through IoT. We want to be a large part of that community. Stilla Motion is just the start of our bigger goal of bringing beautifully designed innovations to the world of IoT and creating open-source hardware.

Our second product that we will launch shortly is Stilla Connect, a BLE to WiFi hub that will help you stay in touch with your Stilla even when you aren’t at home yourself. This could help with monitoring snooping roommates, making sure kids are coming home from school safely, or scaring off potential burglars.

9. What’s inside?

Please see Technical Details in middle of page for elaborate specs.

10. What’s the team like?

Stilla was created by a diverse global team with exceptional and award winning talent in all facets of design, engineering, and business development. We proudly brought Stilla Motion from idea to working prototype in 100 days. As of today, Stilla is based in Sweden and the USA. Team Stilla is also actively supported by a world class team of advisors and board members.

For press requests, please contact: press@mystilla.com
story_txt:
LEARN MORE ABOUT STILLA MOTION BY VISITING MYSTILLA.COM
can't wait to see you there!
You don’t have to look for your things if you never lose them.
Stilla Motion is an instant security system that you can take with you wherever you go, and use for whatever you like. Place it in a purse or a stroller, in a backpack or a jacket, and get an instant alarm on your phone or smartwatch the second it moves. And as if that weren’t enough, Stilla Motion also has a strong built-in speaker that will let everybody nearby know if someone is touching your stuff.


 
This Stilla is all about Motion.

The second your belongings move with an activated Stilla attached to them, you will be alerted through your choice of alarm: smartphone, smartwatch, Stilla Motion’s built-in speaker — or all three.
 

Stilla Motion is here to help, with both obvious and creative use cases.
Place it on your stroller and enjoy a day in the park without looking over your shoulder for it — or attach it to the cookie jar and keep sweet-toothed culprits away.
The built-in speaker will act like a tiny but effective car alarm for your belongings.
It will alert anybody nearby when necessary. At the same time, the Stilla Motion app will let you know if you walk out of range. This means you will never again leave a bag or jacket behind like they don’t have feelings too. Pretty smart if we may say so ourselves.  

No need to stay attached to your things anymore, let Stilla Motion be that for you.
Attach your Stilla to just about anything that you want. Stilla Motion comes with a protective cover and adhesive tape that allows you to easily fasten wherever you need it.
 

“Ehm, can you watch my…” no more. 
Stilla Motion is easily activated with a quick squeeze, or inside the app. In the app, you can also pick between modes for your protection; choose whether you’d like the built-in sound to go off with the alarm, or if a simple notification to your phone or smartwatch will be enough for now.

story:
PRVKE 21

Available in Aegean Blue, Black, and Wasatch Green

 

It's A Camera Bag. It's An Everyday Bag.

We're avid photographers and travelers and have worked thousands of hours to make this the perfect bag for camera lovers everywhere. But it's much more than just a camera bag — it's an everyday bag. Whether you are heading to a photo shoot, traveling across the globe, or commuting to work, the PRVKE pack was designed to adapt to your lifestyle.

 We've said it before and we'll say it again. A great bag does more than carry your crap around. A great bag evokes action and facilitates adventure, all while being so intuitive, you forget it's even there. And here's why the PRVKE 21 is such a great bag:

It's Versatile

The expandable roll top makes it easy to add gear as you need it. With the roll top down the pack can hold 21 liters of gear, and fully extended it can hold 25 liters of gear. Those extra 4 liters mean you won't have to leave your cat at home.

The upgraded accessory straps attach to the bottom, front, and inside of the PRVKE 21, making it easy to strap a plethora of gear to the bag. Using the accessory straps on the inside of the pack turns it into a hands-free workstation for changing lenses and managing your photography gear (or selling peanuts). 

 But wait, there's more (said with enthusiastic infomercial voice)...

  

 

It's Incredibly Accessible

 

 

 

 

It's Super Sexy

What's more important – style or functionality? We say both. So many bags out there focus on one and sacrifice the other. We didn't want a bag that just functioned well, we wanted it to look incredible! The PRVKE 21's clean and minimalist design looks great and functions even better.

 

It's Bomb Proof

Each material in the pack has been carefully chosen for its performance characteristics as well as aesthetic quality. We're perfectionists and obsessed over every detail – both in looks and function.

Our custom fit rainfly ensures your gear stays completely dry in those torrential downpours. It's lighter and thinner than our previous version, but just as durable.

 

Specifications

 

What Will Fit In The Camera Cube?

 

 

$300,000 Stretch Goal Unlocked! – Upgraded Camera Sling

Every camera sling will receive this upgrade with no extra cost! The camera sling is included as part of the Photography Bundle.

So what's so great about this new camera sling you ask? Let us tell you:

The current camera sling can only be used WITH the PRVKE 21. Well, what about those times you take the pack off but still want to sling your cam? This updated strap comes with a removable shoulder pad that allows you to transform the sling into a standalone strap system, while still being able to attach the sling to your PRVKE 21!

The updated camera sling has the same sleek aesthetic as the PRVKE Pack, and is a super comfortable method for carrying your camera around. Much better than a neck strap!

 

The same gatekeeper hardware that clips to your backpack, attaches to the shoulder pad. When you aren't using the sling as a standalone system, you can easily store your shoulder strap inside the pack.

The WANDRD Team

We're the trio behind WANDRD and we're avid travelers, photographers, commuters, and explorers. We made this backpack to keep up with our daily lives, because we couldn't find it on the market. And yes, we're brothers. And so far we still like each other ok (though Austin still hasn't forgiven Spencer for pushing his guitar over that one Christmas).

PS – Austin is the newest member of WANDRD and, as per company dress code, is working on growing his hair out. 

 

FAQs

Do these bags come with a warranty?

Yes! Our bags come with a limited lifetime warranty. For as long as you own the product, we will provide a warranty against defects in materials and workmanship.

It does not cover general wear and damage or by using the item for other than its intended purpose.

Customs & Duties

We cannot mark any rewards as a gift. It is illegal to do so and we would prefer not going to jail (we've seen Shawshank Redemption).

Import duties and taxes are not included in our reward levels. These charges vary by country and are completely out of our control. We are shipping our bags all over the world and it is impossible for us to build the various customs charges into the reward level. But we love you.

Return Policy?

We stand behind our bags and will replace or repair items that fall within our warranty; however, we do not offer refund or returns on bags/products that were received as an Indiegogo perk.

Crowdfunding is an amazing tool that allows people to get their ideas off the ground. Indiegogo is not a store and our "perks" are the way that we say thank you for supporting us (and trust us, we are VERY grateful). Every dollar received from this campaign will go directly into making PRVKE 21 a reality.

story:
Short Summary

I am Amy Neighbors, founder of Brick Betty. 

Fitness has been my passion for nearly half my life. While working in fitness, I taught group fitness classes, personal trained, and had the pleasure of training many female athletes. I always felt frustrated by the lack of fashionable activewear that is available to women.  It seems a woman needs a specific body type to fit into the "cute" clothes that are on the market.  Many of my clients wear shorts and t-shirts to workout because they feel there is nothing fashionable that they want to spend the money on and wear.  I personally made my own cycling shorts because the pieces available are masculine and not made for a woman's body.

I believe all women should look and feel their best. At Brick Betty we promise to bring both fashion and function to women of all shapes and sizes! 

Our designs are created in feminine, fun colors. No more "only black" workout clothes.  We study current trends and spend hours testing fabrics so that we can bring women the absolute best in active apparel. 

 

No detail is too small; we focus specifically on the needs of women.   Whether you are a runner, cyclist, weight-lifting fanatic, or a busy mom, we have the right clothes to fit your lifestyle. 

 

I have always struggled to find a Sports Bra that is supportive, yet still gives shape and looks feminine.  I designed the Betty Sports Bra myself and even did gymnastics in it to see how well it would support me.  If you can do back handsprings and still look and feel great, you have got a winner!  Ladies, this is the ultimate Sports Bra for any active woman! 

 

 

As an entirely woman owned business, Brick Betty’s main focus is to inspire women to look and feel their best through fashion in athletics.  Historically, athletics have been dominated by men.  However, as was seen in the 2012 Olympics, the United States women won a total of 58 medals, compared to the US men who brought home 45.  This proves that women are just as strong, capable, and competitive as their male counterparts.  

In today’s society, one of key issues facing women is self-esteem.  Many women struggle with confidence and self-worth .  In fact, a high percentage of women and young girls quit physical activities simply because they are not satisfied with the way their body looks.  Many times this dissatisfaction can be attributed to the fit of their clothes rather than anything else. 

Females should look and feel their best, always.  As a female-centered company, we want to use fashion as a means of reaching out to women and creating a community that teaches, motivates and supports.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise a minimum of $30,000 to produce our first collection.  The money will be used to purchase our fabrics, notions and also pay for manufacturing.  Brick Betty prides itself on being a company that is truly Made in the USA.  We purchase all of our textiles from American Companies and manufacture all of our products in the USA as well.  As our demand for products goes up, so does the demand for more employees.  With your support, we can not only produce an amazing apparel line for female athletes, but we can keep Americans working. 

At Brick Betty, we want to give back and show our appreciation to all of our supporters.  For your contribution we are offering the following:

$10 - 10% off all future Brick Betty website purchases.  Of course a huge Thank you!

$25– Your name will be listed on our website as a founding supporter of Brick Betty and you will receive 15% off all future Brick Betty website purchases.

$50 - All of the above, plus a Brick Betty Head Band.

$100 - All of the above, plus a Brick Betty Water Bottle.

$250 - All of the above plus have a piece in our collection named after you.

$500- All of the above plus a the Brick Betty Pucker-Up Pull Over complete with a special "Founder" logo.

$750 - All of the above plus an invitation to the VIP Launch Party

 

The Impact

With your help, Brick Betty can put our fashion forward fitness apparel in stores in the United States and across the globe.  The more clothes we can produce, the more Americans we can put back to work. 

We understand that not everybody is capable of making a monetary contribution to our campaign.  However, you can still help Brick Betty by sharing our story with your friends and family via word of mouth or through social media networks like Facebook and Twitter.  Simply use the Indiegogo share buttons and help spread the word. 

We appreciate your support and thank you for your time!

story:
The Multimatic is our flagship product for the discerning gentleman. The Multimatic has a striking presence, featuring Sapphire crystal, Exposition caseback, Premium leather strap, 316L Stainless Steel, 5ATM water resistance, Multi-Layer metallic dial, Diamond Cut hands and Swiss luminous pigment.
 
 
 
 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 
 
 
 

 

 
 
The Republic is our most sporty style. It features a see through dial showing its mechanical movement and beating heart. Large hands and hour markers with Swiss Tritec luminous ensure easy readability. Sporty yet classic, it can be worn in the office just as well as in a game of polo.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 

The Regent is our most sophisticated style for the watch connoisseur. It features a dial window revealing its mechanical heart beating at 21,600 vibrations per hour. Its design is a harmonious balance between modern and tradition. At 42mm it looks at home even on a 6.5" / 16.5cm narrow wrist.
 
 
 
 

 

 
 
 

Our movements are self-winding, meaning they use the motion of the wrist and transform it into kinetic energy via a rotor, and stores in a spring. To manually wind the mechanism, simply turn the crown clockwise a dozen or so times every 48 hours.

Our quality testing standards are ISO 2859-1 (ANSI/ASQC Z1.4-2003), and we thoroughly inspect all components 100% before proceeding to assembly in our very own factory in Pforzheim. Movements are subject to accuracy testing machine with allowable tolerance (+/-0.1ms), and Dials are assembled under an electronic alignment machine. We strive to produce as much as possible ourselves even if it costs us more or takes longer.

 
Super-LumiNova™ is a brand name for strontium aluminate–based non-radioactive and nontoxic photoluminescent or afterglow pigments for illuminating markings on watch dials & hands. This technology offers up to ten times higher brightness than previous zinc sulfide–based materials. We source our pigments exclusively from RC TRITEC SA, the Swiss market leader.

Every purchase of the Multimatic, or purchase of any two or more (2+ pcs) watches ships with this premium collector's box made of wood, a carrying bag and warranty card.

All purchases of one (1pc) Regent, Renaissance or Republic come in a premium slim box and a warranty card.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.facer.Waldhoff.fcrm2CWSIEmp5

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.facer.Waldhoff.fcrHC77XaKNNM

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.facer.Waldhoff.fcr3zNzRb9wbG

We guarantee the quality of our products to be 100% free of defects. If something is defective within two years of your purchase, we will replace your watch free of charge.

For your peace of mind; shall you sense that the watch did not meet your expectations when you receive it, just get in touch with us and we will send you a full refund.

 

Risks and challenges

Our goal is to manufacture as much as possible ourselves, in our small manufacture in Pforzheim, but there are components that we need to purchase from other vendors, such as dials, hands and the automatic movements.

As such, we depend on the timely delivery of some components to deliver products to our buyers, and the availability of some parts fluctuates. However, our manufacture has been in business since over 35 years, and we always delivered our products to our customer within reasonable amounts of time. Both our Swiss and German partners are experienced in watch manufacturing, leading to a high safety level for our supporters.

At this stage we have completed design, engineering testing and calibration, and have overcome all technical obstacles. We produced tooling for our cases, dials, straps and hands in the winter of 2016, and now have real working samples of all four watch lines. All we need at this time is to raise funds to start production. Assembled watches are subject to water resistance and air pressure resistance testing, impact resistance, corrosion and abrasion testing, and final accuracy testing

The Regent is our most sophisticated style for the watch connoisseur. It features a dial window revealing its mechanical heart beating at 21,600 vibrations per hour. Its design is a harmonious balance between modern and tradition. At 42mm it looks at home even on a 6.5" / 16.5cm narrow wrist.
 

 

 




 

    

Our movements are self-winding, meaning they use the motion of the wrist and transform it into kinetic energy via a rotor, and stores in a spring. To manually wind the mechanism, simply turn the crown clockwise a dozen or so times every 48 hours.
Our quality testing standards are ISO 2859-1 (ANSI/ASQC Z1.4-2003), and we thoroughly inspect all components 100% before proceeding to assembly in our very own factory in Pforzheim. Movements are subject to accuracy testing machine with allowable tolerance (+/-0.1ms), and Dials are assembled under an electronic alignment machine. We strive to produce as much as possible ourselves even if it costs us more or takes longer.

 


Super-LumiNova™ is a brand name for strontium aluminate–based non-radioactive and nontoxic photoluminescent or afterglow pigments for illuminating markings on watch dials & hands. This technology offers up to ten times higher brightness than previous zinc sulfide–based materials. We source our pigments exclusively from RC TRITEC SA, the Swiss market leader.






Every purchase of the Multimatic, or purchase of any two or more (2+ pcs) watches ships with this premium collector's box made of wood, a carrying bag and warranty card.All purchases of one (1pc) Regent, Renaissance or Republic come in a premium slim box and a warranty card.https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.facer.Waldhoff.fcrm2CWSIEmp5https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.facer.Waldhoff.fcrHC77XaKNNMhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.facer.Waldhoff.fcr3zNzRb9wbGWe guarantee the quality of our products to be 100% free of defects. If something is defective within two years of your purchase, we will replace your watch free of charge.For your peace of mind; shall you sense that the watch did not meet your expectations when you receive it, just get in touch with us and we will send you a full refund. Risks and challengesOur goal is to manufacture as much as possible ourselves, in our small manufacture in Pforzheim, but there are components that we need to purchase from other vendors, such as dials, hands and the automatic movements.As such, we depend on the timely delivery of some components to deliver products to our buyers, and the availability of some parts fluctuates. However, our manufacture has been in business since over 35 years, and we always delivered our products to our customer within reasonable amounts of time. Both our Swiss and German partners are experienced in watch manufacturing, leading to a high safety level for our supporters.At this stage we have completed design, engineering testing and calibration, and have overcome all technical obstacles. We produced tooling for our cases, dials, straps and hands in the winter of 2016, and now have real working samples of all four watch lines. All we need at this time is to raise funds to start production. Assembled watches are subject to water resistance and air pressure resistance testing, impact resistance, corrosion and abrasion testing, and final accuracy testing

story:
INTRODUCING...

2VR is extremely innovative. Hands free. Thin. Mobile. Fits in your pocket!

Today, we have unlimited access to information. We can easily access photos, videos, and text via our smart phones. The one media lacking instant access is virtual reality. 2VR addresses this, turning our flat 2D media, into 360 degrees of awesomeness you can explore anywhere.

Welcome Friends and Family to the Virtual World
2VR is the perfect gift! Introduce your friends and family to the world of virtual reality! Get ready for "Woahs" and "Oh my's"!
Check out our 2, 5, and 10 packs for savings! We will be shipping in November, making 2VR perfect for the holidays. 
 

We've Been Featured

The press loves 2VR! We have already been featured on so many outlets and the list keeps growing!

Referral Program

Features

2VR allows you to view hands free, this really allows you to fully immerse yourself in all the great VR content. What makes this possible are specially designed ear grips that comfortably balance the phone on your face. Being hands-free truly allows you to immerse yourself in the content. 

 

2VR is the first hands free VR headset that fits in your pocket. 2VR is so thin it fits practically anywhere!

Allows you to watch wherever whenever. Many people leave their VR headsets at home, why not take it with you when you're on the go; whether going to your local coffee shops, a friend's house, or traveling the world. VR is at your fingertips.

Each package includes 2VR FABRIC, and immersive cover that doubles as a protective sleeve!

How To Use 2VR

  • Open VR content on your smartphone
  • Insert your smartphone
  • Wear 2VR just like any pair of glasses
  • Enter a new world, and enjoy!
Phone Sizes
2VR holds smartphones of all sizes. We've tested most Androids and Apple smartphones, everything from 4" (iTouch) to 5.5" screens (iPhone 6s Plus)!

2VR Specifications

  • 34mm Lenses for optimum FOV
  • Soft Rubber Phone Grips to allow for any movement while wearing 2VR while keeping your phone safe!
  • Ergonomic Ear Grips designed to comfortably wrap around your ears
  • Rotating Front Arms used to holds most smart phones! Make sure your phone is fully pressed in. We recommend taking off your case or using a thin case. Large cases may fit but are not recommended.
  • Adjustable Temple Lengths We are all different, 2VR allows users to adjust the temples to work for you!
  • Nose Padding to comfort your nose
  • Immersive Every 2VR package includes 2VR FABRIC an immersive cover that functions as a portable sleeve as well!

More information below!

Join the 2VR Revolution! 

We need your help to fund our manufacturing and shipping costs. Help make 2VR a reality!

By backing this campaign you'll be the first to receive 2VR and you'll be able to take part in our custom color survey once we reach 10k in funding!

We have been working on perfecting 2VR over the last year. After countless design iterations we finally landed on the perfect design. We've tested 2VR prototypes on many virtual explorers and refined the design to what it is today.

Last month we began our final mold process with our manufacturer and are happy to finally start shipping worldwide!

Color Options: 

Where We Are Today 
We are shipping! Order today!
 

Molds in progress!

Some of our color samples in the factory.

Project Timeline

Check out our road to fruition below!

 

Join the revolution and make 2VR a reality!

 

Content

 

Virtual reality apps are extremely accessible. Your app store is jam-packed with amazing virtual reality apps! Everything from roller coaster rides to space odysseys to swimming with sharks. 

 

2VR is compatible with any VR or AR content, and easily fits any iPhone or Android, and most importantly 2VR allows you to view hands free. 

 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you love 2VR and want to make it a reality please share us on social media! Every share helps and will help us unlock our amazing colors! 

    1VR Available Today! 
    If you can't wait to get your hands on virtual reality check out 1VR COLOR!
    We launched 1VR earlier this year. An amazingly colorful cardboard headset inspired by Google Cardboard! Selling on Amazon now!

    Share Share Share!

    It's time folks! Get the word out and make some noise! 

    It's easy and takes two seconds!

     
    Share tools available at the top of this page!
     
    Press Kit
    If you are a member of the press and would like to feature 2VR, please email Roy at rp@stimuli.us
    Credits
    Video, editing, and production beautifully done by John Lackmeyer.

    FAQ

    Will my phone be safe?

    YES! We have specially designed phone grips that allow any type of movement. Turn 2VR upside down, shake it vigorously, and spin as fast as you can! Freedom at last!

    Can I wear glasses with 2VR?

    Unfortunately no, we recommend you use contacts if possible. We are looking for ways to improve this. 

    When do I choose my color of my pre-ordered colors?

    We will email each backer following the end of the campaign. You will be able to confirm your color preferences! Our base colors are all black and clear, but share away to unlock more amazing colors!

    What phones fit in 2VR?

    All smartphones that have screen sizes ranging from +4"! That's virtually all smart phones!

    Is 2VR immersive?

    Each 2VR package comes with 2VR FABRIC. The fabric easily covers 2VR and keeps light out! Amazingly, 2VR FABRIC also functions as a portable sleeve, great for travel.

    What if I input the wrong address at checkout?

    We will reach out to all backers at the end of the campaign where you can reenter your address! 

    What other products does Stimuli VR design/what's next?

    Stimuli VR has a couple new innovative products in the works! We will announce these new products next year after 2VR has launched. As a backer of this campaign you will be the first to know about exciting new products.

    Earlier this year Stimuli VR launched 1VR COLOR, a great entry level Google Cardboard inspired colorful headset. Check out the link below and get yours today!

     Selling on Amazon now!

story:
Introduction

Solahanpu is a Japanese design studio that designs and produces, bags, wallets, accessories, and other items. Our products are created using superior quality canvas that is coated with a special paraffin wax that creates a leather-like texture. We had a successful campaign of this product in Japan, and this time we have made several changes from the previous version.

 

Description 

Baksteen is a minimalistic crossbody bag designed and manufactured by Solahanpu. The external layer of the bag is made of canvass material while the internal layer is made of the water-proof material called tarpaulin. Baksteen's zipper is placed hidden right behind your back, making it impossible to open without your knowledge. You have probably noticed that any crossbody bags or messenger bags tend to swing toward your side when riding a bike. The mini-strap comes with Baksteen prevents the annoying swing from happening ever again. There are two pockets inside Baksteen; one is behind the opening lid, the other is in the main compartment. Internal pockets are divided into 3 sections. Baksteen means a "brick" in Dutch.

 

Former successful campaign on Kickstarter

Please see the link: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/solahanpu/baksteen-the-last-crossbody-bag-youll-ever-need

 

Former successful campaign in Japan

Please see the link: https://cf.machi-ya.jp/project/20170731/01

 

Changes from the previous

1: The shoulder belt which is connected to main body side in the video has been moved to lid side due to more convenient to open the lid.

 

2: The "Brown" color in the video has been replaced with "Green", which is more like army green.

 

3:  The updated version has a pocket which is separated into 3 sections by stitching lines as below image, whereas the previous version had no stitching lines to separate sections. Gray area indicates pockets, red lines indicate stitching lines in the image.

 

Japan's love for canvas

The history of canvas started from ancient Egypt and then has spread all over the world, In Japan, canvas has become widespread since nearly end of Edo 19th dynasty used for durable sail boat  mainly and bags and so on, and in modern Japan though there are various types of chemical fiber fabric are used in many situations but there are also many numbers of people who love canvas and several characteristic points such as feelings of natural cotton, durable but still natural material, breathable, no uncomfortable feeling when touching to human's skin, hard and strong effect, etc... once you visit Japan, you can see there are myriads of canvas sewn products sold at many shops and they are all popular for wide range of people, kids, teenagers, young generation, senior citizens, even tourists from abroad. so the canvas is still familiar with human in our usual life, we like to make a fusion of this traditional wonderful material and modern sophisticated designs.

 

 

 

Description 

Baksteen is a minimalistic crossbody bag designed and manufactured by Solahanpu. The external layer of the bag is made of canvass material while the internal layer is made of the water-proof material called tarpaulin. Baksteen's zipper is placed hidden right behind your back, making it impossible to open without your knowledge. You have probably noticed that any crossbody bags or messenger bags tend to swing toward your side when riding a bike. The mini-strap comes with Baksteen prevents the annoying swing from happening ever again. There are two pockets inside Baksteen; one is behind the opening lid, the other is in the main compartment. Internal pockets are divided into 3 sections. Baksteen means a "brick" in Dutch.

Anti-theft zipper system

 

Water repellent waxed canvas outside and water proof tarpaulin inside.

 

Water proof zeppers.

 

Pouring shower like water as a test.

 

The envelope is almost safe.

 

Summary 

・Hidden zipper to access, making it impossible to open without your knowledge.

・Canvas material for outside, water-proof material for inside which saves your equipment inside from getting wet.

・Two internal pockets, one external pocket with water-proof zipper.

・An attached mini-strap prevents the annoying swing when biking Large capacity.

・All your essentials can fit including a 500ml plastic bottle, tablets, books, foldable umbrella, towels, wallets, smartphones, etc...

・The entire body and two zippers are water-proof

 

5 Liters capacity

 

Water proof zippers

 

Easy access

 

you can also clip to front/rear pocket

 

Pour water....

 

More water with no marcy....

 

But safe inside

 

Walking&listening your favorite songs!

 

Specifications

Material: Canvas, Tarpaulin
Processing: waxed paraffin
Size: Width 34cm / Height 18cm / Depth 10cm
Designed for: Tablets (Kindle or iPad mini), water bottles (plastic bottles), foldable umbrellas etc...
Designed in: Japan
Manufactured in: Taiwan

 

Videos from media: (Japanese subtitle)

Usage of the strap: When this strap is fixed to a belt loop or front/rear pocket of your pants, it prevents the bag from swinging around.

 

Waterproof: You don't need to worry about your belongings. Stuff you put inside Baksteen will remain dry even in heavy rain. 

 

Anti-theft: Even if someone tries to pickpocket your bag, Baksteen wouldn't let them do it as the main compartment zipper is hidden during normal use. 

 

Appearance:

Please note that the bag used in the video was an early prototype and has been slightly updated since filming. However, all pictures on this page show actual appearance as it will be delivered.

 

The brick-like body with a large capacity

 

Can hold all sorts of things

 

Hidden zipper

 

Anti-theft back-open system

 

Additional small water proof hidden pocket

 

Waterproof zippers!

 

Opens wide so you can load it easily.

 

Color variation:

Gray

 

Black

 

 

Green

 

Risks and challenges

Manufacturing is always the biggest potential hurdle . Please note:

・In the unlikely event of any delay, backers will immediately be notified.

・Slight colour variations may be present in the final production version(s)

・Some small parts like zipper tabs or clip types may be changed or replaced.

・Design of some little parts might be changed or replaced due to
    achieving what we think is better.

story:
The idea for Sassi Momma D’imorga Handbags started seven years ago after the birth of my second daughter.  Most of the time I had to carry her, my personal handbag, her diaper bag, and sometimes even our baby’s car seat.  And for the most part, I was constantly digging and fumbling through my handbag or her Diaper bag to find her pacifier or my keys.  My ahah moment came to me one day as I walked to my car from the mall in the pouring rain.  I had all of these items in my hand plus now an umbrella.

As I get to the car, I started fumbling and digging in my handbag for my keys, realizing after a few minutes they were buried deep down inside my daughter’s diaper bag.  After finding my long lost keys, I placed her and the other items in the car.  I then run around to the driver’s side, open the door, and hop in quickly.  I placed my hands on the steering wheel, took a deep breath, and thought to myself, “There has to be a better way.” And that was it! That my friends, was the beginning of our handbag journey…the beginning of Sassi Momma.

XoXo Nicole Hawkins, CEO, Sassi Momma

 

 

WHAT DOES D’IMORGA MEAN?

The name “D'imorga” was formed by combining the ingredients of the purposes of our bags. The "D'i" was acquired from the words diaper bag, the "m" was abstracted from the word "multifunctional," and "orga" stands for the organizational aspect of our bags.

Neat huh?! So uniquely crafted…just like our handbags!

 

WHAT MAKES YOUR BAG DIFFERENT?

The distinct difference between our handbags and any other handbags or
diaper bags are the two large zippered sections, which house over 15 unique,
carefully thought out compartments to help moms maintain organization within their handbag. But wait; there’s more!  The GREATEST thing about our
handbags is that the baby’s section is detachable; thus, creating a simple way
to furnish your daycare provider or baby sister with the required items to take
care of your baby’s needs. No longer do have to be overloaded with several bags or wonder where you placed your baby’s pacifier or bottle. Our new, patent pending, all-in-one, innovative Sassi Momma D’imorga Handbags have it all, even a changing pad to protect your baby’s bottom.  We also have an additional strap for the detachable section and stroller straps to attach to your stroller.

 

                    


WHAT’S THE “WUY” MOVEMENT?

Since the airing of our feature on the Bethenny Show, we received some great comments and advice about our Handbags, and we want to say THANK YOU to everyone who shared their thoughts and suggestions! We listened closely to everyone's advice, and created a new innovated design of our D’imorga Handbags! So exciting!

But we also wanted to let our customers know that there’s more to us than just bags.  We wanted to make a difference and help the women and children who are in need in our country, so we created our “WuY” Movement, standing for Women Understanding Why.

A percentage of each D'imorga Handbag purchased would go to various women or children's charities like the Breast Cancer Foundation and St. Jude Children's Research Hospital to name a couple. Each D'imorga Handbag design that we create would represent its own special charity.

·  The Ariahnna D'imorga Handbag supports a charity that supports Autism

·  The Jordyn D'imorga Handbag supports a charity that supports St. Judes Children's Research Hospital as a Partner in Hope

·  The Kaitlin D'imorga Handbag supports a charity that supports Breast Cancer Research Foundation

·  The Nalijah D'imorga Handbag supports a charity that support military moms

With so many different women and children's charities in the United States, we can’t do this alone. We need your help and support.  By supporting our campaign, your purchase will not only help Sassi Momma reach its goal of $12,000 and help with its next production run, but you will also be able to make a difference in another woman’s or another child’s life.

We thank you in advance for all of your support. Please SHARE our campaign page with your family and friends on through email, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc., and join us to make Sassi Momma and the “WuY” Movement victorious. One Bag Purchased; One Woman Assisted.


OUR D’IMORGA HANDBAGS?

Our D'imorga Handbags were made with moms in mind. For colors of each bag, see below:

The Ariahnna D'imorga Handbag...

The Jordyn D'imorga Handbag...

                              

The Kaitlin D'imorga Handbag...

The Nalijah D'imorga Handbag...

                             


PERKS WITH OPTIONS?

If you picked a perk that has an option of color and/or size, such as a "WuY" t-shirt or one of our D'imorga handbags, you will receive an email requesting your choice of color and/or size.  


RISKS AND CHALLENGES?

We are confident that you are going to love our D’imorga Handbags!

We are working with an overseas manufacturer so delays can occur and we want to be as upfront with our backers as we can on this. The prototypes took almost one month between rounds to finalize.

At this point, the only setbacks we foresee are delays in production and shipping, which would result in later delivery of the final product. Our manufacturing channels are ready to go.  To start the production process, we just need the funding to get started. The reason our goal is $12,000 is because that is the minimum amount needed to place our initial order and have them shipped to the United States. Once we place an order, it typically takes about one month to get the product produced and then another month to import and then ship to its final destination. We hope to ship them as soon as October 2014, but to be safe, we have set a date of delivery for November 2014. 


FAQ?

Have a question? If the info above doesn't help, you can ask the project creator directly by sending an email to questions@sassimomma.com.


GET SOCIAL!

Get social with Sassi Momma and support #theWuYmovement on the below social media sites!

And don't forget to back Sassi Momma & SHARE WITH ALL YOUR FRIENDS!
story_txt:
The idea for Sassi Momma D’imorga Handbags started seven years ago after the birth of my second daughter.  Most of the time I had to carry her, my personal handbag, her diaper bag, and sometimes even our baby’s car seat.  And for the most part, I was constantly digging and fumbling through my handbag or her Diaper bag to find her pacifier or my keys.  My ahah moment came to me one day as I walked to my car from the mall in the pouring rain.  I had all of these items in my hand plus now an umbrella.As I get to the car, I started fumbling and digging in my handbag for my keys, realizing after a few minutes they were buried deep down inside my daughter’s diaper bag.  After finding my long lost keys, I placed her and the other items in the car.  I then run around to the driver’s side, open the door, and hop in quickly.  I placed my hands on the steering wheel, took a deep breath, and thought to myself, “There has to be a better way.” And that was it! That my friends, was the beginning of our handbag journey…the beginning of Sassi Momma. XoXo Nicole Hawkins, CEO, Sassi Momma  WHAT DOES D’IMORGA MEAN?The name “D'imorga” was formed by combining the ingredients of the purposes of our bags. The "D'i" was acquired from the words diaper bag, the "m" was abstracted from the word "multifunctional," and "orga" stands for the organizational aspect of our bags. Neat huh?! So uniquely crafted…just like our handbags! WHAT MAKES YOUR BAG DIFFERENT?The distinct difference between our handbags and any other handbags ordiaper bags are the two large zippered sections, which house over 15 unique,carefully thought out compartments to help moms maintain organization within their handbag. But wait; there’s more!  The GREATEST thing about ourhandbags is that the baby’s section is detachable; thus, creating a simple wayto furnish your daycare provider or baby sister with the required items to takecare of your baby’s needs. No longer do have to be overloaded with several bags or wonder where you placed your baby’s pacifier or bottle. Our new, patent pending, all-in-one, innovative Sassi Momma D’imorga Handbags have it all, even a changing pad to protect your baby’s bottom.  We also have an additional strap for the detachable section and stroller straps to attach to your stroller.                     WHAT’S THE “WUY” MOVEMENT?
Since the airing of our feature on the
Bethenny Show, we received some great comments and advice about our Handbags,
and we want to say THANK YOU to everyone who shared their thoughts and
suggestions! We listened closely to everyone's advice, and created a new
innovated design of our D’imorga Handbags! So exciting!
But we also wanted to let our customers
know that there’s more to us than just bags.  We wanted to make a difference and help the
women and children who are in need in our country, so we created our “WuY”
Movement, standing for Women Understanding Why. 
A percentage of each D'imorga Handbag
purchased would go to various women or children's charities like the Breast
Cancer Foundation and St. Jude Children's Research Hospital to name a couple.
Each D'imorga Handbag design that we create would represent its own special
charity.· 
The Ariahnna D'imorga
Handbag supports a charity that supports Autism 
· 
The Jordyn D'imorga
Handbag supports a charity that supports St. Judes Children's Research Hospital as a Partner in Hope
· 
The Kaitlin D'imorga
Handbag supports a charity that supports Breast Cancer Research Foundation
· 
The Nalijah D'imorga
Handbag supports a charity that support military momsWith so many different women and
children's charities in the United States, we can’t do this alone. We need your
help and support.  By supporting our
campaign, your purchase will not only help Sassi Momma reach its goal of
$12,000 and help with its next production run, but you will also be able to
make a difference in another woman’s or another child’s life.
We thank you in advance for all of your
support. Please SHARE our campaign page with your family and friends on through
email, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc., and join us to make Sassi Momma and
the “WuY” Movement victorious. One Bag Purchased; One Woman Assisted.

story:
Missed the campaign?

Good news, we continue to sell here :


Discover

 

 

 

Keep your secret treasures close to you!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Two compartments:

Upper: watertight and extendable.

Lower: secured and waterproof

Can be opened to pack larger items

 

 

 

Top and side access. Padded bag for easy access to your laptop

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We believe in durable material that last a lifetime. Our products are made of recycled plastic and recycled leather. Our ultimate goal is to manufacture close to where our customers are.

 

 

 

 

The idea of a brand celebrating soft mobility, French art-de-vivre and passions was born within the Fritsch-Durisotti Studio. A brand tailored by designers who want to share their passion.

story:
BÆNDIT  EVOLUTION NEW METAL FRAMES INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN ON :

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/baendit-evolution-metal-frames/x/8462208#/


BÆNDIT changes your relationship with sunglasses. They are MODULAR and BENDABLE.

BÆNDIT is BENDABLE!
BÆNDIT adapts to your lifestyle.  Wear them loose and comfortable until you need to kick it up a notch for that kite surfing or beach volley session, then just press BÆNDIT tight to your face and you are ready for action. BÆNDIT sunglasses will stay where you need them to be.

Multipurpose and multifunctional, useful beyond sun protection!

BÆNDIT is MODULAR!
All BÆNDIT pieces are interchangeable. You can swap the color, you can mix and match, borrow or trade to create your perfect pair of sunglasses. With its Patent Pending structure you can deconstruct them to fit even in the smallest of pockets.

A special 4 and 8 pin handmade alloy attachment, coated with a silicon layer, assures ultra tight and strong fit of the temples and bridge pieces inside the carved and reinforced Polycarbonate eye frame.

 KEY FEATURES

  • Temples and nose piece can bend and flex for better fit or easy and creative storage

  • Universal connections for customized color and shape mix

  • Handcrafted for a perfect functionality

  • Extreme high quality; over 5x the production cost of leading luxury eye wear manufactures

Protected by international patents and trademarks.


MODELS

Named after the most famous Bandits, we are proud to introduce the NED KELLY and SALVATORE GIULIANO models:

NED KELLY EDITION                        

Edward “Ned” Kelly was seen as the Australian equivalent of Robin Hood. Born in 1854 he became a Bushranger at the age of 14 after his father was killed by police. 

 

His main source of income was bank robbery. He was eventually captured and hanged after a violent confrontation with police where he wore a homemade bendable metal plate armour and helmet. BÆNDIT in this shape reflects the roughness of Australia early pioneering bush life and the Kelly`s last stand inventiveness.

SALVATORE GIULIANO EDITIONSalvatore Giuliano was the original italian “peoples bandit”. He rose to prominence following the Allied invasion of Sicily in 1943. Giuliano was the first bandit to be followed by mass media, mainly for his daring, good looks and theatrical flair. This notoriety caused great embarrassment to the italian police that had 2000 men deployed against him. BÆNDIT in this edition commemorates Giuliano’s style and charm even in the hardest of circumstances.


BÆNDIT STRUCTURE AND MATERIALS
BÆNDIT revolutionary patent pending structure and materials allows for a whole new eye wear experience.


FRAMES:

 

STRUCTURE
In new generation TR-90 polymer: lightweight, flexible and impact resistance. TR90 refered to as plastic titanium, a memory polymer material, BÆNDIT eyepiece frame is so light that it floats but also strong, with a resistance to deformation index of 620kg/cm2 and the ability to regain shape after deformation.

 

LENS
Custom S20 Revo lenses made specifically for BÆNDIT to work in the toughest of environments and filter out 100% of UVA / UVB / UVC. Made from Thermoplastic Polycarbonate composite for extra strength and durability.

 

TEMPLES & NOSE

CORE
BÆNDIT alloy, processed and engineered to reach exceptional reversible plasticity properties. Ductility and malleability performances allow the core of the temples and bridge to deform, hold position and move back to original when pressure is applied. This is further enhanced by flexibility of the silicon casing and the fact that it is bonded to the alloy core.

Additionally each temple and nose bridge piece is hand cut and 4 (temples) to 8 (nose) safety pins are hand welded to the main structure to work as a locking mechanism to the eye frame piece.

CASING
High Resistance Silicone-Rubber Elastomer cured and Injection molded with the alloy core to be permanently bonded. The molded Silicone casing provides the elastic capacity to follow the core in the deformation process and helps in the last 5% of returning to its original shape.

BOX
Made from recycled cardboard.

 

PERKS CHEATSHEET 

                                      



 

PERKS DETAILS:

FULL BÆNDIT SET INCLUDES:
2 temples , 1 nose piece and 2 frames with lens to construct a full set of BÆNDIT sunglasses. The box also contains our special BÆNDIT pouch.
TEMPLES AND NOSE SETS INCLUDE:
2 temples, 1 nose piece

FRAMES SETS INCLUDE:
2 eye frames with lens.

BANDANA:
BÆNDIT special multipurpose bandana (multiple uses, from scarf to hat)


Risks & Challenges

We have spent over 12 months working with an array of professionals who helped bring BÆNDIT to the awesomeness they are now . Design Engineers, Patent Attorneys, Logistics and Sourcing Experts, Material Engineers and Production Experts have been fundamental in the creation of BÆNDIT.

Luckily everyone we talked to loved our idea and encouraged us to push forward. Working with our patent attorneys proved to be very time consuming, but necessary. BÆNDIT is patent pending.

Prototypes were designed and created, with incredible changes and improvements over time. Working testing samples are now fantastic and shooting samples almost have all the qualities the product you will get have. The greatest challenge was getting the plasticity of the temples and nose alloy core to work on tandem with the flexibility of the silicon casing and permanently bind the two for a perfect overall feel and function. 

BÆNDIT was the perfect name. So we trademarked it, and now carry a brand that will be distinguished and recognized in the market place. Our website is pretty cool! Check us out at www.baendit.com

Everything is lined up for production and ready to go, logistics and shipping are at the ready and even if  delays and hiccups can always occur, we are confident we ll be able to deliver like pros.

BÆNDIT Sunglasses are really really cool!!! Again you can bend them and play with the different styles and combinations it really does not get better than this with eyewear!!!! We want to revolutionize the industry.  Help us to do that by pledging toward this campaign, clicking the “Back This Project” button and sharing our page with friends and family.

We have spent over 12 months working with an array of professionals who helped bring BÆNDIT to the awesomeness they are now . Design Engineers, Patent Attorneys, Logistics and Sourcing Experts, Material Engineers and Production Experts have been fundamental in the creation of BÆNDIT.
Luckily everyone we talked to loved our idea and encouraged us to push forward. Working with our patent attorneys proved to be very time consuming, but necessary. BÆNDIT is patent pending.

story:
Stifit is not just an another activity tracker. It offers a complete way to track fitness and health goals.








   

                                                         
                                   























  1.  Is it compatible with Google Fit and Apple health?
    Yes, it is compatible with Google Fit and Apple health.
     
  2.  Is Stifit available in multiple colors?
     Yes. It is available in White, Red and Black color options.
     
  3.  Is Stifit Waterproof?
     Yes, it is waterproof and rated IP68.
     
  4.  Is it measure ECG medical grade accuracy?
    No, it is useful for normal update.
     
  5. Is it measure BMI & BMR Factors?
    Yes, it measures BMI and BMR factors.
     
  6. What about the calorie counting feature?
    Stifit uses a sophisticated algorithm to calculate the calories burnt based on many biometrical inputs.
     
  7. Is heart rate continuously monitored?
    Yes, it supports monitoring of heart rate continuously.
     
  8. Which tracking activities do Stifit Tracks?
    Health Tracking- Blood Oxygen, Sleep monitoring, Calories, Dynamic Heart Rate, Fatigue level.
    Exercise Tracking- Cardio, Reps of exercise, Gym exercises, No. of steps, Rope Skipping, Jumping Jack & Sit ups.
    Swimming Tracking- Swimming exercises, Stroke count, Distance Tracked & Swimming Session.
    Cycling Tracking- Navigation, Distance covered & Mileage detection.
     
  9. Is Web app of Stifit available?
    Yes, it also has a web app, iOS, and Android app to ease user experience.
     
  10. What are the Features of Stifit?
    It includes Several innovative features which include Compatible with all devices,  Web, Android and iOS Support, Activity & Health Tracker, Read & Reply to messages.

story:
You need the Octopurse to carry all your things so nobodies hands can suffer anymore. I want everybody to have the Octopurse, because the Octopurse makes life better." 

- Bali Bare, at age 5, when she invented the Octopurse


"It’s the Octopurse.  When you go to the Grocery Store you end up with too many bags and you only have two hands.  So the Octopurse gives you more hands.  This has a comfy handle and with these 8 hooks you can hook on tons of shopping bags, so your hands don’t hurt anymore!  My dream is for everyone to have an Octopurse.  To make this business work, we need capital and need your help.  The Octopurse is going to be huge.  Thanks for your help."

- Bali Bare, now 7-Year Old Entrepreneur 

Keep the Octopurse in your purse, backpack or trunk and ready for action when you have several bags to carry at the grocery store or at the mall.   The Octopurse gives you 8 extra hands when you need it.   From the creativity of a child entrepreneur to something that people use everyday.    If you live in an urban area or bring groceries in from the car, you only need one trip with the Octopurse! 

Overview of the Octopurse

Bali Bare, at age 5, created the Octopurse to solve a problem for her father.    Her father would carry all the groceries like this video: 

Yet, since Bali was 3 feet 6 inches tall at the time and her father 6 feet 3 inches, it put Bali right at the hand height of her father.     So she saw the real life struggle of adults carrying groceries, much like the video suggests above.

Here is her first video explaining why she invented the Octopurse, at age 5:


"I first saw the problem because Daddy's hands were turning purple and Mom's.  So I said how about we invent the Octopurse?   I'm Bali Bare and I am an Entrepreneur.  I created the Octopurse.  The Octopurse is a sorta thing that can carry your stuff.   It has 8 hooks, arms.  I invented it so your hands don't turn purple.   You need the Octopurse to carry all your things so nobodies hands can suffer anymore.   I want everybody to have the Octopurse, because the Octopurse makes life better." 

- Bali Bare, at age 5 (and already an Entrepreneur!)

Here is the re-created original drawing:

With some design work, the final product has become a proven and tested ergonomic handle that can support up to 60 pounds of groceries.

That is 8.6 Gallons of Milk.  That is 60 Loaves of Bread.  That is 40 Dozen Carton of Eggs.   So we think it will hold your groceries. 

Here is a look at the Patent Application:  

What We Need & What You Get

Invest in an Octopurse:

  • Never have your hand hurt again carrying groceries from car to counter or store to home. 
  • Support Young Entrepreneurs as 10% of the net proceeds will go to a Young Entrepreneur Charity and the other 90% will go to Bali Bare's College Fund.  
  • All funds will support local 3-D printing and manufacturing the necessary quantities of the Octopurse.  

Risks & Challenges

There are a few challenges in creating a product with low margin and low cost.   Yet, we are prepared to deliver on the Octopurse one way or another.  

  • We need to get 2,500 minimum Octopurses to break even on manufacturing.  
  • If we are unable to reach 2,500, we will 3-D Print and deliver all the Octopurses as we have perfected 3-D processes and found a unique way to leverage a 3-D printing group.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please contribute to Young Entrepreneurs, as 10% of net proceeds will be given to enable Entrepreneurial Education for K-12 through the Checkered Flag Run Foundation.   

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Share with everyone you know to get the word out about the Octopurse.
  • Share this with other Young Entrepreneurs to let them know that they can become an Entrepreneur too.  
  • Share this in Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest and any other place to grow support for the cause.  
Thank you!
Bali
