Metal Charms are made locally in Southern California and use only recycled metal



Creating the Charms
Bodhi Tree Collections is proud to support local businesses as well. The Casting Place is located in Los Angeles, California and does beautiful work. Watch the video below to see the process!



Creating the Bamboo Base Shapes




Step 1: Bodhi Tree Collections uses bamboo from wild bamboo forests in Southeast Asia. Bamboo, which is a type of grass, is one of the fastest growing plants on the planet, much more than hard wood.




Step 2: Once the bamboo is collected, it is soaked in local ponds for four months to a full year. This method naturally fumigates the organic materials by pulling out the natural sweetness of the bamboo stalk, making insects naturally repelled.




Step 3: After the natural fumigation process is complete and the bamboo has fully dried, the Bamboo is cut into long, thin, even stalks by hand.




Step 4: The flexible bamboo stalks are spun into seamless forms, creating the shape of the design.




Step 5: Once the desired shape has been created, the shape is coated with a rice glue, smoothing out the design. The coated design is allowed to dry in the sunshine or by a fire in the winter months.




Step 6: After the piece has dried, multiple light coats of rice glue are applied to ensure rigidness and longevity. Each layer will dry in the sunlight and be polished by hand. The desired color will be added as the final layer. In our IndieGoGo design, we are featuring our newest Bodhi Tree Collections line with natural bamboo coloring paired with a crisp white lacquer color base.




Step 7: Before finishing touches are made, our local quality control inspects the pieces for flaws and imperfections, ensuring that you get the highest quality product.






The entire process is an ancient tradition that has been passed down for many generations. What’s so spectacular about it is that the environmental sustainability of this beautiful craft was one created out of necessity rather than choice.


$10 - Basic: I'd Like to Help!
Receive information on how to make your bathroom more organic and get your name listed on the Bodhi Tree Collections website as a founding sponsor. You’ll get a BIG thank you and much appreciation for showing your love.
Click Here to Donate $10 to Bodhi Tree Collections!


$300 - Complete Set
One of each base shape and your choice of charms for each one, plus the opportunity to vote on our next batch of new charms and listing on Bodhi Tree Collections website as a founding sponsor. We will follow up with you after the campaign for your choice of charm.
Click Here to Donate $300 to Bodhi Tree Collections!


$48 - Brush / Toothbrush Holder
With your choice of any one charm, plus the opportunity to vote on our next batch of new charms and listing on Bodhi Tree Collections website as a founding sponsor. We will follow up with you after the campaign for your choice of charm.
Click Here to Donate $48 to Bodhi Tree Collections!


$44 - Tissue Box
With your choice of any one charm, plus the opportunity to vote on our next batch of new charms and listing on Bodhi Tree Collections website as a founding sponsor. We will follow up with you after the campaign for your choice of charm.
Click Here to Donate $44 to Bodhi Tree Collections!

$35 - Small Candle Holder
With your choice of any one charm, plus the opportunity to vote on our next batch of new charms and listing on Bodhi Tree Collections website as a founding sponsor. We will follow up with you after the campaign for your choice of charm.
Click Here to Donate $35 to Bodhi Tree Collections!


$35 - Soap Dish
With your choice of any one charm, plus the opportunity to vote on our next batch of new charms and listing on Bodhi Tree Collections website as a founding sponsor. We will follow up with you after the campaign for your choice of charm.
Click Here to Donate $35 to Bodhi Tree Collections!


$50 - Large Tray
With your choice of any one charm, plus the opportunity to vote on our next batch of new charms and listing on Bodhi Tree Collections website as a founding sponsor. We will follow up with you after the campaign for your choice of charm.
Click Here to Donate $50 to Bodhi Tree Collections!


$17 - Extra Charm (No Base Shape)
Choice of any charm to go with your base shape — c’mon you’ve got to have some options! This perk is best as an add-on to another perk so you can receive your base shape of choice and more than one charm to go with it. We will follow up with you after the campaign for your choice of charm.
Click Here to Donate $17 to Bodhi Tree Collections!







About Bodhi Tree Collections
Bodhi Tree Collections started two years ago, after I visited Vietnam and fell in love with the bamboo and natural lacquer decorative items I discovered during my travels. I met some incredible friends there who turned me onto the process and shared their artwork with me. Ever since, I have been working to bring these handmade items made from organic, sustainable materials to the US. I’ve imported some initial designs and sold them in stores throughout the US both online and off.
In working through the process of designing, importing and selling, I have recognized what I can do to improve the business by creating a fun, configurable product that beautifies the bath in a chemical free, orgainic way; helps to save time and money with shapes that are easy to clean, while maintaining the eco-friendly aspect of the designs that first impressed me. After some meditation and research on the topic I decided to take my next steps with this IndieGoGo campaign. In order to allow my company to take its next steps, I'm giving you the chance to get your hands on these beauties before anyone else does, all while supporting an international network of artists involved and being a good environmental steward in the process.

Other Ways to Contribute
Share Our Campaign Website - www.BodhiTreeCollections.com/campaign
Share Our Main Bodhi Tree Collections Website - www.BodhiTreeCollections.com
Like/Share Us on Facebook - Click Here
Follow Us on Twitter - @BodhiTreeCo
Follow Us on Instagram - @bodhitreecollections
Pin Us on Pinterest - Click Here
Share Our Campaign Video - Click Here
What are the Funds For?
With your pledge, I'll be able to source and transport my base shapes from Vietnam to my warehouse in the USA, with a portion of the proceeds going back to the women that make the bamboo items by hand. I'll also be able to manufacture my charms locally in California and begin marketing and selling the new designs.
Cost Specifics
Master Models: These are solid metal and clay models in the shape of my new designs. I have already created these for my first set of charms. When it’s time to design the next release of charms, I’ll work with local artist who should be reasonably compensated for their work.

Casting Molds: These are the molds created with the Master Models and used to pour the molten metal for mass production. We have already created one mold for the five initial charms, which should last up to 20 or 30 production runs. To make more charms than this, I will also need to create additional molds.

Metal and Materials: Each charm weighs less than half a pound. Your pledge funds will help support the expense of the recycled metal used, other materials in casting and the time of the casters. Then exact quantity will depend on the amount of pledges.

Production of Bamboo Base Shapes: Once the campaign is complete, your pledge will help to get my friends in Vietnam working on the base shapes. It takes them roughly three months to complete all the steps required, so assessing the quantity of the base shape and volume of each will be a first priority after the campaign ends. I’ve already worked with them to design the initial samples and now need to tell them how many of which shapes to make.

Third Party Inspection Company for Bamboo Shapes: In order to avoid inconsistencies in the design and high quality products, we will get another set of eyes to inspect and send a report before the items are shipped.

Importing the Bamboo Base Shapes: Once complete, the bamboo base shapes will need to be packed and shipped over from Vietnam to Southern California. It’s usually best to have them travel by sea.

Packaging: This is how the charms and base shapes will make their way safely to you from our warehouse. I’m working to narrow down a safe way of packing with minimum waste that does the gorgeous pieces justice. A smooth and efficient delivery process will require a Fulfillment Agency. In this way, your eco-friendly designs will arrive safe and sound, and on time.

Risks and Challenges
As with any manufactured products there are risks. Here are a few of the risks that I feel confidently able to overcome:

Loose agreements for timeline: When dealing with villagers in Vietnam, time is much more malleable than we think of it in western cities. Additionally, in Asia the Lunar New Year celebration (which is at the beginning of February this year) means work stops for at least a week if not a week and a half, so timeline could be stretched slightly to allow for the holiday.

Weather: Since the bamboo base shapes are usually cured in the sunshine, prolonged rain in Vietnam could delay completion.

Product Consistency: This is less a problem with the metal charms than it is with our bamboo base shapes. To assure that the products are created exactly as agreed, we’ll employ a 3rd party inspection agency to inspect a sample if the designs before delivery so we know we’ll get what we’re expecting.

Importing Bottlenecks and Schedules: The base shapes will be shipped by sea and are therefore subject to the schedules set by the ocean liners and transportation brokers. This is a risk at both ends, the port in Vietnam as well as the port in Los Angeles. Extenuating circumstances like worker strikes or bad weather can increase the time it takes for the items to arrive.





Thank You!

story:
Joggy will easily detect burglars inside your home and will alert you immediately. It will look after your baby while you are busy, it is convenient when parking your car. Joggy will take care the of safety of your relatives when you are not near them, and will help find your lost devices.

Attach Joggy where you need it and record everything that happens home, at the office know everything about your children while they are away from home. Shoot around your car, or simply do self with friends.

Our team has developed few convenient fasteners for Joggy. So you can use it in any conditions anytime and anywhere.

To store the captured images and photos we integrated micro SD with 2, 8 and 16 GB storage. You can also connect Joggy with cloud service and sync photos and videos with it. Thats how all your photos and videos will be safe even if your Joggy is lost or broken.

We are developing perfect app for Android, iOS and windows phone platform. Joggy mobile app ™ is very simple and  understandable so even kids will be able to use it. The application has 4 modes of operation with device: Home, Children, Tracker, Car. Each of them has a specific functions.

This mode will monitor the safety of your home, or will take care of your  children while you are busy with own affairs. At the right time you will be notified of suspicious movement or noise near your home. Also, you can look after your children in Real Time mode even at distance.

This mode will allow you track your Joggy via GPS. Also, you can find your lost phone, you need just to shake Joggy for 3 seconds and your phone will ring audibly.

Install Joggy on car bumper and enable Car mode, now you are parking your car by using your mobile phone or tablet. You can also set Joggy on front glass and shoot everything that happens on the road when you're traveling with your family.

Joggy made from durable environmentally    friendly materials, completely harmless to children and conveniently fits into any interior and fit adult men, women or children. Our design team chose 2 colors for Joggy: Sky blue & Cloudy White, to emphasize a sense of calm, peace and security in the device.

All Joggy's skills, you may see in gallery or in updates



SPECIFICATIONS


FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Help! What do I do if I forget to pay for shipping?

No problem. Click the contribute now button at the top of the page and manually enter $10. It will be added to your pledge amount. Enter the same personal information you did on your initial order. We will do the matching ourselves at the end of the campaign.


I asked for my perk to be sent to the wrong address! What do I do?

We will contact all our contributors at the end of the campaign about their product choice. When we do, please respond and let us know the correct address where you would like your Joggy shipped.


Am I supposed to manually add shipping if I'm not in the US or Canada?

Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. When you pledge, manually add an additional $10 to the price of the perk you want. We will do the matching at the end of the campaign.


Help! What do I do if I forget to pay for shipping? 

The survey will be sent out 7 weeks prior to shipping and you will be able to pay then.


When are you going to ship my Joggy? 

Indiegogo isn't like Amazon or any other online store. When you contribute to Joggy you are funding all of our engineering, software, manufacturing and shipping. Everything that is needed to make a real product. Estimated national and international shipping date is October 2015.


What if i have changed shipping address since i backed your project and i need it amended?

No problem,when the survey arrives you will be able to amend and verify the shipping address then.


Do I need to add magnetic clasps perk additional to my contribution?

If you like to use Joggy anywhere and to receive maximum pleasure of use, you should add magnetic clasps perk to your contribution.


If you have additional question feel free to contact us anytime!

story:
Check Us Out In This Video Too!

ZenVirtualAssistants.com

Virtual Assistant Teams for Busy People - Finally Made Easy!


  • NO Contracts
  • Simple Monthly Plans
  • As Little As $10 Per Hour
  • An Experienced Team That Has Your Back!
Zen Virtual Assistants brings together busy Entrepreneurs, Business Owners & Executives, with Smart, Dedicated, Experienced Virtual Assistants based in the Philippines.


Why Zen Virtual Assistants?

Virtual Staffing vs Traditional Employees


I realize the power that a smart, dedicated, Virtual Assistant team brings me - and now I want to bring the power of outsourcing to other people who are passionate about making their dreams come true!

I took all the things that DO work when using Virtual Outsourcing - and fixed all the things that DON'T work.


Short Summary by Co - Founder Joel Nelson


I had finally made myself sick... literally.

As an entrepreneur & author, I was handling everything myself; content creation, phone calls, e-mails, calendar bookings, website creation and maintenance.  

I was worn down, burnt out, and Sick!

Something had to change - and Fast!

I decided to try Virtual Assistant Outsourcing to handle my work load.

I spent weeks researching, contacting, and interviewing virtual assistants from all over the world.  Finally, I hired my first Virtual Assistant from the Philippines.

Result: Disaster!

In fact, it took 20 more failed attempts at finding the right Virtual Assistant before I found Ms. Penny - a true RockStar Filipino Virtual Assistant!

My life changed overnight!

I was more productive, creative and peaceful - you might even say I was more "Zen".

An Idea Was Born ... Zen Virtual Assistants!


Our Mission

Zen Virtual Assistants brings together busy Entrepreneurs, Business Owners & Executives, with Smart, Dedicated, Experienced Virtual Assistants based in the Philippines.

  • Totally streamlined connection process

  • Totally clear pricing

  • NO contracts

  • Access to a team of 30+ experienced Virtual Assistants

  • Only pay for help when you need it!


We here at Zen Virtual Assistants are passionate about two things:

  • Helping Busy People Make Their Dreams A Reality

  • Empowering Smart Dedicated Experienced Filipino Women

Just bringing honest hardworking virtual staff in the East, together with honest hardworking people from the West.

Simple. Honest. Transparent.


Why?

In this economy, Entrepreneurs, Artist, Small Business Owners, and even working families need all the help they can get.

They also need great services AND low prices!

Traditional Staff is NOT required!

Traditional Staff is WAY MORE EXPENSIVE than simply hourly costs.


What We Need & What You Get


What We Need is for you to give us a try so you can see how we can make your life more Peaceful and Productive!

The Zen Virtual Assistant Team is already assembled - based in America & the Philippines - and we're ready to Rock & Roll on your project! Or, simply to take that busy stuff off your desk so you can be more "Zen".

Zen Virtual Assistants has a team of over 30 individually specialized and qualified team members.  This means we handle a diverse range of tasks & projects - and you don't have to compromise on quality!


What You Get - Sweet Perks Peeps!


*** You get access to our Zen Virtual Assistant Monthly Plans for 20+% Off!

~ After our IndieGoGo Launch NO ONE WILL EVER get Zen Virtual Assistant services as low as your price!

~ Lock in best prices now!


*** $50 per Referral

Want to make some easy money?  Done!

Just Refer your friends to our Campaign!

~ You will get a Referral Link to share with your friends!  Every referral that you send us, that signs up too, results in you getting a $50 Amazon Gift Card!

Yea!

Buying Free Stuff on Amazon is Awesome!


*** But That's Not All - Still More Perks For You!


~  Get a FREE COPY of our e-Book "The Complete Guide To Zen Virtual Assistants"


~  Get a FREE Consultation Skype call with our team, and we'll customize your plan just for you.

~  Be a guest on our iTunes Podcast - Zen Virtual Assistants - and promote yourself & business.




~  Get your business featured on our website FOREVER with links back to your site.


~  Get a FREE KINDLE FIRE



The Impact


Zen Virtual Assistants is passionate about seeing our clients’ dreams become a reality!  

Sometimes all it takes for a dream to become reality is a little help - Zen Virtual Assistants is here to help!

We here at Zen Virtual Assistants believe the future belongs to Entrepreneurs & Small Business owners, who know how to leverage the power of the internet and global outsourcing to make great products and services!

Zen Virtual Assistants is also passionate about empowering educated, friendly, and hardworking Filipino women.  

Giving Filipino women access to collaborate with Western Entrepreneurs, creates exciting results for both Zen Virtual Assistant team members and our clients!

Bringing diverse people and cultures together creates global community, and some really cool projects too!

We Are Ready To Rock!


Risks & Challenges

One of the clearest risks I see when working with a Virtual Assistant, is the ‘single point of failure’ syndrome for your business.

This means, that many entrepreneurs already using fantastic Virtual Staff have invested so much time and trust in one Virtual Assistant, if that Virtual Staff member leaves (illness, family illness, etc) the entrepreneur's business stops.

Overnight.  

Not Good!

Zen Virtual Assistants avoids this problem with the ‘one point of connection’ system and ‘Zen Team’.

This means, our clients have 'one point of connection' with a dedicated Zen Team Leader.  This allows for easy communication and efficiency, BUT under that single point of communication is an entire team with multiple redundancies!

Also, your Zen Team Leader is constantly building an ‘Operations Manual’ for our clients.

This means, if our clients ever decide to leave Zen Virtual Assistants, they leave with a complete ‘Operations Manual’ for their business - Social Media Account details, e-mail logins, contact lists, access to previous projects, video tutorials, etc.


    Other Ways You Can Help!


    Listen, even if you don’t have a business, you can help spread the work - and make some money too!

    Join our Zen Virtual Assistant Referral Program and make $50 per referral!

    What?! 

    What?!

    Ya! For realz.

    If you want to help empower amazingly talented Filipino Virtual Assistants AND help your entrepreneurial friends make their dreams come true - its EASY!


    Just 3 Steps!

    • Make sure you’re logged in to your IndieGoGo Account

    • Use the Social Media Share Buttons and Share with Friends, Family, Readers and your Followers!

    • Get an Amazon $50 Gift Card per Referral you send!

    IndieGoGo tracks who you have referred and who contributes to our Zen Virtual Assistant Campaign.

    If your network of friends contributes, you get a $50 Amazon Gift Card per contribution!

    Sounds like a “Win Win” situation to me!

    Please, Please, Please, help share Zen Virtual Assistants across all your social media platforms!  

    Help connect the amazing team of Zen Virtual Assistants with Entrepreneurs & Business owners!  

    Lets bring smart people together, make some dreams a reality, and grow our global community!


    Sincerely,

    Krizza, Penny, Joel & The Zen Virtual Assistant Team

story:
Hello, my name is Michelle Poirier, and I like spending all my time weaving metal. Chainmaille jewelry is my passion, and the following photos will show you the pieces I love creating the most.

I have some crazy wonderful ideas for new things to make, but they will require a lot more supplies to make as they are substantial creations.  I promise they are going to look awesome and I will have them in my Artfire and Zibbet shops this spring... if I get the money to buy materials to make them that is.

This is where you come in!

If you support my campaign by buying any of the reward tiers listed here you'll help fund my spring line of jewelry, and also get yourself some great jewelry! (or get some great jewelry for your family, or friends, or even all of you!).

I just love chainmaille and scalemail!  Despite being all metal jewelry, these pieces are very lightweight :) They are made using anodized (colored) aluminum and the color will not tarnish or fade.

There are 10 colors to choose from (you can mix colors together, or just choose one color, it's up to you!): 

A look at the earrings:  They are 2 inches long, not counting the earring hoks.  Hooks are plated iron and nickle free.  Don't worry, these earrings are very light weight!

Black
Silver
Red
Orange
Gold
Bronze
Green
Blue
Purple
Pink

If you want Rainbow or fire (or the silver/rainbow, or black/rainbow), you can just mark rainbow, fire, silver/rainbow, black/rainbow in your color choice instead of going through the trouble of writing down each color separately.

The necklaces are full of elegance and yet give you a fierce edge!

These scale slave bracelets are great for all sorts of costumes, from bellydance, to warrior and dragon costumes, to all kinds of cosplay, or even with a prom dress!

Project Goal:

$500 for supplies to make new jewelry

I love weaving metal, and with your help I can make new designs!

If I meet my goal I will be ecstatic and love you all <3

If by chance I happen to surpass my goal I will spend the money on:

-more chainmaille supplies
-pendants, charms and beads (trust me when I say they add up fast!)
-booth fees for craft fairs/conventions
-a mannequin
-photoshoot

Stretch goals:

If we surpass my goal, I will add new reward tiers :) (if you want one of these, you will have to purchase them on top of your initial pledge).

-If we reach $500 This will let me buy advertising (if no one know they exist, they won't sell!) UnLocked!

Dragon choker.  Choose silver or black choker.


-If we reach $1000. This will let me buy a life size mannequin and some jewelry displays to better photograph my work on.  Locked!

-If we reach $1500. This will let me pay for booths at craft shows and conventions.  Trust me when i say the cost adds up fast!  Locked!

If we go over that amount, I will add more reward tiers :)


Risks and challenges

Risks and challenges:

Challenges: These items will all be handcrafted by me. I have lots of experience producing and shipping my work and I've prepped for this campaign , making sure I have the time to get everything made to ensure everything is sent out in a timely manner.

I'm prepared to bring this project to reality and will keep everyone informed of my progress in a timely and transparent manner.

Shipping: if you move before your reward is sent out you will need to let me know, otherwise your reward will be mailed out to the address on file.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you like my project, please share it on your social media of choice :)  Thank you!

story:
Vescari Watch Co. is a young watch brand based in The Netherlands. Having worked in the luxury (watch)retail for several years, combined with a passion for watches Vescari Watch Co. saw the light in the summer of 2015. Vescari Watch Co. wants to provide their customers with a watch that is built with attention to detail and with high-end components. This all for an affordable price. After a couple of months designing, the prototypes/samples have been produced and tested. The only thing we need now is your support.

 

 

 

 

The Heritage Chronograph  

We would like to present our first model ‘The Heritage Chronograph’. We wanted to design a watch that looks like a high end business watch but also has the functionality of a sportive chronograph that lasts decades. To achieve this, we combined a timeless design with modern day specifications. At the heart of ‘The Heritage Chronograph’ beats a functional and reliable Mecha-Quartz movement provided by Seiko (VK63). This movement combines the reliability of quartz with the benefits of a mechanical movement. The chronograph sweeps 5 times a second and has an instant snap-back reset. The other benefit this movement has over traditional quartz movements is that it doesn’t needs battery power to reset. This improves the overall energy efficiency. At last it’s also possible to change the time when the chronograph is still running

 

 

Case  

The case of ‘The Heritage Chronograph’ is made from 316L Stainless steel and has a diameter of 41mm with a case height of 10mm. The watch measures 49mm from lug to lug and has a lug width from 22-20 mm. We also offer a color theme with a PVD rose gold plating on the case.


 

Crown  

A watch is mostly operated by its crown. There for we produced a crown that’s not only appealing to look at but also easy to use. Through its deep grooves it’s easily pulled or wind at the correct time. For the design we’ve chosen to put our V from Vescari Watch Co. on our crown.

Sapphire Crystal  

To provide the quality and reliability we stand for, it’s an obvious choice our Heritage Chronograph is equipped with a Sapphire Crystal. This type of crystal is found in the majority of the premium watches and three times harder than mineral crystal. It’s made of an extremely durable synthetic material that makes it shatterproof and scratch resistant.

Case Back  

Our case backs are engraved with our company name together with the model code depending on the color of the watch.  

• VSC-01SB Steel edition with black dial 

• VSC-01SW Steel edition with white ceramic dial 

• VSC-01RGW Rose gold edition with white ceramic dial

 

Dial  

For our watch dials we’ve chosen a timeless look. The hour index markers are printed roman numerals with a classic chronograph design at 3-6-9 hours. The second hand is positioned at 6 o’clock, the minute sub dial at 9 o’clock and the 24hour sub dial at 3 o’clock. Our watch hands are manufactured in a steel version, blue version and black version depending on the model

 

 

 

  •  Case Size - 41mm 
  •  Lug To Lug - 49mm 
  •  Case Thickness - 10mm 
  •  Lug Width – 22-20 mm 
  •  Movement - Seiko VK63 mecha-quartz hybrid 
  •  Glass: Sapphire Crystal 
  •  Hands - Hour/Minute, Chrono Hands, 24 hours/ hour and sec.  subdial. 
  •  Dial - White ceramic or Black 
  •  Strap - 22mm leather strap with croco print combined with a    butterfly folding clasp 
  •  Water Resistance - 10ATM/100m 
  •  Warranty - 24 Months

 

 

 

 

Your watch will be delivered in our signature box. Combined with the instructions and our international warranty papers.

 

 

 

 If you want to keep in touch please visit our instagram account or our facebookpage.

 

If you have any questions during the campaign. Please feel free to contact us at info@vescari.com we will be more than happy to help you.

 Thank you for your support

 Water Resistance - 10ATM/100m 
 Warranty - 24 Months

If you have any questions during the campaign. Please feel free to contact us at info@vescari.com we will be more than happy to help you.
 Thank you for your support

story:
Dick Glasses Do Good

We want to leave the world a better place than when we got here.  We are also worried that the state of the world is in need of some levity. And we want to do something about it. This is our story. Of the 3 founders, one of us is from the school of hard knocks. The other is a retired homemaker. The third holds a PhD. All of us working on this project have been touched by cancer in the lives of our loved ones. As I'm sure you have, if you're reading this.

 So, you know what? Screw cancer. We're going to have some fun, raise some awareness and save some lives.

Men Like Their Penises

Our first foray into this project started two years ago over a conversation. We started talking about a topic that most men find interesting — their penis. After some deep discussion on penal decor and follow-up research on the sex toy market, we thought our Dick Glasses would be both amusing and appealing to a large segment of population.

You know what they say. All dicks matter. So, we spent a few months researching penis shapes and sizes to ensure that our product would "fit" most penises (we determined it would fit approximately 99% of penises throughout the world). Using the findings of this research, we developed 4 frames especially designed for penises of all shapes and sizes.

4 Modern Optdicks Designs

The Moonshot

Inspired by the Beau Biden Cancer Moonshot, these original American Optdicks dick glasses are great for anywhere casual. Need to have a spiffy Malt Vinegar bottle? Or fancy up a pole downtown? Or, maybe just hanging out at the cafe with your favorite person, and a bottle of red wine.

PLUS ... these pure white glasses glow in the dark. Imagine the moonwalk you'll be having!

 

Elton Dong

Goodbye, Yellow Dick Road! Inspired by the flamboyant Elton John, you'll need these glasses if you wanna become a Rocketman. Good for glaming inside or out, American Elton Dong dick glasses will have you strutting around like a peacock. Available in flashy yellow.

 

Hairy Peter

For those wanting a little extra magic in their lives, look no further. Abracadicka and Hocus Penis, the American Optdicks Hairy Peter dick glasses will cast their spell on all those who dare fix their gaze. To maximize the mood of your latest "Giblets of Fire" or "Order of the Penis" date night, these glasses come in classic Black Magic black.

 

Blue Ribbon

In beautiful prostate cancer blue, the American Optdicks Blue Ribbon dick glasses will show your support for those around you that have been impacted by this terrible disease. Great for wine bottles, scotch, hair holders, reminders on poles outside, on your bike, on your hammer, both forearms, your dog's tail, your dog's collar, that bench in the park, your umbrella, and, oh yeah, your dick. 

"You Need To Do This"

A couple years back, we developed a prototype and one of us strapped on the pair of American Optdicks to show his wife. He shook his hips back and forth to demonstrate the security of the strap. (fyi ... it really hangs on well!)

His wife laughed and said, "You need to do this." So, we're doing it. We are saddened that his wife can't see the culmination of her encouragement. She passed away almost two years ago from breast cancer. But, that's another story.

 

What Are We Using The Funds For?

Your donations and support mean the world to us! Our intent is to raise awareness, so that's really what the funds we are raising are for.

But, specifically, the funds you kindly contribute will allow us to fulfil your orders, build up some production and inventory, do some marketing, get on Jimmy Kimmel, and really bring some awareness and laughter to the world!

We know there are like-minded people in the world who see that we all need to help one another. Even if you don't buy our product, we encourage you to tell the men in your life to get their prostate checked regularly... by a licensed physician. Early detection is key.

If all we accomplish is that one person gets themselves checked, then we’ve already won.

If we’re able to raise awareness to 100,000’s of people and sell some dick glasses in support of funding prostrate cancer research, and a bunch of people laugh their heads off ... then we’ve hit our cancer moonshot! 

Our first form frames have been designed, and we've created full 3D Autodesk models for them. We already have our first production equipment in place; a sweet KNK Force; "The first dual head plotter with a true Z axis." So, we really need help with some production costs, inventory costs and some costs related to marketing and P.R. We are asking for $20,000. Of this:

  • We will use $8000 to improve our manufacturing process and to purchase supplies in bulk. 
  • About $5000 will be used to build our digital marketing campaign
  • $5000 to help in our public relations (it's been impossible to get cancer research associations to officially lend their name to this endeavor, so we’re taking it to celebrities … stay tuned).

If we make it past our $20,000 goal

We really hope you join in making our goal a success. It would be humbling if we exceed the amount, and we can tell you that, a) we really appreciate the support and b) we'll use additional cash to raise awareness -- plain and simple. We want to get exponential awareness out there to catch that viral wave if we can.

"How Can I Help?"

There’s lots of different perk levels for you to get involved!

You can stay in touch. You can get the American Optdicks frames for yourself. We'll even help you design your own. Also, if you're in the Seattle area this summer, you can join us for our official release party. Most importantly, you'll be improving the world. We donate 10% of proceeds to organizations who support and conduct prostate cancer research. 

No matter what amount we raise, we will still fulfill all our orders for the supporters.

And, please, please, please, SHARE! The more people that see this video and this campaign, the more awareness we can drive together.

Here's the Youtube link to the video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o_KoyeX-xhM

Indiegogo has some great tools to help. Make some noise! And, save some lives.

Thanks,

The Master Glanscrafter

story:
ENGLISH

(versione italiana di seguito)

Hello!

I am Dr. Giovanni Russo and I am the CEO of Warm Wild.

I want to introduce our project: The Warm Wild under garment. Our goal was to develop the perfect sports under garment using the properties of F.I.R. (Far Infrared Rays) emitted by Bioceramic Fiber. Whatever sport you practice, at any level, in any condition, Warm Wild is the perfect sports underwear.

Bioceramic Fiber is a very particular thread able to emit F.I.R. and has been shown to have many beneficial properties which can be used to assist the body, particularly during physical activity. Bioceramic allows your body to quickly reach and keep a perfect state of thermal equilibrium by increasing vasodilation and blood microcirculation.

A number of medical studies done in Japan in the last 20 years have show that FIR can even be used as a therapy for certain diseases including cardiovascular diseases, including chronic heart failure (CHF) and peripheral artery disease (PAD). This approach is called WAON Therapy; WAON means 'Soothing Warmth'. (references can be found here)

Starting from this data I had the idea to develop a new thread/fiber made from bioceramic able to radiate FIR directly on the skin.

Unfortunately, materials and production of this underwear are expensive, we are looking for $30,000 just to start the production of the first batch of shirts.

We are a new company and your Support is fundamental to make our idea grow and became real.

With your contribution we can offer to you as a supporter a price that is considerably lower than the normal retail price.

This underwear is ideal for every endurance sport like running, biking, climbing, mountain biking, etc. but also simply walking. Warm Wild underwear is perfectly suited for difficult conditions, characterized by thermal stress, when thermoregulation is crucial like skiing, cross-country, snowboarding, hiking, diving, and skydiving.

We strongly believe in this project and we will go on developing it even if the support from you will not reach our target but of course it may cause delays and exaggerate costs for us, which is why your contribution is needed so much!

To know more about Bioceramics and FIR continue reading below or visit our website at: http://www.warmwild.com

 

Nature at the Service of Man

FIR - FAR INFRA RED RAYS are the source of energy for all living beings on earth. They lie in the spectrum of sunlight that is also absorbed by the human body and are particularly abundant in the morning sun and at sunset. FIR can penetrate the body by up to 5-7 cm and have healthy powers and beneficial effects that have been proven by many clinical studies and have been know about for more than 30 years.


How can we take advantage of these benefits?
What can we use to make these rays available when no direct solar radiation is present?
How to leverage these effects to improve sports performance?
How to exploit their thermoregulatory effect to create an innovative underwear that can improve the comfort of the wearer?

The Warm Wild project was born from these questions and addresses these challenges combining technology and innovation. The technology of bioceramic fabrics to create a new technical underwear with unique properties.

Bioceramic is a material that emits FIR naturally and can be added to textile fibers, it is composed of a mixture of non-toxic mineral oxides such as platinum, titanium, and aluminum, added to the fiber in liquid form to produce fabrics able to exploit all its properties. These fabrics are already used in some fields such as aerospace and medical. Fabrics containing bioceramic are used to cover the inside of the space shuttles to double the energy of sunlight, also astronauts wear tracksuits internally coated with bioceramic fabric.

Once in contact with the body, this kind of fabric also has the ability to reflect FIR naturally emitted by the human body increasing the global effect. Additional benefits of bioceramics are antibacterial and permanent anti-odor characteristics.

Warmwild technical underwear is made of fabrics containing fibers with different percentages of bioceramics, maintaining the characteristics of lightness, breathability, compression, and elasticity typical of fabrics used for the production of the best technical underwear, but with the added unique bioceramic properties.

Warm Wild garments come from the combination of the best existing technology coupled with the unique characteristics of Bioceramic. A technical underwear suitable for any kind of activity thanks to the ability of Bioceramic to regulate body temperature and especially effective for those activities characterized by high dynamism and carried out in very cold weather. In these conditions FIR emitted by Bioceramic allow to quickly reach and keep a perfect state of thermal equilibrium by increasing vasodilation and blood microcirculation.

The Fabric

The fabric of the WarmWild sportswear was born from the combination of bioceramic threads and the great design of a high quality fabric from these threads with features that enhance the effect. In order to obtain a unique undergarment we asked an industry leader in the textile industry with more than thirty years of experience to design a fabric with these characteristics.

This led to the creation of the fabric that we called APT®P: Always Perfect Temperature. The APT fabric is able to optimize the effect of thermoregulation of the bioceramics, allowing our athletes to wear the same shirt in cold conditions and extremely hot conditions. People who love sports and practice both summer and winter sports know that often, especially in the mountains, the weather changes very quickly. For this reason we wanted to develop a base layer that would work in every condition, in every season.

So, in addition to the laboratory tests we had a crazy idea. Certain of the quality of our product and the validity of our theories we asked a number of high-level athletes to try out our shirts and give us their testimony with their true feelings after performing their favorite sport. In their tests our shirts were worn in the snow, the summer heat, high altitudes and at sea level.

The WarmWild undershirt proven ideal in all conditions of heat, cold and warm weather. The characteristics of extreme breathability make it the ideal undershirt during exercise allowing the athlete to quickly disperse the heat and sweat. The effect of temperature control maintains the body temperature constant in the optimum range, preventing both dispersions and accumulations of heat and cold, maintaining a perfect temperature. Bioceramic also has an anti-bacterial and anti-odor effect; this, coupled with the ability to regulate he body's temperature keeps you from wearing a smelly, wet t-shirt.

WarmWild, thanks to the extreme comfort of the APT fabric is comfortable to wear, lightweight and snug, without being overly tight/compressive. These features of the APT fabric make the WarmWild undershirt the ideal piece of clothing in all seasons and weather conditions!

We have produced an undergarment with all these features and we are proud and confident that it will become a great sports ally.

Please feel free to contact the Warm Wild founders for any further information.

Also, feel free to browse some of the references of our research.

Please take a look at our website at: http://www.warmwild.it 

Also, feel free to read our testimonials given by extreme sports athletes: http://www.warmwild.it/en/testimonials 

Sizes available: S, M, L and XL

ITALIANO

HELLO!

Ciao, sono il Dr Giovanni Russo, Cardiologo, fondatore di Warwild vorrei parlarvi del mio progetto: creare un perfetto abbigliamento intimo (Underwear) sportivo sfruttando la capacità delle fibre di bioceramica di riflettere ed emettere Raggi infrarossi (FIR)

Qualunque sport tu stia praticando, a qualsiasi livello ed in ogni condizione atmosferica hai bisogno di un underwear confortevole che ti aiuti a mantenere in equilibrio la temperatura corporea.

I Raggi Infrarossi hanno innumerevoli proprietà, che possono essere sfruttate dal corpo umano, in particolare durante l’attività fisica. La bioceramica infatti ci aiuta a raggiungere velocemente un perfetto equilibrio termico, grazie ad un miglioramento della micro circolazione e ad un’aumentata vasodilatazione superficiale.

Diversi studi clinici condotti in Giappone negli ultimi 20 anni hanno visto i FIR usati come terapia in diversi disturbi del nostro corpo. Il nome di questa terapia e’ Waon Theraphy che significa calore lenitivo.

Partendo da queste informazioni ho avuto l’idea di sviluppare un nuovo tessuto con bioceramica capace di emetter FIR direttamente sulla pelle.

Noi siamo una nuova società e il tuo supporto e’ fondamentale per trasformare la nostra idea in realtà.

Questo underwear e’ ideale per tutti gli sport come running,bike,mountain bike,anche semplicemente camminare . L’underwear WarmWild e’ perfetto per condizioni più difficili caratterizzate da stress termico,quando la termoregolazione ottimale e’ fondamentale,come nello Sci, Snowboard, alpinismo, ma anche in condizioni di caldo estremo. Per maggiori informazioni consulta la sezione testimonials del nostro sito

Noi crediamo molto in questo progetto e andremo avanti a svilupparlo anche se il vostro supporto non raggiungerà il target previsto. E’ per questo che il vostro contributo e’ per noi fondamentale.

Grazie

 

LA NATURA AL SERVIZIO DELL’UOMO

I FIR - FAR INFRA RED RAY sono la fonte di energia di tutti gli esseri viventi sulla terra, corrispondono allo spettro della luce solare che viene assorbito anche dal nostro organismo. Sono particolarmente abbondanti nel sole del mattino e della sera. I FIR possono penetrare nel corpo fino a 5-7 cm e hanno poteri ed effetti salutistici dimostrati da molti studi clinici e noti da più di 50 anni.

Come sfruttare questi effetti benefici?

Cosa utilizzare per rendere questi raggi disponibili anche in assenza di radiazione solare diretta?

Come utilizzare questi effetti per migliorare le prestazioni sportive?

Come sfruttare il loro effetto termoregolatore per realizzare un underwear innovativo in grado di migliorare il comfort di  chi lo indossa?

Il progetto Warmwild nasce da queste domande e la risposta a queste sfide è il risultato della combinazione di tecnologia e innovazione. La tecnologia dei tessuti in bioceramica per realizzare un intimo tecnico con proprietà uniche.

La bioceramica è un materiale che ha la capacità di emettere naturalmente i FIR e che può essere aggiunta alle fibre tessili, è composta da una miscela di ossidi minerali atossici come platino, titanio e alluminio, che viene aggiunta alla fibra in forma liquida per realizzare tessuti in grado di sfruttarne tutte le proprietà. Questi tessuti sono già utilizzati in alcuni campi come quello aerospaziale o medico. I tessuti in bioceramica rivestono l'interno delle navette spaziali per duplicare l'energia della luce solare così come le tute che indossano gli astronauti sono rivestite all’interno con tessuto in bioceramica attiva all’infrarosso. Una volta a contatto con il corpo, il tessuto in bioceramica ha anche la capacita di riflettere i FIR che naturalmente il nostro corpo emette incrementandone l’effetto. Ulteriori vantaggi della bioceramica sono le proprietà antibatteriche ed anti-odore permanenti.

L’intimo tecnico Warmwild è realizzato con tessuti contenenti fibre con diverse percentuali di bioceramica che conferiscono ai capi le proprietà peculiari della bioceramica mantenendo le caratteristiche di leggerezza, traspirabilità, compressione ed elasticità tipici dei tessuti usati per il confezionamento del  miglior technical underwear.

I capi Warmwild sono il risultato della combinazione della miglior tecnologia esistente per la realizzazione di intimo tecnico abbinata alle caratteristiche uniche della bioceramica. Un intimo tecnico adatto ad ogni tipo di attività grazie alle proprietà termoregolatrici della bioceramica e particolarmente efficace per attività caratterizzate da alta dinamicità e svolte in condizioni di freddo intenso. In queste condizioni gli effetti di vasodilatazione e aumento del microcircolo sanguigno dei FIR emessi dalla bioceramica consentono di raggiungere in breve tempo una situazione di equilibrio termico e di mantenerla.

 

I TESSUTI

L’abbigliamento sportivo intimo Warm Wild® nasce dalla combinazione tra il filato in bioceramica e la creazione di un tessuto innovativo con caratteristiche tali da esaltarne l’effetto. Per poter ottenere un underwear tecnico unico ci siamo rivolti ad un leader di settore nel campo del tessile, con esperienza trentennale, per disegnare un tessuto con queste caratteristiche. Questo ha portato alla creazione del tessuto che abbiamo chiamato APT®: Always Perfect Temperature.

Il tessuto APT® è in grado di ottimizzare l’effetto di termoregolazione della bioceramica, consentendo ai nostri atleti di indossare la medesima maglietta sia in condizione di freddo che di caldo estremo. Chi ama lo sport infatti lo pratica sia in inverno che in estate e sa perfettamente che spesso, soprattutto in montagna, il clima cambia molto rapidamente, per tale ragione abbiamo voluto sviluppare un capo che funzionasse in ogni condizione, in ogni stagione, per ogni sport.

Quindi, oltre ai test di laboratorio, abbiamo avuto un’idea folle. Certi della validità del nostro prodotto, abbiamo chiesto ai testimonial di utilizzare le medesime magliette per svolgere i loro sport preferiti in qualunque condizione climatica, sono state quindi indossate sulla neve così come in giorni di intenso caldo estivo, sia in altura che a livello del mare.

L’intimo Warm Wild® si è dimostrato ideale in ogni condizione di caldo, di freddo o di temperatura mite. le caratteristiche di estrema traspirabilità rendono l’intimo Warm Wild® ideale durante l’attività fisica consentendo all’atleta di disperdere rapidamente il calore ed il sudore. L’effetto di termoregolazione mantiene la temperatura corporea costante nel range ottimale, impedendo nello stesso momento sia dispersioni estreme di calore in caso di freddo che accumuli di calore fastidiosi in caso di caldo. L’effetto antibatterico ed antiodore della bioceramica unito alla elevata capacità di dispersione del calore e di ottimizzazione della sudorazione attraverso la termoregolazione, consente un utilizzo costante o continuativo dei capi Warm Wild® senza il fastidioso problema del cattivo odore o della sensazione di bagnato sulla pelle. l’intimo Warm Wild® grazie all’estremo comfort del tessuto APT® risulta piacevole da indossare, leggero, comodo ed aderente senza essere eccessivamente compressivo.

Queste caratteristiche rendono il tessuto APT® e l’intimo Warm Wild® il capo di abbigliamento ideale in ogni stagione e condizione climatica con un notevole risparmio sui costi di abbigliamento complessivo.

Abbiamo prodotto un capo intimo, con tutte queste caratteristiche orgogliosi e convinti che possa diventare il vostro miglior alleato per lo sport.


per ogni ulteriore informazioni  contacta i fondatori di Warm Wild 

Lascia pure i tuoi commenti sul nostro progetto utilizzando il seguente link references of our research.

visita il nostro sito nella  http://www.warmwild.it scegliendo la lingua tra italiano ed inglese

qui puoi trovare le testimonianze dei nostro testimonials, tutti atleti di sport estremi: http://www.warmwild.it/en/testimonials

story_txt:
ENGLISH
(versione italiana di seguito)

Hello!I am Dr. Giovanni Russo and I am the CEO of Warm Wild.
I want to introduce our project: The Warm Wild under garment. Our goal was to develop the perfect sports under garment using the properties of F.I.R. (Far Infrared Rays) emitted by Bioceramic Fiber. Whatever sport you practice, at any level, in any condition, Warm Wild is the perfect sports underwear.



Bioceramic Fiber is a very particular thread able to emit F.I.R. and has been shown to have many beneficial properties which can be used to assist the body, particularly during physical activity. Bioceramic allows your body to quickly reach and keep a perfect state of thermal equilibrium by increasing vasodilation and blood microcirculation.

A number of medical studies done in Japan in the last 20 years have show that FIR can even be used as a therapy for certain diseases including cardiovascular diseases, including chronic heart failure (CHF) and peripheral artery disease (PAD). This approach is called WAON Therapy; WAON means 'Soothing Warmth'. (references can be found here)
Starting from this data I had the idea to develop a new thread/fiber made from bioceramic able to radiate FIR directly on the skin.
Unfortunately, materials and production of this underwear are expensive, we are looking for $30,000 just to start the production of the first batch of shirts.
We are a new company and your Support is fundamental to make our idea grow and became real.
With your contribution we can offer to you as a supporter a price that is considerably lower than the normal retail price.



This underwear is ideal for every endurance sport like running, biking, climbing, mountain biking, etc. but also simply walking. Warm Wild underwear is perfectly suited for difficult conditions, characterized by thermal stress, when thermoregulation is crucial like skiing, cross-country, snowboarding, hiking, diving, and skydiving.
We strongly believe in this project and we will go on developing it even if the support from you will not reach our target but of course it may cause delays and exaggerate costs for us, which is why your contribution is needed so much!
To know more about Bioceramics and FIR continue reading below or visit our website at: http://www.warmwild.com
 
Nature at the Service of Man


FIR - FAR INFRA RED RAYS are the source of energy for all living beings on earth. They lie in the spectrum of sunlight that is also absorbed by the human body and are particularly abundant in the morning sun and at sunset. FIR can penetrate the body by up to 5-7 cm and have healthy powers and beneficial effects that have been proven by many clinical studies and have been know about for more than 30 years.
 How can we take advantage of these benefits? What can we use to make these rays available when no direct solar radiation is present? How to leverage these effects to improve sports performance? How to exploit their thermoregulatory effect to create an innovative underwear that can improve the comfort of the wearer?
The Warm Wild project was born from these questions and addresses these challenges combining technology and innovation. The technology of bioceramic fabrics to create a new technical underwear with unique properties.
 Bioceramic is a material that emits FIR naturally and can be added to textile fibers, it is composed of a mixture of non-toxic mineral oxides such as platinum, titanium, and aluminum, added to the fiber in liquid form to produce fabrics able to exploit all its properties. These fabrics are already used in some fields such as aerospace and medical. Fabrics containing bioceramic are used to cover the inside of the space shuttles to double the energy of sunlight, also astronauts wear tracksuits internally coated with bioceramic fabric.
Once in contact with the body, this kind of fabric also has the ability to reflect FIR naturally emitted by the human body increasing the global effect. Additional benefits of bioceramics are antibacterial and permanent anti-odor characteristics.
 Warmwild technical underwear is made of fabrics containing fibers with different percentages of bioceramics, maintaining the characteristics of lightness, breathability, compression, and elasticity typical of fabrics used for the production of the best technical underwear, but with the added unique bioceramic properties.
 Warm Wild garments come from the combination of the best existing technology coupled with the unique characteristics of Bioceramic. A technical underwear suitable for any kind of activity thanks to the ability of Bioceramic to regulate body temperature and especially effective for those activities characterized by high dynamism and carried out in very cold weather. In these conditions FIR emitted by Bioceramic allow to quickly reach and keep a perfect state of thermal equilibrium by increasing vasodilation and blood microcirculation.
The Fabric

The fabric of the WarmWild sportswear was born from the combination of bioceramic threads and the great design of a high quality fabric from these threads with features that enhance the effect. In order to obtain a unique undergarment we asked an industry leader in the textile industry with more than thirty years of experience to design a fabric with these characteristics.
This led to the creation of the fabric that we called APT®P: Always Perfect Temperature. The APT fabric is able to optimize the effect of thermoregulation of the bioceramics, allowing our athletes to wear the same shirt in cold conditions and extremely hot conditions. People who love sports and practice both summer and winter sports know that often, especially in the mountains, the weather changes very quickly. For this reason we wanted to develop a base layer that would work in every condition, in every season.
So, in addition to the laboratory tests we had a crazy idea. Certain of the quality of our product and the validity of our theories we asked a number of high-level athletes to try out our shirts and give us their testimony with their true feelings after performing their favorite sport. In their tests our shirts were worn in the snow, the summer heat, high altitudes and at sea level.
The WarmWild undershirt proven ideal in all conditions of heat, cold and warm weather. The characteristics of extreme breathability make it the ideal undershirt during exercise allowing the athlete to quickly disperse the heat and sweat. The effect of temperature control maintains the body temperature constant in the optimum range, preventing both dispersions and accumulations of heat and cold, maintaining a perfect temperature. Bioceramic also has an anti-bacterial and anti-odor effect; this, coupled with the ability to regulate he body's temperature keeps you from wearing a smelly, wet t-shirt.
WarmWild, thanks to the extreme comfort of the APT fabric is comfortable to wear, lightweight and snug, without being overly tight/compressive. These features of the APT fabric make the WarmWild undershirt the ideal piece of clothing in all seasons and weather conditions!
We have produced an undergarment with all these features and we are proud and confident that it will become a great sports ally.
Please feel free to contact the Warm Wild founders for any further information.
Also, feel free to browse some of the references of our research.

Please take a look at our website at: http://www.warmwild.it 
Also, feel free to read our testimonials given by extreme sports athletes: http://www.warmwild.it/en/testimonials 
Sizes available: S, M, L and XL
If your chosen perk includes a shirt, please specify SIZE and ADDRESS!

story:
My name is Claire Vidal and I launched Red Carpet 3 years ago in France. My idea was very simple: why do woman need to suffer in high heels? And why do you have to use ugly comfort insoles in your gorgeous Louboutin?

Here is my story... The idea actually came at Paris airport when coming back from a business trip when I had to remove my shoes. I was at the time in the automotive industry, in charge of organizing trade shows around the world. I was using insoles to relieve the pain to wear high heels for days. Of course I was not happy with any of the products I had tested and decided someone had to think about a solution and something better than just gel pads that become yellow and make you feel embarrassed when you remove your shoes at the airport ;-) 

That was it, I invented the Red Carpet insole!!

The insole of my dream was finalized in 2010 after long research and prototypes, and is a unique combination of style and design of insole with the comfort of orthopedic materials that provide a special support at the ball of the feet.

 About the Red Carpet Insoles

The Red Carpets are luxury insoles with high-end details, they come in leather or in beautiful fabrics, becoming a new shoe accessory.

They are specially designed to offer support at the ball of the feet, where it hurts the most in high heels. Their design is composed of two cushions made of superior shock absorber material, one at the ball of the foot and one under the heel for improved comfort. The material is antibacterial and the shape of the Red Carpet suits most shapes of shoes. Underneath, Red Carpet insoles are equipped with a gripping system adaptable to all heels heights so that the insole cannot move in the shoe: it can therefore be used in all your shoes!

Red Carpet insoles come in three models: full insoles, open-toe insoles, and half insoles. They are available in 15 different colors and patterns. Look how beautiful they look!

                            

The packaging is the brand expression.  I made sure your insoles come in a beautiful box that you can re-use afterwards to store them in your shoe dressing.

 Made in France

I produce in France, because I believe the quality of my product has to be unrivaled. I want a perfect result in the stitching, I only select leathers of the highest quality. Every detail matters, and each insole is an unique creation.

I also work with qualified and passionate craftsmen that take part in writing Red Carpet’s story every day. 

  Now, I need YOU

After two successful years in launching the product in France, I am up for a new challenge:  I need to finance my growth and want to expand the range to even more innovative products! I want women to feel beautiful and comfortable in their stilettos, and feel like stars on the Red Carpet.

I need your support to finance this new step and help me get my product to all women. 

Your contribution will help me :

- attending international trade shows to present the product, and get some exposure to find distributors for Red Carpet

- investing in new products development.

- Invest in my production so that I can be competitive on international markets

 Your perks :-)

Your support is very valuable to me, I want to share this great adventure with you by giving you the opportunity to support my start-up. 

 I have prepared really glamourous rewards for those who will contribute.

For example:

- "Red Carpet loves you" stickers, shoe bags..etc

- Free pairs of the "Red Carpet loves you" limited edition (full or open-toe insoles with a specific logo)

- Your initials on our best seller Red insole, in gold 22 carats, just like a red carpet celebrity! 

- One year of Red Carpet!

- Meet and greet day to say thank you or a shopping day in Paris! 

 Other Ways You Can Help...

Well, if you can't contribute, please spread the word around you! It's very important to drive the brand awareness!  My web site is www.redcarpet-paris.com. 

Maybe you know the buyers of some very famous department stores who would pick up my product? Of a renowned journalist who could help me spread the word about my product?

I am counting on you to help me !

 Share our project, like and follow us!
story_txt:
My name is Claire Vidal and I launched Red Carpet 3 years ago in France. My idea was very simple: why do woman need to suffer in high heels? And why do you have to use ugly comfort insoles in your gorgeous Louboutin?
Here is my story... The idea actually came at Paris airport when coming back from a business trip when I had to remove my shoes. I was at the time in the automotive industry, in charge of organizing trade shows around the world. I was using insoles to relieve the pain to wear high heels for days. Of course I was not happy with any of the products I had tested and decided someone had to think about a solution and something
better than just gel pads that become yellow and make you feel embarrassed when
you remove your shoes at the airport ;-) 
That was it, I invented the Red Carpet
insole!!
The insole of my dream was finalized in 2010 after
long research and prototypes, and is a unique combination of style and design
of insole with the comfort of orthopedic materials that provide a special
support at the ball of the feet.











 About the Red Carpet Insoles

The Red Carpets are luxury insoles with high-end
details, they come in leather or in beautiful fabrics, becoming a new shoe
accessory.
They are specially designed to offer support at the ball of the
feet, where it hurts the most in high heels. Their design is composed of two
cushions made of superior shock absorber material, one at the ball of the foot
and one under the heel for improved comfort. The material is antibacterial and
the shape of the Red Carpet suits most shapes of shoes. Underneath, Red Carpet
insoles are equipped with a gripping system adaptable to all heels heights so
that the insole cannot move in the shoe: it can therefore be used in all your shoes!



Red Carpet insoles come in three models: full insoles,
open-toe insoles, and half insoles. They are available in 15 different colors and patterns. Look how beautiful they look!





                            

The packaging is the brand expression.  I made sure your insoles come in a beautiful box that you can re-use afterwards to store them in your shoe dressing.


 Made in France

I produce
in France, because I believe the quality of my product has to be unrivaled. I
want a perfect result in the stitching, I only select leathers of the highest
quality. Every detail matters, and each insole is an unique creation.
I also work with qualified and passionate craftsmen that take part in writing Red Carpet’s story every day. 





  Now, I need YOU
After two successful years in launching the product in France, I am up for a new challenge:  I need to finance my growth and want to expand the range to even more innovative products! I want women to feel beautiful and comfortable in their stilettos, and feel like stars on the Red Carpet.
I need your support to finance this new step and help me get my product to all women. 
Your contribution will help me :
- attending international trade shows to present the product, and get some exposure to find distributors for Red Carpet
- investing in new products development.
- Invest in my production so that I can be competitive on international markets



 Your perks :-)
Your support is very valuable to me, I want to share this great adventure with you by giving you the opportunity to support my start-up. 
 I have prepared really glamourous rewards for those who will contribute.
For example:
- "Red Carpet loves you" stickers, shoe bags..etc
- Free pairs of the "Red Carpet loves you" limited edition (full or open-toe insoles with a specific logo)
- Your initials on our best seller Red insole, in gold 22 carats, just like a red carpet celebrity! 
- One year of Red Carpet!
- Meet and greet day to say thank you or a shopping day in Paris! 










 Other Ways You Can Help...
Well, if you can't contribute, please spread the word around you! It's very important to drive the brand awareness!  My web site is www.redcarpet-paris.com. 

Maybe you know the buyers of some very famous department stores who would pick up my product? Of a renowned journalist who could help me spread the word about my product?
I am counting on you to help me !

 Share our project, like and follow us!

story:
Deutschsprachige Version siehe updates!

First of all: You will receive your preordered perks even if we do not reach our main goal!

MEET WAKAKAI

wakakai is the first hoop earring for flesh tunnels that fits your stretched lobes no matter what size they are (3 g / 4 mm and up)! And that's not all: It has an invisible closure so you don't have to worry about it showing up outside your flesh tunnels.

Up until now we are offering our wakakai hoop earrings in acrylic glass in lots of beautiful colors and in birch wood. But these materials unfortunately are too brittle for much else than the classic round shape and close variations of it, so we needed to find a solution.

After five months of intensive prototyping, we have finally arrived at beautiful working models of hoop earrings made of a special, very durable kind of steel ready to be produced. 

With the new material and new production method we can now manufacture not only the classic design but also exciting shapes like hearts and stars, much more delicate designs with cut outs and lots more. Also, the new version can be brushed, coated or gold plated. 

You can even combine different designs, materials and sizes if you like!

CLASSIC DESIGN: HIGH GLOSS POLISHED & GOLD PLATED

CLASSIC DESIGN: HIGH GLOSS POLISHED XL & M


CLASSIC DESIGN: HIGH GLOSS POLISHED XL & S

LEFT: HIGH GLOSS POLISHED XL & ACRYLIC BLACK M 
RIGHT: HIGH GLOSS POLISHED S & ACRYLIC BLACK L

HOW DO THEY WORK?

wakakai hoop earrings are designed with an invisible closure: To open them you just bend them open sideways and put them in your lobes or flesh tunnels. After you let go of the closure it simply snaps back to its closed position on its own:

See? It's that simple!

THE CHALLENGE

While the new production method has a lot of advantages regarding design and durability, we cannot manufacture them in small batches on demand as we do with the acrylic and birch wood hoop earrings. To be able to offer the new hoop earrings for a reasonable price we need to manufacture bigger quantities in advance. Since wakakai was only founded in March this year this is still a huge investment and risk for us.
That's why we need your help to bring the new wakakai hoop earrings to life!

YOU CAN MAKE IT HAPPEN

With your support we can offer you wakakai hoop earrings at a reasonable price in the quality you deserve. So choose your favorite perk and help us fund the tooling and manufacturing!

GOALS & RISKS

We chose flexible funding for this campaign because we believe that together we can make these hoop earrings happen!

Flexible funding means that we will receive any funds your raise, regardless if we reach our main goal of € 9.000,-

That also means: 

You will receive your preordered perks even if we do not reach our main goal!

Depending on our funding here on indiegogo we will first manufacture our classic design in sizes small to extra large. If we reach our final goal of € 9.000,- we will also manufacture the winning design of our contest on Facebook: www.fb.com/wakakai

[img src="http://d2oadd98wnjs7n.cloudfront.net/file_attac...">

There might be some more available but we will not be able to add them to our product line permanently.

PERKS

PRODUCTION SCHEDULE

According to the demand here at Indiegogo, we will directly move to manufacturing and delivery.

After the end of the campaign we will ask you to fill out a short questionnaire so you can tell us which design you've chosen and where you want your perks shipped to. 

Starting at the End of November we will ship out your perks so you'll have your hoop earrings before Christmas. :)

COMMENTS, QUESTIONS, PRESS ENQUIRIES

For supporters please directly comment or ask on the comment thread. 

For any other enquiries: info@wakakai.de

story:
What we are doing

We are a young Canadian family company committed in creating stylish footwear that is eco & animal friendly.  Reusing over recycling, walking over driving short distances, eating organics and being vegans are just a few of the things we do at Colourful Grass.  We also organize Veggie BBQ in the theme "Earth Day" to spread vegan ideas. Although we are all those things and more, Colourful Grass is about planting a different kind of seed.  

 
 

 

Colourful Grass shoes are comfortable, affordable and stylish. 

2012 Premier Collection:
 
    
 
        Brigid - Bumblebee               Brigid - Earth          
 
      *Brigid also available in Black colour. We will update the picture soon.
 
          Doris - Rose                       Doris - Chestnut              Catherine - Redish 
 
*Heart shape coconut button will apply to Doris Chestnut, please refer to Doris Rose)             
             
 

Existing Styles 2011 (If you see anything you really like, let us know):

 

The above footwear will also be available in multiple colors and we will do our best to post more pictures as we go along. Our shoes are made with Hemp Canvas, Organic cotton, PU, Recycled rubber and even coconut shell buttons to create style. 

Our footwear is available for both men (sizes 7-12) & women (sizes 5 -11) 

They Spoke & We listened

We spent close to 2 years talking to the consumers even before the beginning stages of product development. We asked people like you and me what they like in a cute pair of shoes, why and, what they would like to see in a pair of eco friendly shoe. They asked for vegan shoes, recycled soles, fashion shoes beyond sandals, eco shoes that are stylish and have a metropolitan style and most of all comfortable eco shoes that can be dresses up and/or worn with casually! The feedback we received was the fuel in the development & creation of Colourful Grass.

In that short period of time, we have gained close to 10,000 followers on Twitter and over 400 fans on Facebook. We have been featured in various publications, blogs, mailed shoes to celebs and had TV interviews. These are just the beginnings…

"We believe that the quality of our life is made from all the small decisions that we make every day..."   by T.O.F.U. Magazine

"Colourful Grass designs shoes that reduce your carbon footprint without emptying your pocket."   by Vista magazine

"...Miller took the shoes to Emmy and Academy Award show suites that focused on ecoproducts. Actors from television shows such as Heroes and General Hospital browsed her wares and some posed for photos..."  by Times Colonist

"...setting a standard for sustainable product development in regards to environment and humanitarian leadership...The company's standards are the highest in the industry..."   by Vancouver Business

 

Your contribution

With the help of Indiegogo and people like you, we’ll be able to bring to market a full collection of Colourful Grass footwear. Your contribution will be part of Colourful Grass official launch. We will be able to manufacturer the shoes, print necessary marketing tools for the selling of the footwear such as Point of sale display, mini catalogues, order forms and, ship our shoes to boutiques across Canada, USA and, international markets.

The Rewards

We are offering some great rewards for our supporters, and we hope you’ll give us the opportunity to return the generosity to you. Our shoes retail between $40(sandals) to $80(shoes) and we decided to offer you the privilege of getting one of these cute shoes at ½ the costs and let you be the first ones to get your feet in our Premier 2012 collection. We can’t do this without you, so if you connect with our mission, please help us by sharing and spreading the word.

Colourful Grass Special Edition T-shirt:

PS: If you really like some of our original styles, you can request to have the above replaced with those if we do have in stock. Email us at: contact@colourfulgrass.com for further confirmation.

The NEW styles will be ready to ship by mid to end of May 2012. 

(On the right hand side, you will find a Rewards column with more information.)

 

Why Colourful Grass

Born with a strong love for the animals to travelling the world to beautiful sandy beaches with clear waters, to eating fresh food from local farms, going on a nice hike through the mountains, and hanging out at the park with our dog are just a few of the many things that are the “why” behind the development of Colourful Grass. How devastating would it be to go outside and not be able to breathe fresh air or go to the park and barely be able to touch & feel the grass due to the amount of garbage pollution and/or to not be able to receive clean drinking water and fresh food? Having a little one, I can’t imagine what it would be like to know that I could have made a difference today so that our children of tomorrow can enjoy and share the same things we do today.   Nature is part of us and who we are as individuals. It is our duty to protect all its living things on it and, take responsibility today. Any contribution & support you offer Colourful Grass will go a long way and we thank you in advance.

(make sure you watch our video for statistics and information on why our shoes are animal  & eco friendly)

Dan, Angele, Anabelle & Jacob

Share our Story

We love to stay connected and share our passion with as many people as we can.

We tweet at @colourfulgrass.

We are now getting pretty active with our facebook fan page http://www.facebook.com/colourfulgrassshoes .  Sharing the link with friends and family is also a huge help.

Our blog is brand new with us and we are pretty excited so make sure to subscribe to our blog http://colourfulgrassshoes.wordpress.com/  and stay in the loop of what are in the happenings at Colourful Grass!

We’ll be announcing the lucky winner of our Indiegogo campaign giveaway of a Colourful Grass pair of shoe on our facebook page, blog and twitter page so make sure you follow us.

Visit our website www.colourfulgrass.com to learn more about us and we welcome any questions and feedback to: contact@colourfulgrass.com

A note to our Indiegogo Supporters

If we could ship for free, we would. But we’re not quite there yet!

If you are within Canada; add $10 shipping fee

If you are within the USA; add $15 shipping fee

If you are outside of Canada and the USA; please contact us for a shipping quote. We will keep our shipping rates as affordable as possible.

We want to make sure that we offer everybody the opportunity to support us and get your pair of Colourful Grass 2012 Premier Collection. 

The more seeds with can initiate, the better.

 

Thank you for your support from the Colourful Grass family!
