story:
Cute as a Bug seeks an independent distributor

If you want to develop a career on your own, just let us help you make it!

Cute as a Bug, a solid company, is looking for people with passion and drive for sales.

This is an opportunity to shine and be your own boss. You only need our

platform, products and training, plus your winning spirit.

Contact us now !! Check out our Reseller Kit Reward!


Every girl loves Hairbows! They are the “cherry on top” for a girl´s outfit. Cute as a Bug offers a complete collection of hairbows that includes big bows, medium bows, small bows, classic, for school, for cheerleading, for birthday parties, for formal occasions or just for fun and play! A girl´s hairbows always give that extra “oomph” any look needs to look beautiful and put together.

Cute as a Bug´s “Cutest Hairbow Club” offers great quality hairbows, at a great price, and deliver them to your front door!

“This is the best way to own a complete collection of hairbows, all shapes, colors and sizes at an incredible price!”



Month by month your kids will be Oh so excited to receive a premium gift box with 3 or 4 hairbows, each different in color and size, for the term of your choosing. You can upgrade, downgrade or sidegrade any time you want! You can even choose the “Baby Box” o the “Girl Box” and receive as many hairbow surprises as you want, with just the push of a button! It is simple, fun and affordable!

"Different hard boxes everytime!"

"Your 3 hairbow month subscription will look like this!"

“This is the cutest hairbow club ever!”

Since beauty is not the most important thing in a girl´s life, Cute as a Bug Boxes will include an empowering message for your young girl, inspirational quotes and cool games for the little ones.  It can even be reused for other “girl stuff”.  Girls can learn to be strong, family oriented, compassionate and unique, as well as beautiful. 

"It is the complete collection of hairbows every girl wants!

     "Big Hairbows"                                                 "Medium Hairbows"

  "Small Hairbows"                                                  "Mini Hairbows"

   "Hard Headbands"                                                "Soft Headbands"


  "For School"                                                             "For Play"

   "Formal Occasions"                                             "Just for FUN!"

All this excitement month by month delivered right to your front door! Your girls will have something to look forward to!


Cute as a Bug TM has been in the market for more than 12 years, manufacturing and designing more than 100 different styles for different brands around the globe.

 We have a team of designers, looking out for the biggest trends in fashion and color combinations, always having the same classic look, that our brand stands for. 

"We have beautiful designs made with the best quality ribbon, prints and fabrics. "

Cute as a Bug TM has been featured in various magazines, kids fashion shows and trading platforms around the globe mentioning our outstanding job in manufacturing quality and fashionable hair accessories for young girls. 

"For the Kleine Fabriek trading fair, we are currently presenting kids brand Cute as a Bug, an exclusive assortment of babies, toddlers and girls’ handmade hair accessories, made with the finest ribbons and embellishments."

"We support the work of talented and inspired artists, exposing their creations made by their gifted hands and brilliant ideas. We offer products that show the richness of creativity and the beautifulness of a trendy item."


Back this Project and choose your reward.

We will hand pick 3-4 different hairbows according to season and send you a monthly Cute as a Bug BOX .


You can choose if you want the 1 month, 3 month, 6 month or 1 year subscription and we will send you each time a different Cute as a Bug Box with different hairbows in it. Soon your girl can own a beautiful complete collection of premium quality and fashionable hairbows!

We will even add a special season design for FREE! Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, Easter…!

"Free shipping month to month!"

This is what your monthly subscription will look like:


Become a Member and join our Cutest Hairbow Club!


We have been in the hairbow manufacturing business for quite a while and decided to use Indiegogo to get our products directly to you in a fun, easy and different way.

 

So far we have received a positive response from potential members and we are ready to start manufacturing and designing our complete hairbow collection for you. We will make sure you get your membership Cute as a Bug Boxes on time and ensure you will receive the highest quality hairbows and accessories in the market.

The money we raise in this campaign will be used to buy large quantities of premium ribbon and other materials used in our designs at wholesale prices so we can give you the best quality and price. We will rent an office and distribution space so we can ensure you will receive your membership boxes on time month by month. 


Different premium hard boxes will be produced, brand apps and games will be launched and our staff will start to work ASAP on order management software to make this business efficient and convenient for you.  


"100 Ladybugs" 

Every hairbow is handmade using the best quality materials by "100" women that work at our small workshop and some of them work from home. We employ and train women who have the skills and the desire to make beautiful products and help their family with an extra income. 


Satisfaction Guaranteed, if you have any issue with a product we will fix it and send you a new one. We are all into helping our customers enjoy their membership as much as possible.

We have full capacity to get your orders on time and with great quality. 

Join our Cutest Hairbow Club and become one of its first members!

"It´s simple, fun, and affordable!"


Risks & Challenges

We've been in the market for over 12 years,  and we've got a great deal of experience on manufacturing hairbows and fulfill lots of orders for them.

We also have the experience of dealing with completely unexpected issues, and we always try to leave every client happy with their purchase. You can be sure that if any challenges come up, we will handle them with care and honesty. 

As we've been working with our designers and manufacturers for several years now, we are confident that we can deliver your subscriptions on time. We are specialized in wholesale and can fulfill big orders with no problems.

That being said, there could be unforeseen issues that we will gladly solve ASAP so you can get what you paid for.  

Join our Cutest Hairbow Club by choosing any reward you like, or simply share with your friends and family! 

Free shipping only in the U.S.

Use the Indiegogo share tools to help us!
story_txt:
Cute as
a Bug seeks an independent distributor
If you
want to develop a career on your own, just let us help you make it! 
Cute as
a Bug, a solid company, is looking for people with passion and drive for sales.

This is
an opportunity to shine and be your own boss. You only need our
platform,
products and training, plus your winning spirit.
Contact
us now !! Check out our Reseller Kit Reward!

Every girl loves Hairbows! They are the “cherry on top” for a
girl´s outfit. Cute as a Bug offers a complete collection of hairbows that includes big bows, medium bows,
small bows, classic, for school, for cheerleading, for birthday parties, for
formal occasions or just for fun and play! A girl´s hairbows always give that
extra “oomph” any look needs to look beautiful and put together.
Cute as a
Bug´s “Cutest Hairbow Club” offers great quality hairbows, at a great price,
and deliver them to your front door!
“This is the best way to own a complete
collection of hairbows, all shapes, colors and sizes at an incredible price!” 





Month by
month your kids will be Oh so excited to receive a premium gift box with 3 or 4
hairbows, each different in color and size, for the term of your choosing. You
can upgrade, downgrade or sidegrade any time you want! You can even choose the
“Baby Box” o the “Girl Box” and receive as many hairbow surprises as you want,
with just the push of a button! It is simple, fun and affordable!

"Different hard boxes everytime!"
"Your 3 hairbow month subscription will look like this!"

“This is the cutest hairbow club ever!”
Since beauty is not the most important thing in a girl´s life, Cute
as a Bug Boxes will include an empowering message for your young girl,
inspirational quotes and cool games for the little ones.  It can even be reused for other “girl stuff”.  Girls can learn to be strong, family oriented, compassionate and unique, as well as beautiful. 




"It is the complete collection of hairbows every girl wants!






     "Big Hairbows"                                                 "Medium Hairbows"
  "Small Hairbows"                                                  "Mini Hairbows"

   "Hard Headbands"                                                "Soft Headbands"
  "For School"                                                             "For Play"
   "Formal Occasions"                                             "Just for FUN!"All this excitement month by month delivered right to your front door! Your girls will have something to look forward to!

Cute as a
Bug TM has been in the market for more than 12 years, manufacturing and designing
more than 100 different styles for different brands around the globe.


 We have a team of designers, looking out for the biggest trends in fashion and color combinations, always having the same classic look, that our brand stands for. 



"We have beautiful designs made with the best quality ribbon, prints and fabrics. "

Cute as a Bug TM has been featured in various magazines, kids fashion shows and trading platforms around the globe mentioning our outstanding job in manufacturing quality and fashionable hair accessories for young girls. 


"For the Kleine Fabriek trading fair, we are currently presenting kids brand Cute as a Bug, an exclusive assortment of babies, toddlers and girls’ handmade hair accessories, made with the finest ribbons and embellishments."

"We support the work of talented and inspired artists, exposing their creations made by their gifted hands and brilliant ideas. We offer products that show the richness of creativity and the beautifulness of a trendy item."





Back this
Project and choose your reward.
We will
hand pick 3-4 different hairbows according to season and send you a monthly
Cute as a Bug BOX .



You can
choose if you want the 1 month, 3 month, 6 month or 1 year subscription and we
will send you each time a different Cute as a Bug Box with different hairbows
in it. Soon your girl can own a beautiful complete collection of premium
quality and fashionable hairbows!


We will
even add a special season design for FREE! Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas,
Easter…!

"Free shipping month to month!"

This is what your monthly subscription will look like:




Become a
Member and join our Cutest Hairbow Club!



We have
been in the hairbow manufacturing business for quite a while and decided to use
Indiegogo to get our products directly to you in a fun, easy and different way.

 


So far we
have received a positive response from potential members and we are ready to
start manufacturing and designing our complete hairbow collection for you. We
will make sure you get your membership Cute as a Bug Boxes on time and ensure
you will receive the highest quality hairbows and accessories in the market. 


The money we raise in this campaign will be used to buy large quantities of premium ribbon and other materials used in our designs at wholesale prices so we can give you the best quality and price. We will rent an office and distribution space so we can ensure you will receive your membership boxes on time month by month. 



Different premium hard boxes will be produced, brand apps and games will be launched and our staff will start to work ASAP on order management software to make this business efficient and convenient for you.  


















"100 Ladybugs" 
Every hairbow is handmade using the best quality materials by "100" women that work at our small workshop and some of them work from home. We employ and train women who have the skills and the desire to make beautiful products and help their family with an extra income. 



Satisfaction Guaranteed, if you have any issue with a product we will fix it and send you a new one. We are all into helping our customers enjoy their membership as much as possible.We have full capacity to get your orders on time and with great quality. Join our Cutest Hairbow Club and become one of its first members!"It´s simple, fun, and affordable!"Risks &
ChallengesWe've been in the market for over 12 years,  and we've got a great deal of experience on manufacturing hairbows and fulfill lots of orders for them.We also have the experience of dealing with completely unexpected issues, and we always try to leave every client happy with their purchase. You can be sure that if any challenges come up, we will handle them with care and honesty. As we've been working with our designers and manufacturers for several years now, we are confident that we can deliver your subscriptions on time. We are specialized in wholesale and can fulfill big orders with no problems.That being said, there could be unforeseen issues that we will gladly solve ASAP so you can get what you paid for.  Join our Cutest Hairbow Club by choosing any reward you like, or simply share with your friends and family! Free shipping only in the U.S.

story:
Revolutionize how you accessorize your wardrobe 


Of all the button down short or long sleeve shirts you have in your closet, how many of them have button cuffs? Many if not most! 

Of these shirts, how many of them can you accessorize with cufflink's? None... until today that is!



Anycuff  is the answer to wearing cufflink's on any button cuff shirt.

To date, the cufflink market has been limited: Traditionally, cufflink's have only been wearable on French cuff shirts. Now, everyone has the option to wear cufflinks on any of their shirts with button cuffs, no french cuff required

Imagine a world where anyone had the choice of wearing either traditional cufflink's with their french cuff shirts or the Anycuff with their button-cuff shirts. What a wonderful world it would be!

Anycuff enables you to have that choice to accessorize and dress up your existing wardrobe in a whole new way, on any day for any occasion. Plus, you can wear them in two different configurations.




__________________________________________________





__________________________________________________





French Cuff



Barrel Cuff










1. A unique patented cufflink to use on any button cuff shirt. Why should cufflink's be limited to just french cuff shirts? Now you can enjoy a decorated sleeve for any occasion! These are perfect for guys and girls, from formal to business to casual and everything in between.

 2. Made from chrome plated brass, built to look great and built to last.
Brass is very durable and the chrome plating will never tarnish. We have created these anycuff links to be enjoyed for a long time.

3. Built with an N52 magnet, the strongest magnet out there. The strongest magnet was searched for high and low by testing all sorts of different kinds and grades and the winner was....drum roll please....the N52! It's super strong and creates a magnetic attraction that makes the Anycuff product possible.

4. Fun and fashionable designs. An exclusive introductory collection was created just for the Indiegogo community. Five different colors were used to showcase a spectrum from classic to vibrant. Which one is your favorite? This campaign will open the door to new designs and the opportunity to work with innovative materials, sports team logos, custom shapes, the sky is the limit!


The funds raised from the Indiegogo campaign will allow for the production of the Anycuff line on a large scale. The limited edition designs for the Anycuff will be made only for Indiegogo participants and we will also use some of the proceeds to develop new designs over the coming months. The designs, tooling, packaging design as well as relationships with established manufacturers and warehousing and distribution expert have already been developed. We are very excited to present the Anycuff to the Indiegogo community and your pledges will help us bring it to market.


So why support the indiegogo anycuff project?

  • You will be the very first to get your hands on the anycuff. 
  • Fashion is important to you and the anycuff allows you to revolutionize how you accessorize your existing wardrobe.
  • You've never had the ease of mind of wearing cufflinks in a busy lifestyle where rolling your sleeves up and down is a regular thing and removing traditional cufflinks may be a hassle. 

  

We  have a very strong relationship with the manufacturer whom has well over 8 years of cufflink manufacturing experience. The Anycuff is patented, molds are finished, and packaging is secured. At most, a one month production period is expected once the Anycuff Indiegogo campaign is completed. We feel confident in our relationships with the manufacturers and our ability to deliver on time. 


How well do the cufflink's stay together on the cuff throughout the day?

  • Quite well. We made sure to choose the strongest magnets available to ensure a strong long-lasting bond. Of course as you would expect, because they’re magnets, you can pull them apart when needed. If they do come apart, it takes a second or two to click them back together.

Will the cufflink pieces fall off easily when not magnetically attracted?

  • Absolutely not. We have gone through a large number of different prototypes to ensure that both of the cufflink pieces stay securely fastened to your shirt sleeve.

Do the magnets in the cufflink's disrupt watches?

  • We have placed our cufflink's directly on top of some Kenneth Cole and Fossil watches for 2 solid weeks and noticed no abnormal activity. Sometimes the magnet can catch the “second” hand for a brief moment but overall it did not significantly impact the watch accuracy. We have not however tested them on more high end, electronic or kinetic watches.

Do you have any other designs?

  • This limited edition design is the only one we have produced thus far. Once the Indiegogo campaign is finished, we plan to begin manufacturing other designs as well, of which we do have some in mind already.

Can you wear them on French cuff shirts?

  • Only under certain circumstances. Some French cuff shirts have very thick sleeves making it impossible for the Anycuff to go through all of the button holes without significant strain. If the French cuff shirt sleeves are quite thin, then the Anycuff could be worn on French cuff shirts.

shirts.

story:
50 Dresses to New York Fashion Week!

My name is Ashley and I'm a young designer who was invited to New York Fashion Week about a month ago.  It came as a complete shock.  I wasn't expecting it as a growing brand, but knew instantly that it was an opportunity I couldn't pass up. The event in one of the largest on the fashion calendar for African-inspired designers.  I will be showcasing my new collection 50 Shades of Ankara at New York Fashion Week: Africa in September and I need to sell 50 dresses to help me get there.  At this point the collection is complete the lookbook is ready, but I just need to make sure I can return home with good credit and the ability to continue to pay people fair wages for doing amazing work.  


Fair Trade: It's Not Just Me:

After sewing as a hobby for five years, I received enough sales to start manufacturing my designs with a family Ghana 2014 . This happened largely from the sales of THE ZHARA Dress,  a design that has been worn by the likes of DJ Spinderella from the iconic hip hop group Salt & Peppa and Claire Sulmers of the mega multicultural fashion blog Fashion Bomb Daily.

The main source of income for the family I manufacture with was in the travel and tourism industry. After the travel restrictions placed on the Ghana and other parts of West Africa during the Ebola Crisis of 2014, they needed to find a new means to make money.  They now employ young women in the community to sew garments at wages that are fair and equitable. 

Doing New York Fashion Week: Africa will help give me the exposure to develop my brand into a sustainable mainstay in the fashion world, and assist me in continuing to provide these jobs. 

What We Need:


My goal is to raise: $5,500 CAD
$3,550 for NYFW:A Registration 
$1,550 for 50% of Fabric
$250 for the Flight
$150 Lookbook

My contribution will be: $5,750 CAD
$1,550 for remaining 50% of Fabric 
$550 for Processing Fees: 10% of what's raised  (5% for Indie Go-Go, 5% Paypal)
$500 for Additional Travel and Food
$2,000 for 2 Assistants 
$650 for Photoshoot
$500 for Marketing

TOTAL COST: $11,250 CAD

What You Get:

All funders will be able to join me on the journey to New York Fashion Week though exclusive access to images and video from the Showcase.

20% - 28% Savings on all Asikere Afana designs by purchasing in Canadian Dollars (~I usually sell in USD)

Plus the following Perks!

$5-$15 Donation: Love & Light Sends,  Virutal Kisses on Social Media

$25: Asikere Afana Gift Certificate 

$35: Chocolate ;)

$55: THE CLASSICS Dashiki Shirt Dress (Aqua Blue, Black, White, Red, Mustard, Brown, Dark Blue, Fuchsia Pink, or Purple )




$185: THE ZHARA Dashiki Dress (Aqua Blue, Fuchsia Pink, Forest Green or Cream, or Indigo Purple )




$100 - $300 Gift Cards EXCLUSIVE selection of limited fabrics from my upcoming collections

$350: CUSTOM Asikere Afana Design


My Biggest Challenge: Asking for Help:

I usually like helping others, so it takes a lot for me to ask for help.  I am calling on you to help me get to New York Fashion Week so I can grow my business into a sustainable brand that helps employ people to make beautiful clothing, at fair wages.  Shop Exclusives, get 20%-25% off, donate and share to help me pay off my credit card!

I want to thank everyone who has helped Asikere Afana come this far. It takes a village, and I'm happy to say that Asikere Afana is a global one. Join us. 



No Money? Share For a Free Lookbook:

It will mean the world if you could share this campaign on social media, through emails, or word-of-mouth with family, colleagues and friends . Doing so at least 4 times during its life ( 1 shout-out per week) will help get the word out. Share once and well send you a Free Lookbook of the upcoming collection. 

Remember to email me at marketing@asikereafana.com with the subject line "Send My Lookbook" for the download link once you share. 

Thanks so much for taking the time to learn about my 50 Dresses to Fashion Week Campaign. I look forward to your support!



About the Brand

Asikere Afana is a clothing company that features a sensual blend of African-inspired fashion, timeless trends, and curated textiles. Made in Ghana with 100% cotton and fair trade.  

For more info: 

Visit: asikereafana.com

Email: info@asikereafana.com

Follow: @asikereafana.com

Tweet: @asikereafana.com

story:
It’s estimated that 21 to 27 million people are victims of human trafficking. Nearly 80% are women used for sexual exploitation.

The Made for Freedom Team is doing what they can to ensure a more dignified future for these women. Will you join us?

What’s Our Goal?

Build a self-sustaining business that will finance job training for survivors of sex trafficking with proceeds from its bohemian chic pants.

How Can You Help?

Contribute at a level that works for you HERE.

Share through the provided sharing link. Share often and with many and you may receive...

FREE PANTS

“Is there any other way to get a pair of pants?”

Sure! We will offer a pair of pants to all the contributors that have shared our info and brought enough friends to donate a total of $150 or more. Here's how to do it:

  • Log into Indiegogo. If you don't have an account, you can use the "Connect using your Facebook account" feature.
  • Browse to our campaign at igg.me/at/madeforfreedom. You'll see that in the Share section under our pitch video the url will display a number at its end. That url is YOUR personal url.

  • Use the embedded share buttons to share our campaign with your friends! When someone uses that link to donate to Made for Freedom, we'll know that YOU sent them to our campaign page!

It may take some time to share with all your friends but definitely worth a pair of ultra comfortable pants!

Our Story

It all started with a pair of pants, compliments from random women, the concept of social enterprises and a desire to help women rescued from sex trafficking. (Watch the story of how we got here.)

Our Plan

Manufacture:  When we have the needed funds we will place our first order of pants with a factory in India that provides dignified employment. (Poverty is a primary cause of sex trafficking. Parents making a decent wage at a factory, are less likely to sell their daughters.)

Sell:  Our pants will be sold online, at local boutiques, fashion events and eventually tradeshows.

Send:  A minimum of 20% of the proceeds from every pair of pants will be given to centers that provide life skills and job training for women rescued from sex trafficking.

Our Pants

Unique:  Inspired by fisherman pants, the pattern has been altered to make them more flattering and stylish. They are absolutely unique.

Comfortable:  Dancers, yoga enthusiasts and karate hopefuls love them. More comfortable than jeans and more stylish than sweats, they are perfect for anyone who enjoys being comfortable with a little bohemian flare.

Fit You Anytime:  These pants fit anyone sizes 0 – 14. That means, unlike the stack of jeans we all have on the shelf that aren’t quite the right size, these pants still fit even if you lose or gain 5 pounds!

Made for Freedom is more than a pair of pants or a pretty logo on a t-shirt. We are about changing lives with our clothing through helping these women and children...one pair of pants at a time...because we are all Made for Freedom.

What Do We Have?

An absolutely unique design. These pants are more comfy than jeans; more stylish than sweats and not available anywhere else.

  • Rewards made by women rescued from sex trafficking.

  • Relationships with centers that provide life skills and job training for survivors.

Our rewards: Thank you for your contribution.

Our earrings, bangles, duffles and t-shirts are made by women that have been rescued from sex trafficking. Your contributions are providing employment now as well as life skills and job training for rescued women in the future.

The Pants: Whether it's a day at the beach, hopping around town, heading to the office or going to dinner these pants can work for nearly every occasion. A "one size fits many" pant, they fit many body types and work with a wide range of personal styles.

 

The Earrings: These elegant earrings come to you through one of our partners in India, Ruhamah Designs, where women rescued from sex trafficking are taught a trade and are provided with sustainable income. Made with freshwater pearls and garnets these earrings are hypoallergenic with steel earring hooks.

 

The T-shirts: Designed by one of our team members these t-shirts are manufactured by women who have benefitted from the job training at Freeset, one of our partners in India. Screen-printed in St. Louis, these organic, fair trade t-shirts are soft and comfortable. Currently our t-shirts are a girly cut but stay tuned for a more masculine design and fit option!

 

"Story" Duffle:

These great bags are manufactured by women who have benefitted from the job training at Freeset, one of our partners in India.

 

Bangles:

These also are manufactured by women who have benefitted from the job training at Freeset, one of our partners in India.

 

The Stickers: Now you can show your support for Made for Freedom and our cause with durable sticker for your car, your laptop, water bottle, you name it!

 

Made for Freedom is a not-just-for-profit, social enterprise that provides life-changing education for women rescued from sex trafficking with proceeds from its ultra-comfortable, bohemian chic pants.

“Is there any other way to get a pair of pants?”
Sure! We will offer a pair of pants to all the contributors that have shared our info and brought enough friends to donate a total of $150 or more. Here's how to do it:


Log into Indiegogo. If you don't have an account, you can use the "Connect using your Facebook account" feature.
Browse to our campaign at igg.me/at/madeforfreedom. You'll see that in the Share section under our pitch video the url will display a number at its end. That url is YOUR personal url.


Use the embedded share buttons to share our campaign with your friends! When someone uses that link to donate to Made for Freedom, we'll know that YOU sent them to our campaign page!
It may take some time to share with all your friends but definitely worth a pair of ultra comfortable pants!
Our Story
It all started with a pair of pants, compliments from random women, the concept of social enterprises and a desire to help women rescued from sex trafficking. (Watch the story of how we got here.)
Our Plan
Manufacture:  When we have the needed funds we will place our first order of pants with a factory in India that provides dignified employment. (Poverty is a primary cause of sex trafficking. Parents making a decent wage at a factory, are less likely to sell their daughters.)
Sell:  Our pants will be sold online, at local boutiques, fashion events and eventually tradeshows.
Send:  A minimum of 20% of the proceeds from every pair of pants will be given to centers that provide life skills and job training for women rescued from sex trafficking.

Our Pants
Unique:  Inspired by fisherman pants, the pattern has been altered to make them more flattering and stylish. They are absolutely unique.
Comfortable:  Dancers, yoga enthusiasts and karate hopefuls love them. More comfortable than jeans and more stylish than sweats, they are perfect for anyone who enjoys being comfortable with a little bohemian flare.
Fit You Anytime:  These pants fit anyone sizes 0 – 14. That means, unlike the stack of jeans we all have on the shelf that aren’t quite the right size, these pants still fit even if you lose or gain 5 pounds!
Made for Freedom is more than a pair of pants or a pretty logo on a t-shirt. We are about changing lives with our clothing through helping these women and children...one pair of pants at a time...because we are all Made for Freedom.
What Do We Have?
An absolutely unique design. These pants are more comfy than jeans; more stylish than sweats and not available anywhere else.


Rewards made by women rescued from sex trafficking.


Relationships with centers that provide life skills and job training for survivors.

Our rewards: Thank you for your contribution.
Our earrings, bangles, duffles and t-shirts are made by women that have been rescued from sex trafficking. Your contributions are providing employment now as well as life skills and job training for rescued women in the future.
The Pants: Whether it's a day at the beach, hopping around town, heading to the office or going to dinner these pants can work for nearly every occasion. A "one size fits many" pant, they fit many body types and work with a wide range of personal styles.

 
The Earrings: These elegant earrings come to you through one of our partners in India, Ruhamah Designs, where women rescued from sex trafficking are taught a trade and are provided with sustainable income. Made with freshwater pearls and garnets these earrings are hypoallergenic with steel earring hooks.
 
The T-shirts: Designed by one of our team members these t-shirts are manufactured by women who have benefitted from the job training at Freeset, one of our partners in India. Screen-printed in St. Louis, these organic, fair trade t-shirts are soft and comfortable. Currently our t-shirts are a girly cut but stay tuned for a more masculine design and fit option!
 
"Story" Duffle:
These great bags are manufactured by women who have benefitted from the job training at Freeset, one of our partners in India.
 
Bangles:
These also are manufactured by women who have benefitted from the job training at Freeset, one of our partners in India.
 
The Stickers: Now you can show your support for Made for Freedom and our cause with durable sticker for your car, your laptop, water bottle, you name it!

 
Made for Freedom is a not-just-for-profit, social enterprise that provides life-changing education for women rescued from sex trafficking with proceeds from its ultra-comfortable, bohemian chic pants.

story:
Our names are Emily Bache and Abigail Breslin, and we met 12 years ago in Middle School. We always shared a dream of owning a fashion company together, so we moved to New York City to make it happen. WanderLust Fashion LLC is an all purpose fashion company, which offers styling, modeling, consulting, personal shopping, designing, and more.

We work 24/7, and have made WanderLust our lives, but in this industry and city, sadly, that doesn't always cut it. Right now we work out of our studio apartment trying to make ends meet with hefty business expenses!

With whatever money we receive we will put into finding an appropriate work space, supplies, and legal funds.

We're young entrepreneurs, who are motivated, down to Earth, and all smiles. We're looking to make the fashion industry more approachable! 

 

*If you can't contribute, please help us spread the word by using the Indiegogo share tools!!*

story:
What Is LifeBrush? A Smarter Toothbrush!

Ever been to the dentist and been surprised when you received bad news?  You may have thought you were brushing correctly, but how can you really know?

We created LifeBrush so that you can really know.

LifeBrush is an ultrasonic toothbrush that knows its position in your mouth and shows you exactly where you brushed and for how long.  It will send that information to your mobile device through Bluetooth LE which will in turn be displayed in our app.   The brushing statistics and history will show you where you missed thereby giving you a better chance to remove plaque, avoid cavities, and avoid gum disease.

(Fact: Remove plaque every 24-hours and you should never get a cavity.)

We are also  developing a built-in thermometer for LifeBrush so that when you finish brushing your teeth you will know your body temperature. This will enable early detection of spikes in body temperature.  This will really help mothers with monitoring their child's health.

Imagine your life with no more:
  • surprises of bad news from the dentist.
  • wondering whether or not your child brushed correctly.
  • wondering whether or not your child has a fever. 
LifeBrush can be so much more than a toothbrush.  Join us in making it a reality!


Who We Are

Dr. William Richter doesn’t just do small talk with his patients.  He gets to know them personally.  His patients become his friends.  In fact, 2 of his patients have pitched in to help him realize his dream.  This is the story behind LifeBrush.

Dr. Richter continuously looks for ways to improve the health of his patients and pitched an idea to one of his patients, Stacy Hawkins, using the infamous words: "I have an idea for an app." Dr. Richter wanted to help families gain better access to dental care--no matter who their dentist was.  He didn't see it as helping his competitors.  He saw it as helping families!  Stacy agreed to help him (by using what he had learned in getting his business degree) and the two began putting together a team to develop an app to help moms, kids and all those who either struggle with getting to the dentist or want the best health available.

The app evolved into a much bigger idea: a smart toothbrush! Dr. Richter knew that most dental complications are the result of poor brushing habits. He figured that with better technology, toothbrushes should be smart enough to fix bad brushing behavior. We decided to name it "LifeBrush" because it impacts more than the couple of minutes it takes to brush your teeth.  Reinforcing good brushing habits will positively impact your whole life.

The Mid-Michigan Innovation Center joined to help Dr. Richter move closer to reaching his dream, then came Steinbrink Engineering (Nevin, Nick and Mike) to help with the mechanical parts of the brush and they were followed thereafter by the University of Michigan's Pediatric Device Consortium (who said they would provide direction). Dr. Richter then reached out to a former patient, Kyle Rokita, who was back in town to build our mobile app.

Lauro Ojeda, University of Michigan Research Scientist specialized in inertial localization systems, enthusiastically jumped in to develop the complicated algorithms for tracking the brush location inside the mouth.

And, then there was Patti DiGangi, a nationally known expert in the dental profession and a passionate force for oral cancer awareness and prevention (1% of amount raised here will be donated to The Oral Cancer Foundation). 

How Far We've Come

The brush has been in development for several months so we can give you the inside scoop on our progress!

On the hardware side, the toothbrush position tracking is coming along nicely and is improving every day! It's quite the engineering challenge so this is a major focus for the team. We hope to be able to upload some videos of Lauro showing off brush tracking once we ensure we have sufficient patent protection. 

The Steinbrink Engineering team has been working on the mechanical designs of the brush. They have been studying up on the latest components and materials. We are building a high-end ultrasonic toothbrush so we need to use an advanced processor and battery to handle the demands of position tracking calculations and vibration.


On the software side, we are very proud of the look and feel of our app. After all, it's very important that you enjoy using it everyday! We are using the latest iOS API's for high-quality 3D graphics with fast response time. We are using the new Swift language to take full advantage of your mobile phone! We have 2 unique games developed so far and have also worked hard to clearly present the brushing statistics and feedback you will need to brush your best!

What We Need & What You Can Get

The best thing about LifeBrush is that it's a cool idea that will do a lot of good.  Help us get LifeBrush out of development and into the hands of people.  LifeBrush is not yet for sale.  But you can get a LifeBrush as a perk for helping us reach our goal.

We need to raise $65,000 to polish the prototype and finish the software.  If we do not reach our goal we will use what you do give us to get closer to reaching these objectives.  We are asking you to help us make a difference!

If we do not reach our goal here we will get as close to finished as the money will allow then we will beat the pavement to find ways to get this brush to market.  We have already done quite a bit of work, and we just need a little help from you to help us get over this hump.

The Impact

Cavities and gum disease are a silent epidemic. When almost half of the people over 30 have gum disease that means the problem didn't just start.  But, we do the best that we can.  The problem is we need a better tool to let us know when we didn't brush well enough and to let us know where we need to brush in order to brush well enough....to slay the dragon. LifeBrush will provide that, and will help in other areas.

Kids don’t want mom in the bathroom hovering over them as they brush their teeth.  But, mom wants to make sure her child is brushing correctly.  This is a key point in a child’s development, as statistics show that bad brushing habits acquired during childhood will usually carry on into adulthood.

This pattern has made cavities the #1 chronic disease among children, and has made it so that about 47% of people over 30 have gum disease.  In addition, some researchers are pointing to correlations between gum disease and such serious conditions as heart disease, Lung disease, Alzheimer’s disease and low-weight/premature birth just to name a few.   

On a lighter note,  we are planning to add a KissAbility Score for those who want to know that the person they are kissing isn't passing a mouthful of yesterday's bacteria...eewww!  For kids this score will be called the Cavity Warrior Score. The objective of these scores is to remind us of the import and benefit of brushing properly. Acquiring good brushing habits can eliminate a lot of pain and suffering.  It is a "whole" "life" matter.  LifeBrush is being created to help, to make a difference. (See sample screenshots below)

 

Risks & Challenges

Doing local position tracking is difficult. Local position tracking is when you detect where in space a particular object is as it moves. We brought in Lauro Ojeda, an expert in local position tracking, to help us solve the problem.  Lauro has been successful in eliminating tracking with a manual toothbrush.  Next we will be testing with the vibrations of a high-end ultrasonic toothbrush to filter out the noise. We will then get our firmware perfected so that the brush has a smooth integration with our app.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone is in a position to donate.  But, we want you to be part of the LifeBrush journey.  Indiegogo has provided fantastic tools that will allow you to share this campaign with others. The more people that know about the campaign the greater the chances that LifeBrush will be there when you need it, ready for the daily brushing that you care about.

story:
Ladies - this makes a great gift for a man in your life. 
My name is Michael and I am the un-commando in chief at ubisububi - underwear by subscription.  My business partner, Ineke and I don't have a history in online retailing but we do have a lot of experience in sales and marketing and of course, buying and wearing underwear!  

We know that men have better things to do with their time than shopping for underwear.  Studies show that most men hang on to their underwear for 7 years or more. C'mon guys, we're better than that. And ladies, you know we can do better!

We are seeking funding to assist with our start up business - a subscription service that will deliver a new, different, high end pair of underwear in a the style and size requested to our subscriber's door each month.  What could be easier? And for every pair we send to a subscriber, we'll send a pair to a child in need.

 Our web site is in the final stages of development, we have secured our first few months worth of product and we are building a strong marketing and launch plan.  Although we are well on our way, your investment in ubisububi will help us build our business faster and stronger.  Your support will allow us to realize better web optimization, to secure more product and produce more thorough and effective launch plans.
Our fundraising objective is to raise $10,000.00

We estimate the following breakdown of expenditures:
- web site creation - $2000.00
- web site optimization - $3500.00
- securing top notch product - $1000.00
- online shipping module - $300.00
- custom boxes for product shipping - $900.00
- product photo shoot - $1100.00
- marketing materials - $400.00
- promotional launch event - $800.00

At ubisububi we are committed to giving back. For every pair of underwear we send out, we'll donate a pair to a child in need through our non-profit partner, Free The Kids - an orphanage housing 400 children in Haiti..This is an important component of our business and one of which we are most proud. 

We have prepared a great list of perks in exchange for your support.  Take a look to the right.  Once our fundraising efforts are complete, an un-commando will get back with you to secure your desired underwear style and size. And know, whether you can or can't invest, you can help by sending this email on to others.  Your help in forwarding this campaign is very much appreciated.

Discover the un-commando in you!

Thanks for your support.
Michael - un-commando in chief
Ineke - vice-un-commando in chief

www.facebook.com/ubisububi

www.instagram.com/wearubi

www.pinterest.com/wearubi

Take our survey:
https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/8C5BS7X

story:
XtendPower is the most versatile, safe, and convenient way to charge all of your devices at the same time. We created XtendPower to replace your old power strips, extension cords, and socket extenders. XtendPower is a revolutionary charging station that enables you to charge up to six devices simultaneously using two USB ports, four standard outlets, and a pass through plug. XtendPower is beautifully designed which means there is no need for it to be hidden. No matter the decor, it looks great in any situation where you need to access power! 

XtendPower has a six foot heavy duty power cord, allowing you to reach virtually any point in the room. With the convenience of a six foot cord, XtendPower can be plugged into the corner outlet, and sit atop a coffee table, allowing you to charge a phone, tablet, and laptop directly in front of you.

Comes with adhesive pad, so you can mount XtendPower anywhere.

XtendPower also has a sleek 45 degree plug so that the cord can fit behind furniture and its unique plug through feature is designed so that the outlet can still be used without having to unplug XtendPower. 

To keep it compact, yet functional, XtendPower has four outlets and two USB charging ports. XtendPower can charge a phone and a tablet at the same time by sensing the additional power requirements needed and sharing that power between the two devices. The outlets are spaced to allow for oversized brick shaped power adapters to sit side by side, a feature unique to XtendPower. 

Each year thousands of children are injured by inserting objects into outlets. We have eliminated that potential risk by designing the XtendPower with tamper resistant outlets, another feature unique to XtendPower. In addition we have added overload protection making XtendPower one of the safest products of its type.  

XtendPower is also energy efficient, utilizing an ON/OFF/Reset switch in order to save power consumption when XtendPower is not in use. With other devices, the USB charging ports can be running 24/7 regardless of whether or not they are being used. This is often referred to as vampire, or phantom power loss.

I started the XtendPower project in my dorm room because my roommates and I could not find a simple solution for charging our devices. I have always been a do-it-yourself kind of guy, so I decided to create a device that could be used to conveniently power multiple devices using standard outlets while at the same time utilizing USB charging ports.

The outlets in our dorm were either hidden under furniture or tucked away in a corner. We were constantly connecting and disconnecting our laptops, phones, and tablets in the outlet closest to the couch, because we all wanted to be within arms reach of our devices. We tried everything from basic power strips, extension cords, and multiple wall outlet adapters, but nothing seemed to be the perfect fit. I wanted to find a convenient way for my friends and I to charge our devices.

My first self-made prototype consisted of one of those industrial orange extension cords, which was then plugged into a power strip. Due to the power bricks and adapters overlapping, we were not able to utilize all 6 of the outlets in the power strip. Not only did this look like something from "Back To The Future," but it was inconvenient and somewhat dangerous. The USB power bricks took up the much needed conventional outlets to charge our laptops. It was impossible for all of us to charge all of our devices simultaneously. My friend who is an interior designer, always joked about how our coffee table looked like an engineering lab.

I was lucky to have a family friend with experience in the manufacturing industry, and a brother who is an electrical engineer. With their help we were able to make my idea a reality. By working with a designer I was able to create 3D renderings of my power station, which by then I had dubbed "XtendPower".

My brother insisted that I use the highest quality electrical components I could find and my friend introduced me to a high end manufacturer who specialized in electronics and power supplies. Within a few months, our first hand-made samples were created.

I was pleased with the functionality, but I wanted it to look better aesthetically. I decided to get rid of the shiny black or white finish normally found on power strips, in exchange for a smooth rubberized matte black, or matte white finish. It was very important to me that XtendPower was sleek and looked cool. I wanted it to blend in with the decor of a room, not stick out like a sore thumb. Although the high end components and upgraded aesthetics added to the overall cost, I felt my future customers would appreciate it and in the long run it would be worth it.

  • XtendPower lets you conveniently access power outlets that are hidden behind your furniture or off in the corner.
  • XtendPower is designed to be as sleek as possible and its compact size means that it is never in your way. 
  • XtendPower combines your outlets and wall adapters into a single consolidated unit, decreasing clutter and obstructive wires. 
  • XtendPower conquers tight and hard to reach spaces thanks to its 45 degree pass through plug.
  • XtendPower's pass through plug allows the original outlet to be used while the charging station is plugged in. 
  • XtendPower is made up of the best materials we could find, and is designed with simplicity at mind.

  • Entertainment Center
  • Living Room
  • Coffee Table
  • Desktop
  • Bed Stand
  • Kitchen
  • Craft Room
  • Workspace
  • Tool Bench

International? So are we! We believe that people worldwide should be able to benefit from using XtendPower! We will include a region specific power adapter with each XtendPower when you pay for international shipping.

  • Four AC (110v) tamper resistant (TR) outlets 
  • 2 high current USB fast chargers 
  • 6 foot heavy duty power cable 
  • 45 degree pass through plug end 
  • Integrated 10 amp circuit breaker and surge protector 
  • Overload protection 
  • On/Off and Reset switch 
  • Dimensions: 3.9” x 5.2” x 1” 
  • Material: Polycarbonate plastic 
  • Finish: Matte rubberized painted housing. 
  • Weight:1.4 lbs.

XtendPower starts shipping in January, 2015!

Thanks for taking the time to read through my pitch. I'm here on Indiegogo because I need your help to complete this project. I believe that XtendPower is the best product of its type in the industry today. Its compact, good looking and loaded with features that include our exclusive tamper resistant outlet design and 90 degree pass through plug. XtendPower conveniently  powers multiple devices using standard outlets while at the same time utilizing USB charging ports. And here is the best part, it costs about the same as what you would pay for a conventional power strip that lacks most of the features of XtendPower. Check out our perks to see just what an amazing deal XtendPower really is. I'm trying my best to let the world know about XtendPower. I am truly thankful for those of you who like the product and would like to help us to get our message out. We would love to see our Indiegogo campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Blogs or any other type of social media! With your assistance we can make XtendPower a reality! 

Thank you Indiegogo!
story_txt:
XtendPower comes in matte black or white.


XtendCables come in your choice of white or black, with either MicroUSB or iPhone Lightning connector.Shorter cable: magnetic ends can tie (like a loop, see pic above) for awesome portability!
Longer cable: indicator LED shows you the status of your device's charge. Red means charging & blue means fully charged. It also comes with built-in silicon cable tie. 


XtendPower is the most versatile, safe, and convenient way to charge all of your devices at the same time. We created XtendPower to replace your old power strips, extension cords, and socket extenders. XtendPower is a revolutionary charging station that enables you to charge up to six devices simultaneously using two USB ports, four standard outlets, and a pass through plug. XtendPower is beautifully designed which means there is no need for it to be hidden. No matter the decor, it looks great in any situation where you need to access power! 


Sleek design and compact size.
XtendPower has a six foot heavy duty power cord, allowing you to reach virtually any point in the room. With the convenience of a six foot cord, XtendPower can be plugged into the corner outlet, and sit atop a coffee table, allowing you to charge a phone, tablet, and laptop directly in front of you.

Looks great on your coffee table.


Comes with adhesive pad, so you can mount XtendPower anywhere.XtendPower also has a sleek 45 degree plug so that the cord can fit behind furniture and its unique plug through feature is designed so that the outlet can still be used without having to unplug XtendPower. 

45 degree pass through plug.
To keep it compact, yet functional, XtendPower has four outlets and two USB charging ports. XtendPower can charge a phone and a tablet at the same time by sensing the additional power requirements needed and sharing that power between the two devices. The outlets are spaced to allow for oversized brick shaped power adapters to sit side by side, a feature unique to XtendPower. 

Capable of charging a phone and a tablet at the same time.
Each year thousands of children are injured by inserting objects into outlets. We have eliminated that potential risk by designing the XtendPower with tamper resistant outlets, another feature unique to XtendPower. In addition we have added overload protection making XtendPower one of the safest products of its type.  

Large adapters can be used side by side.
XtendPower is also energy efficient, utilizing an ON/OFF/Reset switch in order to save power consumption when XtendPower is not in use. With other devices, the USB charging ports can be running 24/7 regardless of whether or not they are being used. This is often referred to as vampire, or phantom power loss.

On/Off/Reset switch.


I started the XtendPower project in my dorm room because my roommates and I could not find a simple solution for charging our devices. I have always been a do-it-yourself kind of guy, so I decided to create a device that could be used to conveniently power multiple devices using standard outlets while at the same time utilizing USB charging ports.
The outlets in our dorm were either hidden under furniture or tucked away in a corner. We were constantly connecting and disconnecting our laptops, phones, and tablets in the outlet closest to the couch, because we all wanted to be within arms reach of our devices. We tried everything from basic power strips, extension cords, and multiple wall outlet adapters, but nothing seemed to be the perfect fit. I wanted to find a convenient way for my friends and I to charge our devices.
My first self-made prototype consisted of one of those industrial orange extension cords, which was then plugged into a power strip. Due to the power bricks and adapters overlapping, we were not able to utilize all 6 of the outlets in the power strip. Not only did this look like something from "Back To The Future," but it was inconvenient and somewhat dangerous. The USB power bricks took up the much needed conventional outlets to charge our laptops. It was impossible for all of us to charge all of our devices simultaneously. My friend who is an interior designer, always joked about how our coffee table looked like an engineering lab.


I was lucky to have a family friend with experience in the manufacturing industry, and a brother who is an electrical engineer. With their help we were able to make my idea a reality. By working with a designer I was able to create 3D renderings of my power station, which by then I had dubbed "XtendPower".

Our first 3D rendering!


My brother insisted that I use the highest quality electrical components I could find and my friend introduced me to a high end manufacturer who specialized in electronics and power supplies. Within a few months, our first hand-made samples were created.

We were very pleased with our first 3D printed sample!

We used only the highest quality electrical components.


I was pleased with the functionality, but I wanted it to look better aesthetically. I decided to get rid of the shiny black or white finish normally found on power strips, in exchange for a smooth rubberized matte black, or matte white finish. It was very important to me that XtendPower was sleek and looked cool. I wanted it to blend in with the decor of a room, not stick out like a sore thumb. Although the high end components and upgraded aesthetics added to the overall cost, I felt my future customers would appreciate it and in the long run it would be worth it.




XtendPower lets you conveniently access power outlets that are hidden behind your furniture or off in the corner.

XtendPower is designed to be as sleek as possible and its compact size means that it is never in your way. 

XtendPower combines your outlets and wall adapters into a single consolidated unit, decreasing clutter and obstructive wires. 

XtendPower conquers tight and hard to reach spaces thanks to its 45 degree pass through plug.

XtendPower's pass through plug allows the original outlet to be used while the charging station is plugged in. 

XtendPower is made up of the best materials we could find, and is designed with simplicity at mind.




Entertainment Center
Living Room
Coffee Table
Desktop
Bed Stand
Kitchen
Craft Room
Workspace
Tool Bench



International? So are we! We believe that people worldwide should be able to benefit from using XtendPower! We will include a region specific power adapter with each XtendPower when you pay for international shipping.




Four AC (110v) tamper resistant (TR) outlets 
2 high current USB fast chargers 
6 foot heavy duty power cable 
45 degree pass through plug end 
Integrated 10 amp circuit breaker and surge protector 
Overload protection 
On/Off and Reset switch 
Dimensions: 3.9” x 5.2” x 1” 
Material: Polycarbonate plastic 
Finish: Matte rubberized painted housing. 
Weight:1.4 lbs.





XtendPower starts shipping in January, 2015!
Thanks for taking the time to read through my pitch. I'm here on Indiegogo because I need your help to complete this project. I believe that XtendPower is the best product of its type in the industry today. Its compact, good looking and loaded with features that include our exclusive tamper resistant outlet design and 90 degree pass through plug. XtendPower conveniently  powers multiple devices using standard outlets while at the same time utilizing USB charging ports. And here is the best part, it costs about the same as what you would pay for a conventional power strip that lacks most of the features of XtendPower. Check out our perks to see just what an amazing deal XtendPower really is. I'm trying my best to let the world know about XtendPower. I am truly thankful for those of you who like the product and would like to help us to get our message out. We would love to see our Indiegogo campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Blogs or any other type of social media! With your assistance we can make XtendPower a reality! 
Thank you Indiegogo!

story:
Thank you for stopping by!  We’re so glad you did.

Mission

We’re on a mission.  We need your help to start our new solar energy system business.  We have an innovative system that provides many extra benefits to our customers at a lower cost than comparable solar PV systems on the market today.  We would like to get to market faster than we can afford to right now and with your help, we can do just that.  We also want to put lots of people back to work.

Our Product

Our system works differently than most of today’s systems.  It has a group of 1 foot square mirrors mounted on the roof that track the sun and reflect it to the top of a chimney target.  This chimney holds that heat in a storage tank for up to a few days so a generator can produce electricity from it all day and night.

The amount of electricity made is matched to exactly what you want at any time.  This can completely eliminate your electric bill and even your grid connection if you want.

The extra heat that’s not used will also heat many things to eliminate your natural gas bill too.  This includes things like your home heating, water heating, pool or hot tub heating and operating a certain kind of air conditioner.  It even has a built-in barbecue that’s powered by this heat!

The system has lots of flexibility in how to configure it.  This means you can put it on any side of the house, over a patio or even on the ground.  You just need the space and a good view of the sun.  It also means that it works well in hot and cold climates, winter and summer.  It has a built-in heater to clear snow and frost from the mirrors and a backup system to cover those spells when the sun hides away for many days in a row.

UPDATE:  We now have some wonderful volunteers working hard to bring you an animation of the system very soon so be sure to watch for it!  We’re hoping to see it in the next few days and we’ll put it up as soon as we get it.  (THANKS GUYS!!!)

Behind the scenes

The heart of the system is our new Stirling engine.  We are developing our 5th generation of it now but running short of development funds.  Previous versions have worked better than expected but have cost more than $100k to build.  Now with the availability of a special ceramic, we can cut that cost dramatically.  This is huge news because it means that it’s now possible to be able to offer the complete system for $20k.  Adding the install cost will put your total cost around $25k.

When you couple electricity generation with heat production, it’s called combined heat and power or CHP.  This type of system basically doubles a system’s value.  Running it from storage allows this to all happen 24 hours a day, regardless of sunlight.  This triples a systems value again.  It basically solves all the problems people have with other renewable energy systems while eliminating the need for batteries that must be maintained or replaced.

When you compare this one-time cost to monthly energy bills of $300-$500 per month (and climbing), it could be paid off in 6-10 years.  After that, you can enjoy free energy with only periodic maintenance checks.  We’ve designed the whole system so every part is either maintenance free or very cheap to repair.  For example, any mirror can be replaced for about $1 in 5 minutes!  Since repair costs are so cheap, there’s not really a system lifetime.

Our Story

Welcome to the introduction of my life's mission.  I've been interested in creating this system for 30 years and have been focused solely on it for the last 10.  As an ex-automation engineer, I've been able to combine my experiences with lots of new research and the wonderful help of a small group of talented experts, to finally create the ultimate home energy system.

It's been a very expensive and time-consuming road, but it's all been worth it.  I've made many new friends, both local and all over the internet.  We've all shared the work and some have stayed for the long haul.

We've spent many nights emailing drawings or spreadsheets around, skyping til 3 am and getting up for work in 2 hours and we've dumped all the money we could get our hands on (more than we should have) into making new versions of this or that part for tests.

Now our genuinely crowd-sourced group consists of a handful of 40-somethings and some 20-somethings spread all over the internet plus a few of our kids with a common goal.  That goal is to bring a genuinely affordable energy system to the public which satisfies every energy need people have, while powering itself from the one resource we all have - the sun.  

Funding

We are very supportive of the crowd-funding and crowd-sourcing movement.  For us, it can allow us to keep our system price low.  This way we can help many more people cut their energy costs.  Investment costs would quickly double our price and kill the business before it got started.

By way of your generous donations, we can purchase some needed equipment and materials.  This will get us set up for making a few systems to sell.  Those sales are already here, pending completion of a full sized field test system so we need that funded as well.  Unfortunately, the rugged economy has hit our small town harder than most.  It’s a manufacturing based community, nestled in a farming state.  While our state is doing well, our town has lost every major industry we’ve had over the years.

This project can not only change that for our little community, it can generate many high paying jobs all over the country.  The faster we get going, the more impact these systems will have to cut our fossil fuel usage and we all know a bunch of reasons to do that so don’t be shy!  You’ll sleep much better tonight, knowing you did something to help all this get started.

Don’t forget to ask questions in the comments or just say hi.  Even Liking and Sharing can be a big help to spread the word.  This may get better response once we get our video released, but every little bit counts so if you support a more sustainable energy direction, it’s time to get busy!

Rewards

We’re offering some cool t-shirts for a $25 donation but since we don’t have a design for them yet, any winning suggestions will receive 3 extra shirts for their donation.  Please you’re your design suggestions in the comments and when we select one, we'll add this to this reward description.

Discount coupons come with any donation of $50 or more and are worth double the donated amount towards the purchase of a system.  This signed, framable document will come personalized to clearly state that you are the first or second (or whatever number you happen to be) funder of the real solar revolution.  The named funder can be assigned to anyone or any group at your discretion and the dollar amount display is optional at your choice.   Their use is fully transferable and they can be stacked or split up but are limited to 25% of the final purchase price when ordering any single system.  We will track the ongoing balance of each one and coordinate that via personal phone call. Unfortunately, we must restrict their use on our first 100 systems.  We reserve the right to limit extreme donations no longer in the interest of crowd-funding.

story:
THE PAST / LE PASSÉ

--

Originally designed for military forces during underwater missions, 24 hours watches helped sailors navigate time as they were deprieved of daylight. The Redoutable, first French nuclear submarine, could, they say, sail around the world without ever rising to the surface.

Initialement conçues pour le personnel militaire lors de missions sous-marines, les montres 24h aidaient les marins, comme ils étaient privés de la lumière du jour, à s'orienter dans le temps. Le Redoutable, premier sous-marin nucléaire français, pouvait, dit-on, faire le tour de la Terre sans jamais remonter à la surface.

THE PRESENT / LE PRÉSENT

--

Based in Bordeaux, city known for its wine but also for its naval history, our brand claims to be from various origins. Aesthetically inspired by Bauhaus and its significant minimalism, prototyped in France, Vasco is working with a high quality Swiss Heart ( Ronda Swiss Made Quartz 515.24H ), a 316L Stainless Steel case , a scratch-resistant sapphire glass and the whole enhanced by french bull leather bracelets.

Basée à Bordeaux, ville au passé naval et sous-marinier, notre marque se revendique d’origines diverses. Marquée esthétiquement par l’école du Bauhaus et son minimalismesignificatif, prototypée localement en France, Vasco embarque un coeur suisse de haute qualité (Ronda Quartz Swiss Made 515.24H), un boitier en acier inoxydable 316L, un verre saphir inrayable et le tout mis en valeur par des bracelets en cuir de taureau français.
