story:
the 365 watch collection 

Hello everyone! My name is Dallas Rutherford, CEO and founder of the365movement! I am so excited for YOU to be apart of OUR team and OUR movement as WE revolutionize the way the Bible is delivered to OUR generation!

We have created a product that is designed to help people read their Bibles daily!We wanted to make reading the Bible fun, we wanted to make reading the Bible popular, we wanted to make reading the Bible fashionable, we wanted to revolutionize the way the Bible is delivered to our generation!

The 365 watch will be a powerful tool in sharing Jesus with others and maintaining our spiritual bodies.

(PATENT PENDING)

What does the 365 watch do?

- the 365 watch will always display the time.

- the 365 watch will store 365 bible verses pertaining to different subjects such as faith, love and forgiveness, ect.

- the 365 watch will scroll the "verse of the day" at the top of each hour, totaling 24 times throughout the day.

- the 365 watch will have one functional button which will be used to scroll the "verse of the day" at the users convenience.

(PATENT PENDING)


What will the money go towards?

Here is what the 100,000 $ dollars will go towards.

1. Full development and completion of the product. 75k will go towards working with a professional product development company that will perfect our two  prototypes and will take us to manufacturing and production.

2. Another 10k will go towards preparing our website for online sales!

3. The remaining 15k will go towards our first manufacturing run.


Sharing Gods word!

 There is nothing more POWERFUL than Gods word. Most people today overlook the awesome, life changing, and life sustaining power of His word. The Bible says that feeding ourselves spiritually is just as important as feeding ourselves physically, but yet most of us are not in our Bibles DAILY.

When is the last time you shared Gods word with some one? As Christians, WE are called to share Gods word with others but yet most of us make up many excuses for not doing so daily!  The 365 watch is the PERFECT tool to share Gods word with others in a cool and UNIQUE way!


Other Ways You Can Help

1. PRAYER! We are firm believers in the power of prayer! We ask you to pray that God uses this watch to help grow His kingdom and glorify His name and that if It is His will that we will have a successful campaign!

2. SHARE SHARE SHARE! We also believe in the power of social media. Share our campagain link on your Facebook, Twitter and Instagram! Feel free to use any of the photos we will be posting on our social media sites when sharing! (@the365movement)

story:
"Neat and remarkably well finished, with very soft geometric lines" - Mr Montre

"Eye-Catching Affordability They’re not trying to change the world or reinvent the wheel at Mileneal, they’re merely striving to deliver a watch to young professionals without the big mark-ups that are evident throughout the world of watchmaking and that’s certainly something to be applauded in our opinion" - The Coolector

"Upon first glance the watch is seductively sleek and clean-faced" - Menswear Style

"Mileneal watches knows the importance of a good timepiece" - Fashion Journal

"Your first “real” watch. Goes with everything in your emerging wardrobe. Looks smart enough to wear to job interviews, casual enough on the weekends, stylish enough for dates" - WristWatchReview

"Your Go-To for simplistic watches" - PauseMag UK

 

  • Japan Miyota GM10 Quartz Movement (with date indication)
  • 316L Stainless Steel Case
  • Raised Double Domed Sapphire Coated Glass
  • 3 ATM Water Resistant
  • Genuine Leather Straps with quick-release function
  • 40 mm Case Diameter

 

The Design Process

The watch design focuses on versatility, a reflection of the dynamic nature of millennials. With that, we decided to make the watch a combination of man-made & nature elements. We therefore design the case and dial with the idea of geometry, mimicking man-made apparatus such as protractors & rulers. This can be seen on the multi-layered dial with thin indexes. The lens itself is a mimic of morning dew seen on leaves. The result is a raised double domed glass, complementing the geometric case & dial.

The design process is carefully done, starting with hand sketches to 2D & 3D designs and finally a realistic rendering. All to ensure that we have a good visualization of our intended prototype.

We then worked closely with an experienced manufacturer to get the prototype produced. The individual parts were first prototyped and inspected thoroughly before the actual assembly. 

The assembly only began after we were completely satisfied with the individual parts. Even after assembly of the whole watch, we went through several revisions to get the outcome that we were satisfied with

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The packaging - A box with a simple and minimal design.

The hard card box material ensures that the watch is well protected (Of course, bubble-wraps would be fitted around the box as well)  during shipment. Meanwhile, the matte-like paper finish gives the whole packaging an elegant and sleek look. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risk & Challenges

The most common risks with Indiegogo campaigns are related production & delivery deadlines. If there are any quality issues during the production, this would result in a delay which in turn affects the delivery. As with large quantity production, the possibility of having minor defects is also higher. In order to minimize such unforeseen hiccups, we have worked closely with our manufacturer to ensure the product is ready to be mass produced. We will also work around the clock to ensure everything goes according to our plan and schedule. Afterall, we want our first delivery to be of good result!
story_txt:
"Neat and remarkably well finished, with very soft geometric lines" - Mr Montre"Eye-Catching Affordability They’re not trying to change the world or reinvent the wheel at Mileneal, they’re merely striving to deliver a watch to young professionals without the big mark-ups that are evident throughout the world of watchmaking and that’s certainly something to be applauded in our opinion" - The Coolector"Upon first glance the watch is seductively sleek and clean-faced" - Menswear Style"Mileneal watches knows the importance of a good timepiece" - Fashion Journal"Your first “real” watch. Goes with everything in your emerging wardrobe. Looks smart enough to wear to job interviews, casual enough on the weekends, stylish enough for dates" - WristWatchReview"Your Go-To for simplistic watches" - PauseMag UK 
Japan Miyota GM10 Quartz Movement (with date indication)
316L Stainless Steel Case
Raised Double Domed Sapphire Coated Glass
3 ATM Water Resistant
Genuine Leather Straps with quick-release function
40 mm Case Diameter

story:
You’re hot. We can help. Turns out our body temperature plays a key role in how well we sleep. Hot sleep can cause fragmented sleep, which in turn can have subtle effects on things like complex memory retention, mood, alertness, and more.

 

 

The next innovative sleepwear collection that will help you sleep cooler and drier. The Cool Collection is made of your favorite Pima cotton, blended with TransDry and XT2 fibers.

 

 

TransDRY helps to move moisture across a greater surface area of the body, stopping it from pooling in unwanted places, keeping you cooler and drier at night.

XT2 fibers utilize the antimicrobial properties of silver to stop odor by inhibiting the growth of bacteria and fungi that consumes sweat and cause odors. This means your Cool pieces will stay smelling fresher, longer.

This sleepwear is designed to function like your favorite active wear, but is made with natural fibers—and you don’t need to leave your bed for it to work.

 

 
 
 

 

 

EVERY-BODY TEE

    

 

 

SLEEP SET

    

 

 

    

 

 

    

 

 

    

 

 

    

 

 

ROMPER

    

 

 

    

 

 

    

 

 

    

 

 

    

 

 

Perk 1; Cool Muscle Tee + Cool Short

Your booty will look so hot in these shorts that you’ll need to cool down…Don’t worry, they’re built for that. Pima Cotton infused with XT2 and TransDRY technology to keep you cooler and drier at night • Slightly higher rise + waistband for flattering fit • Deep back pocket—can fit all iPhone sizes • Sewn down elastic band so no twisting or bunching • Double-layered with raw edge hemline • Clean interior seams between fabric layers = comfy in the V zone • Great for hot sleepers • Machine wash cold + tumble dry low • $78 • Made in the USA • Sizes: XS–XL • Colors: White, Brisk, & Black

Look hot but stay cool in the Lunya Cool Muscle Tee! Imbued with tech that’s designed to help moisture evaporate quickly, so sweaty sleepwear can be a thing of the past.  Pima Cotton infused with XT2 and TransDRY technology will keep you cooler and drier at night • Underarm “boob catcher”—no nip slips happening here • Rounded high/low hem for extra coverage • Great for hot sleepers • Machine wash cold + tumble dry low • $68 • Made in the USA • Sizes: XS–XL • Colors: White, Brisk, & Black 

 

Items Included:

1 Lunya Cool Short

1 Cool Muscle Tee

 

Estimated Delivery — July 2018

 

 

 

 

Perk 2; Cool Romper

Versatile, on-trend, and so damn comfortable—you’ll want to live in this piece, and now you can since our XT2 tech will keep your garment smelling fresh no matter how many days in a row that you wear it.  Pima Cotton infused with XT2 and TransDRY technology to keep you cooler and drier at night • Soft v-neckline with a low back • Semi-cropped wide leg • Kangaroo pocket at front • Itching and chafing be gone—clean edges at neckline and arms for ultra-comfort • Great for hot sleepers  • Machine wash cold + tumble dry low • $178 • Made in the USA • Sizes: XS–XL • Colors: White, Brisk, & Black 

 

Items Included:

1 Lunya Cool Romper

 

Estimated Delivery — July 2018

 

 
 
Perk 3; Everybody Tee
 

The every night tee, made for every-body. Wear it with or without a bottom... this tee covers the bum, leaving you with options. Pima Cotton infused with XT2 and TransDRY technology to keep you cooler and drier at night • Round neckline  • Left chest pocket • Great for hot sleepers  • Machine wash cold + tumble dry low • $88 • Made in the USA • Sizes: XS/S/M, L/XL • Colors: Brisk  

 

Items Included:

1 Lunya Cool Everybody Tee

 

Estimated Delivery — July 2018

 
 

 

 

lunya.co   |   @lunya.co

story:
Short Summary

My name is Nathan Broyles, I'm married to my wife Caitlyn and we recently had our first son Dillon on February 14th of this year.  

When I was nine years old I was diagnosed with type 1 diabetes.  Struggling with this disease has made me wish it didn't exist.  From day one I have had a dream of bettering the world by aiding charities.  That is what Vision One aims to do.  But then I thought, why stop at diabetes?  The six colors in the "O" each represent a different charity that our proceeds will go to.  Education, Environment, Breast Cancer, Diabetes, AIDS, and Hunger.

Your contribution will go to help start the company that aims to tackle world problems through helping what we feel are the best charities across the globe.

What We Need & What You Get

With your contribution right off the bat proceeds will go to the six charities listed as well as helping us start our production of our apparel products.  We need a very humble $1500 to launch our initial stages of production.  We have calculated this very carefully and will use exactly what we need to kick-off our company and contribute the rest to our six charities.

By purchasing any of our perks you get access to things that nobody else will EVER have access to!  From a signed thank you card and being listed on our website to first edition apparel or a lifetime discount!

If we do not reach our goal we will donate all of the money we receive equally among the charities and keep none for our start.  If this happens we will hopefully relaunch in the future.

The Impact

Our products will go to help several charities across the globe.  Every purchase of every product we sell goes to benefit all sorts of people all over the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute we hope that you can still tell your friends about us and our vision.

Thanks in advance for your support!

Nathan Broyles,

Founder Of Vision One

story:
My goal

My goal is to make sure that every woman has perfect make up even though light conditions are not optimal. With your finacial involvement, I will be able to turn my prototype into reality.

My girlfriend inspired me

When my girlfriend needed to check her make up in the evening when light condition were not good, I got the idea to equipe a make up mirror with LED lights.  

How Beauty LED works

Beauty LED is a make up mirror equiped with LED lights on strip powered by battery.

LED lights are placed reverse in order to give optimal light difusion and avoid direct glare. 

Color of LED lights is optimized to bring you daylight condition.

LED lights are turned on/off when cover is open/closed.

Beauty LED can be used as a helpful handy spotlight.


Colors for illustration


Next step

I want to introduce a whole range of Beuty LED make up mirrors (various colors, shapes and materials)

story:
Originally from a small town in Wisconsin, traveling the world, moving to the West Coast, and now to the foothills of Colorado, designer Beth Fuge has been inspired to create things that work with the environment and help to sustain the beauty we are surrounded by each and every day. Beth studied sustainable design and jumped into a small company in Portland, Oregon that taught her the beginnings of sustainable fashion that could be produced just a few miles from her ouse. After working through an internship, and being offered a production manager position, Beth turned away opportunities to follow personal dreams, and Salvaged Seams was started.

Created from unique materials and upcycled pieces, Salvaged Seams creates environmentally friendly fashions through recycling and the use of sustainable materials. Each piece is cut out sewn, dyed, and completed in Fort Collins, Colorado. Most items are one of a kind as they are created from vintage slips, dresses, shirts, or any material that can be reworked into fashion. Aside from vintage materials, Salvaged SEams also features sustainable fabrics such as organic cotton, hemp blends, recycled materials, soy blends, silks, wool, and bamboo to create eco-friendly comfortable fashions.

Salvaged Seams blends vintage pieces with modern sustainability that is produced in the United States. With this fundraiser Salvaged Seams can develop and grow. By donating to Salvaged Seams, you are helping a small business grown, and there some great perks for every donation!

What We Need & What You Get

Right now Salvaged Seams is hoping to raise $5,000 to get production started, place merchandise in shops in the Fort Collins/Denver area, start an online retail store, and supply a sewing studio with fabric and production supplies.

All of the funding will go to production of clothing, and here is a more detailed breakdown of where the money goes:

  • Design Studio and Production rental space --a great location in the downtown of the bustling college town, right above great retail locations
  • Fabric Supplies --wholesale organic fabrics can range from $7/yard to $30/yard depending on a specific material!
  • Production Supplies --pattern paper, scissor sharpening, thread, zippers, lace, etc.
  • Marketing & Merchandising --traveling to neighboring communities to stock stores with Salvaged Seams, creating stickers and cards, getting personalized hang tags and labels.

 

Some of the funds will also go towards the creation of some wonderful perks for supporting Salvaged Seams! Each donation is greatly appreciated, and Salvaged Seams will be sending out perks once the fundraiser is over.

 

*If Salvaged Seams doesn't reach the goal of $5,000, whatever is raised will still go towards the production of sustainable clothing.

 

*If Salvaged Seams surpasses the goal of $5,000, that money will go towards becoming more efficient and produce more. Depending it could mean an industrial sewing machine, or more organic fabric!

A hooded scarf could be just the thing to keep you warm in the coming winter months! With a $40 donation the hooded scarf can carry you through the cold season, with it's organic cotton soy blend material, naturally a soft white hue or dyed a color of your choice! The hooded scarf can also just be worn as a cozy infinity scarf with no hood!

The Dolman Tunic is one of the perks that you can get in on during this fundraiser. The perks will be sent out before more of these garments are produced, so you could be one of the first to own a super comfortable, sustainable garment made in the United States!

 

 The Spiced Cardigan is made from 55% Hemp and 45% Organic Cotton. This is the perfect sweater jacket for covering up on cool autumn evenings or layering up in the blustery winter!

Salvaged Seams is about bringing life back into forgotten, almost discarded clothing and materials, as well as incorporating new innovative sustainable fabrics to create fashion for today's consumer. Producing in the United States keeps things flowing from design to production to retail very quickly, and one day could provide jobs in the community. When customers learn about Salvaged Seams, they feel proud to support a local designer, a local business, and the money they spend stays within the community/state/country.

We are working to get some samples sewn up and photographed of some of the perks, so stay tuned and check back often for pictures and updated perks!!! 

 Thank you to all that have helped Salvaged Seams so far:

Posy Quarterman Photography in Portland, Oregon, for the lace dress photograph 
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Posy-Quarterman-Photography/103834299361 

Two C's Photography in Fort Collins, Colorado, for the photography that was used in the video for this fundraiser
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Two-Cs-Photography/128711163878284 

Cherchez la Femme in Fort Collins, Colorado, for letting me photograph some of their employees, and allowing me to sell Salvaged Seams in their shop!
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Cherchez-La-Femme/286272354777337 

To all of the family members and friends that have helped me along in any and all ways, Salvaged Seams wouldn't be where it is today without you!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you believe in what Salvaged Seams is doing, please help by spreading the word, sharing with friends and family! 
The IndieGoGo share tools are a great way to get everyone you know involved.

Thank you for supporting! Salvaged Seams is truly grateful!!!!!

story:
Short Summary

Meet 7 yr old gymnast Azalea who has a  true passion for gymnastics. In this video she performs her gold medal floor routine at the Planet Fall Festival in Hattiesburg Mississippi. She performed this winning routine with a strained knee and she gave it her all like a true champion. She has been doing this sport of gymnastics for 3 1/2 years. She started when she was 3 and has rapidly advanced with her natural athletic ability ( something I believe she inherited from her uncle Leroy). She has been invited to compete at the Houston Invitational Gymnastics Competion on February 23 in Houston. We are asking for your help to get her there.

What We Need & What You Get

Breaking it down,

We need to be able to cover the drive from here to Houston and back which we estimate to be $250.

The hotel that has been discounted for the meet attendees is Hilton Americas next to the Convention center and the discounted rate a night is $147 per night. The advantage to staying there is that it is adjacent to the convention center- the location of the meet and she will be able to be as rested as possible before her competiion that morning where she must check in at 7:30 am.

 We have estimated food costs at $300 for the two days, including the drive there and back.

The Impact

You have the opportunity to help a little girl pursue her passions of being a competitive athlete at such a young age. She will get to see what it is like to compete on a different arena with many highly talented competitors from all over. I believe it is a good opportunity for her to see what is beyond this local gymnastics arena and she can be proud of herself when she is able to benchmark herself against other talented little athletes from all over. She is excited and determined to compete in this competition and the experience would be truly a great character building experience for her. Due to the hight costs incurred each month for Azalea and Alina (Azalea's little sister)  gymnastics tuition and for registration and participation at the local meets, it is not within our budget to facilitate Azalea attending the Houston Invitational. We turn to you to help us make Azalea's goal to compete and shine at the Houston Invitational Gymnastics a dream come true for her and an experience she will always cherish.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to help financially at this time, please wish her well on her gymnastics journey and say a prayer for her continued success. Azalea and I thank you for your consideration and hope that we can count on your future support.

We turn to you to help us make Azalea's goal to compete and shine at the Houston Invitational Gymnastics a dream come true for her and an experience she will always cherish.


Other Ways You Can Help
If you are not able to help financially at this time, please wish her well on her gymnastics journey and say a prayer for her continued success. Azalea and I thank you for your consideration and hope that we can count on your future support.

story:
Dressed to Kill

The gist:
Using Spoonflower.com, A.E. Kieren (www.aekieren.com, www.youhaveheartworms.com) is illustrating and designing a collection of custom patterned fabrics on the themes of poison and violence.

 From there, Juli and Alexandra Abene (from the wardrobe department of Sleep No More) will be designing and sewing the patterned fabrics into a line of one-of-a-kind, dramatic, spectacular garments.  
In lieu of a traditional fashion show, the dresses will be shown in a free and open-to-the-public cabaret show (with music supervision by Tony Jarvis) on Thursday, September 4th (the opening of NYC Fashion Week) at a to-be-announced venue. The looks will be modeled by a lovely retinue of singers including Cristina Gatti, Karen Marie, Megh Dixon, Cristina Kaminis of Carte Blanche, Julia Haltigan, Gretchen Wylder, and other fabulous surprise guests!

What We Need & What You Get

Ten separate dresses featuring ten separate custom patterned fabrics are planned. To produce these garments we need 4 to 5 yards per dress of custom fabrics ordered and made (ranging between $20 and $50 per yard) as well as other fine fabrics and materials to complete the construction of the twins' visions.  Any leftover funding will be put towards hair, makeup and styling of the model singers for the cabaret show on Thursday, September 4th, 

We have lots of perks for our funders!

The biggest being that the first donation of $500 will receive the original signed art of "Ginger the Can-Can Canadian, #9" (A.E. Kieren, watercolor, 2014) featured on www.youhaveheartworms.com   and modeled by national treasure Ginger Kearns 

The Impact

  • This is a dream project for all three of us, we are extremely excited to be working together on something that combines our interests in art, fashion, and putting on a show.  For the supremely talented Juli and Alexandra, this is a rare opportunity to sew their own, original designs.  

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to funding us for the production of the materials, you can also help in the following ways:
Are you a hair/makeup artist who would be available on Thursday Sept 4th to help style the singer-models?
Do you have vintage accessories such as hats, gloves, handbags, or shoes that you could lend to us for styling the singer-models for the big cabaret show on Thursday Sept 4th and/or an ancillary photoshoot in early September?
Are you Lana Del Rey and you want to be one of our singer-models? That can be arranged. 
Also, please share the campaign with all your lovers and friends, and of course, attend the event on Thursday Sept 4th!

story:
Short Summary

Michael is a functional guy with a desire to embrace the world of fast fashion.  (He is fully aware of this campaign and is excited about the possibilities.) 

What We Need & What You Get

We need $500 basically because that is the minimum that Indiegogo would allow us to raise.  Michael could easily get an outfit for less than that at Zara, but this will allow him to really spice it up with some added swag.

    The Impact

    Michael will feel better about himself in class.  He may even spontaneously get up, kick Tauhid in the chest, and scream primally, "This is ZARA!!"

      Risks & Challenges

      Once we unleash the power within Michael, there may be no harnessing it.  People will flock to him magnetically due to his impeccable fashion sense.

        Other Ways You Can Help

        Let other people know about the campaign.  Send this to your family and friends.  Let Michael know how good he would look in Zara threads.

story:
INDIEGOGO funder update!

I will be going through all the funder emails and emailing everyone tomorrow. This is simply because there are that many that it will take me a full day to get through them all (I cannot say thank you enough!) and today I need to make sure the usual admin and orders are sorted beforehand. I'm very excited to see what you all pick for your first wig and truly am absolutely overwhelmed by the amazing response and kindness of you all <3 Thank you all so much!

 

I have been running Geisha Wigs for just over six months now and feel very lucky that I have a business that means so much to me! However being the only person running the business, this means I am struggling to go to the next level due to lack of finances. This is where you may come in, and I will make sure you all get a lovely reward for your contribution!

 

Geisha Wigs' main aim is to provide beautiful hair at reasonable prices. Having worn some kind of hair extensions for over 10 years, and wigs for a good couple of years, I have a personal love for wigs. Wearing a wig means I can change my look whenever I feel like it, without damaging my own hair with dyes or extensions. It also gives me a lot of confidence, and from what I have been told by my lovely customers, I am not alone on this. This in itself makes me feel so happy, that I can perhaps help people feel a little more secure and happy in themselves.

 

I have decided to set up this fundraiser, as I have so many ideas and plans for Geisha Wigs, but financially I am unable to achieve these alone, and without increasing the prices I charge customers. As I pride myself on providing beautiful wigs at reasonable prices, I am unwilling to raise the prices and therefore have decided to ask for small donations, in exchange for exclusive items and services.

 

Should my project get accepted, I will use the money to buy the stock for the new collection, including clothing and accessories aswell as wigs.

 

I cannot thank you all enough for taking the time to read this, whether you contribute or not (as I know that times are very hard right now), the fact that you have shown an interest means such a lot, thank you.

story:
Teaching basketball—and life skills—to kids in the San Francisco Bay Area 

Basketball saved my life.

I grew up poor in New Orleans, a city where 38% of the population lives in poverty and only one in 12 adults holds a college degree. My mother was strong and intelligent, but she had to raise four kids on her own while fighting an autoimmune disease. “No one owes you anything,” she would tell me. “You will have to earn everything yourself.” 

 I didn’t listen to her. Instead, I lashed out at teachers in school. Soon, if I wasn’t in detention I wasn’t in school at all. I’d begun the negative spiral whose effects I saw all around me; I’d started down the path that in my neighborhood led to drugs, crime, and too often early death. 

But I didn’t take that path. Basketball rescued me.

I began playing in community centers. High school coaches recognized my promise and encouraged me. They made me understand the skills I acquired on the basketball court could be transferred to other parts of my life. They made me see that I wouldn't be a truly successful basketball player unless my athletic abilities were matched by academic achievement. And that character counted—both on and off the court. By my senior year I was the fourth-ranked high school basketball player in Louisiana. I went on to play for Northwestern Oklahoma State University and for San Francisco State University, where I earned my B.S. in Recreation Administration/Community Outreach. 

Now, in my 20s, I work in the biotech industry and am the father of a terrific 6-year-old son who’s already a promising basketball player.

 For the last five years I’ve been coaching, part time, with individual players who can testify to my work ethic and my rapport with athletes of different skill levels. Now I want to share my passion for basketball to an entire new generation of kids. 

There are a lot of good basketball programs out there—I've coached at some of them. What makes my 5A Athletes program different is the way in which it emphasizes both basketball skills and life skills. The mission statement of 5A Athletes is “Putting the Student Back in Athletics.” The 5As are: 

 —ACADEMICS. I put this first because it's my program's core value. I teach kids that the hard work they put in on the basketball court needs to be matched by hard work in the classroom.

—ATTITUDE. A positive attitude generates positive responses from the people around you—from coaches, from teachers, from parents.

—ACCOUNTABILITY. You have to earn everything yourself. Other people can help, but in the end your success on the basketball court, and in life, comes from you.

—ATHLETICS. It's not just making baskets or winning games. It's learning to work as a team.

And it's learning to perform at your highest level in all parts of your life. —ACHIEVEMENT.

Learning to take pride in your accomplishments. But also learning that the most valuable accomplishments are those that push you toward further achievement. 

My 5A Athletes program is designed for boys and girls from ages 6 through high school. It's meant for kids who are serious about becoming star basketball players. But I also take special pride in working with kids who don't necessarily think of themselves as athletic. Your donation will fund a pilot 5A Athletes training program that will run from July-August. With your kind help, I can share my passion and expertise with kids who want to experience the joys, challenges and lessons that basketball can provide.

Risks and challenges

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES. My main challenge is financial. To set up a successful pilot basketball program requires renting gymnasium space, paying for liability insurance, and launching marketing efforts. Fortunately, having coached in the Bay Area for five years, I have good ties to many of the gymnasium facilities in the area. Liability insurance is not inexpensive, but should be manageable with the aid of Kickstarter and program tuition. As for marketing, I'll be using my network of contacts—current and past students and their parents, local schools and YMCAs—as well as social media to spread the word about 5A Athletes.

story:
Our Story

 

We had a vision to create something that was beyond us…something that would truly leave a mark for generations to come. We wanted something that represented, honored and celebrated our cultural backgrounds as Latinos…we wanted to take it back to our roots…our childhoods…the streets…to the things that made us part of who we are today. But, we also wanted to blend in the urban, hip, cool elements that we grew up with as a result of living in the USA…the “American” things that also made up part of who we are today.

 

We wanted something that was chic, trend-setting, unique, artistic and truly revolutionary…a movement. We wanted it to be something that was strong and powerful and that instilled a sense of pride and passion for celebrating who we are…who many of us are…bilingual, bi-cultural Latinos.

 

And thus, Latyn Republik, was born as a lifestyle clothing company. Welcome to our world…the new “America”…where the spirit of the hustler…the entrepreneur can take you anywhere you want to go. We hope to continue to entertain you with witty creations, keep you connected to your roots and more importantly, inspire you to dream big and take risks!

 

Gracias!

 

Pride. Passion. Corazón.

Co-Creators: Jose C. and Jen F.

 

 

The Impact

See above :)

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need the funds for the following:

Business Cards

All the legal stuff (setting up LLC, Selling Permits, copyrights, etc.)

Inventory

Branding/Marketing

Website

$25 or more donation, gets you a free shirt!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell your family, friends, co-workers, neighbors, the mailman...everybody about these amazingly cool shirts!

Share it on Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, etc.

story:
About UltraPower

7 Premium Li-ion battery cells from Samsung add an extra 18200mAh to the battery life of your smartphone, tablet or digital camera. The Power Bank is capable of 12 full recharges for the Iphone 6.

World-class circuit chip protection.

Adopted USB smart-control chips and charging/discharging chips from Samsung

UP not only provides nine layers of circuit chip protection, but also enhances efficiency.

With a simple touch of the button,  LED indicators will tell you the battery status, so you can see how much power is stored in the wink of an eye.

Optimized charging/discharging efficiency up to 93% conversion rate%

World-class IC chips are not only safer, but improve charging conversion rate and stabilize discharging voltage with advanced resistance-capacitance sensors to optimize efficiency and durability.

Compatible with all popular smartphones.The charging port automatically adjusts the output.

Ultra Power - Power Bank automatically adjusts its output based on the connected device. It's compatible with smartphones and tablets from  Apple, Samsung, HTC, Google and BlackBerry as well as a variety of digital cameras and handheld gaming devices.

The Ultra Power  is crafted from high-grade ABS+PC and vanished with UV oil which gives the Ultra Power a smooth feel.  It houses an internal  7 high-capacity Samsung batteries  which provides 18200mAh to charge the average smartphone up to 12 times.

ALWAYS THERE WHEN YOU NEED IT! 

With a tap or a shake; the handle of the Ultra Power  doubles as a LED light which provides hours of light... Which can be used both indoor and outdoor. 

With this indispensable accessory, you can simply recharge your mobile device anywhere you go. In that way you can provide your smartphone, tablet, GPS, MP3 and other mobile devices with extra energy while you are on the go.

The Ultra Power is ideal for business trips, holidays, emergencies,outdoor activities, or daily use. 

With this manageable mobile charger you are always equipped with a back-up battery whenever and wherever you need it!

VIDEOS

Details

Capacity: 7 high-capacity Samsung batteries 18200mAh
Output: 5V 1.5A (triple USB interfaces)
Input: 5V 2A
Size(mm):65(Diameter)*145(Height)
Weight: 300g
Package: 1pcs/color box/ctn
Certificate:  FCC CE,Rohs 3C
Colors: White
Material&Process:ABS+PC + UV Oil finish

Charge times for iPhone: 12 times

TEAMS

Team MicroElements

MicroElements is a young 2-year-old technology company. We're a small team of friends with a mad set of skills ranging from engineering and programming to design and innovation. 

We started working together some years ago on several new concepts with the aim of creating innovative solutions that would make life easier for everyone who used them. We believe in innovation and breakthrough, and that every problem must have a solution.

Team Goingwin

Goingwin is an experienced international industrial design organization; it covers every part of industrial design with its professional services.  We specialize in consideration of design, modeling, material, technology and production. And we have a wealth of factory resources including prototyping, modeling, injection molding, metals and assembling. Our vertical integrate services can guarantee the implement of product design, which covers every part from primary design to mass production.

Funding Goal

So today I'm reaching out through Indiegogo for backing in order to secure enough orders to go through a complete manufacturing cycle. The prototypes we've manufactured have provided proof of concept, and we're satisfied with the vendors that we've selected, but it's not until we've gone through a production run that we will know where product alterations, re-designs or vendor changes will need to take place. 

We've already invested a substantial amount of our own money into the design and development process, including tooling, electrical engineering, mechanical engineering, and environmental testing and are nearly ready to begin production.

Ultimately your support will allow us to continue making game changing products that you probably want, so please support us, we won't let you down.


Your support will allow us to go through this necessary production curve and bring this product to market.  See below for more details on each product.

What's Next?

We’re now getting ready to start full production of the UP but we need your help to accomplish that. With the support from Indiegogo we'll be able to start our first full manufacturing run and we will start shipping them to you by December'

 We had to use ultra high density components and figure out ways to integrate everything to optimize the proportion.

Our team has a very strong background for design for manufacturing. We have the parts sourcing, manufacturing flow and testing procedures well defined. If the demand is high, we will be able to scale production and logistics accordingly.

Schedule 

Assuming we meet our funding goal, the anticipated timeline is as follows:


For full disclosure, this is a very aggressive timeline and we really can't have many things go wrong in order to get product out to our backers within this timeframe.  In fact, in order for us to make this schedule a reality, we're going to have to get a good sense that this project will fund by the end of September, late October.  

While we've stated February 2015 as the anticipated ship date for the product backer rewards, we are going to give it our best effort to fulfill rewards by mid December 2014.

I've learned that just because you can make it work on paper, doesn't mean it will work in reality :).  As much as we can control it, order fulfillment will be determined on a first come/first serve basis, so if getting product before Christmas is important to you, back us early and tell your friends!


ADD-ONs

BalanceBeam G2 - $8

2600mAh pocket size battery 

 Great for a quick charge. Free shipping to the continental US 

International Shipping please add $5 (if you already ordered and UltraPower G3 shipping is included)

Video

We’re now getting ready to start full production of the UP but we need your help to accomplish that. With the support from Indiegogo we'll be able to start our first full manufacturing run and we will start shipping them to you by December'
 We had to use ultra high density components and figure out ways to integrate everything to optimize the proportion.
Our team has a very strong background for design for manufacturing. We have the parts sourcing, manufacturing flow and testing procedures well defined. If the demand is high, we will be able to scale production and logistics accordingly.
Schedule 
Assuming we meet our funding goal, the anticipated timeline is as follows:

For full disclosure, this is a very aggressive timeline and we really can't have many things go wrong in order to get product out to our backers within this timeframe.  In fact, in order for us to make this schedule a reality, we're going to have to get a good sense that this project will fund by the end of September, late October.  
While we've stated February 2015 as the anticipated ship date for the product backer rewards, we are going to give it our best effort to fulfill rewards by mid December 2014.
I've learned that just because you can make it work on paper, doesn't mean it will work in reality :).  As much as we can control it, order fulfillment will be determined on a first come/first serve basis, so if getting product before Christmas is important to you, back us early and tell your friends!
ADD-ONs
BalanceBeam G2 - $8

2600mAh pocket size battery 
 Great for a quick charge. Free shipping to the continental US 
International Shipping please add $5 (if you already ordered and UltraPower G3 shipping is included)


Video

story:
Short Summary

My name is Jonel Cordero and I created and currently own a small fashion boutique in Downtown Seattle. I love the feeling when a customer comes in and finds an item that truly makes them happy and helps them express who they are because that's what fashion really is. As Rachel Zoe says "Style is a way to say who you are without having to speak.”

I want to make fashion more accessible. Plain and simple. That feeling of when you are sporting that brand new look shouldn't be only on special occasions but happen everyday.


We're talking about changing the face of the fashion retail business. I wish to create Bluebag, because I believe it's something not quite out there. Gwynnie Bee may be the closest thing out there, but imagine if a place existed where you could constantly change and refresh your outfit at no extra cost, whenever you want.

What We Need & What You Get

Our Indiegogo campaign is for 50k. This funding along with additional funding from private investors will go towards the creation of an interactive website for our online service and the creation of 2 (not 1) Bluebag showrooms in the greater Seattle Area. 

We will also begin purchasing inventory from designers for our members.

There are various perks we are offering toward this goal which includes various prepaid monthly membership at crazy discounted prices, exclusive gear only for our indiegogo. Heck, we even would engrave your name on one of the store hangers if you want.

Even if the goal is not fully reached, funding will go in order towards: 

  1. The creation of our online service at Bluebag.co
  2. Purchasing of inventory.
  3. The opening of our 1st showroom.
  4. The opening of our 2nd showroom.

The Impact

We provide an option not yet available to the everyday fashionista. Think tux rentals in combination with a library(to those that remember what a library is!) but for everyday clothing that allows you to change your style and look and experiment with styles not before considered; at no extra cost. 

Youth can simply start renting the next size up, a dress for the school dance, or just the confidence that comes with a new outfit. Adults can refresh their work attire, or dress to impress the next date. All of these options, with no final sale cost and at a price that's cumulatively lower then the average amount currently being spent by the average american.


Risks & Challenges

An attempt such as this is challenging especially for what we are trying to accomplish. This is a service that requires educating our audience but I feel once consumers understand the value of the service, a long term relationship is almost guaranteed. 

This value includes customers understanding the value of items we would be providing. Quality designer pieces of clothing that comparatively speaking perhaps you would not quite see at a Neiman Marcus or a Barneys and definitely not at Forever21; but rather at Nordstrom or Anthropologie.

Ease of access is critical which is why we wish to open 2 showrooms immediately. The question to ask is that would it be the same if Redbox only had one kiosk available? Exactly. Though the online service would be available, our mission is to make fashion more accessible and quicker then our competitors. 

We hope that the brick and mortar locations create a proof of concept immediately for quick expansion so we can make the complete bluebag experience available to everyone.


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute today, there definitely ways you can help! Sharing this indiegogo will definitely help get the word out of the Bluebag revolution!

story:
We’ve all been there hopelessly staring in front of the mirror Monday morning--contemplating on how we want to style our hair that morning.

 

We look at the clock and time is running out.

We try self-styling, but it doesn’t come out the way we want.

 

We try re-washing our hair, but the wax residue isn’t completely washed away causing us to waste more time.

 

Sometimes, our hair looks sticky, greasy and straight up unappealing because we don’t know how to style it properly.

 

 

 

 

 

 

To fix these problems, we introduce SPEAR WAX – an all-in-one product that includes two magic combs and a creamy hair wax to curate that perfect hairstyle.

 

 

 

 

Styling hair can be a very difficult process. To make this complicated process less burdensome, professional hair designers invented the detailed spear comb to make even a ham-fisted get that perfect hairdo quickly and easily. 

 

The biggest difference between a hair stylist and a normal person is: Hair stylists begin styling from the hair roots. Hair wax needs to be evenly distributed from the end of the roots to display that perfect volume and hold. The delicate details of the spear comb combined with the creamy wax can transform YOU into a professional hair designer. 

 

 

 

 

With 11 perfectly positioned delicate spears in the comb, the combs can create a suave texture and volume in the hair while creating a natural curl. You might even get asked, “Did you get your hair done today?”  If you want to calm those flyaways on the side, you can also use the sub-spears that’s attached to the cap to tamp them down.

 

 

 

The creamy hair wax can be washed off easily without much trouble. You won’t see a bit of residue left after one wash. No worries if you don’t like the hair you just styled--just quickly wash your hair and restyle for perfection! 

 

 

 

 

We couldn’t believe it either. SpearWax’s insane smooth spreadability makes us even doubt if it is a hair wax. The soft and smoothness paired with the non-greasy formulation helps create the strongest hold and consistency, and you’ll be able to create whatever hairstyle you want quickly.

 

 

 

Hair health is extremely important as well. Rosin is the perfect ingredient because it contains a hardening agent. Spear Wax uses naturally extracted pine rosin extracts for the safest and healthiest ingredients. You can experience the strong setting from the most perfect ingredient from nature.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Filled with a fragrance inspired by the Bahama Ocean’s romantic and refreshing vibes. This modern and trendy scent will be the perfect final touch to your sensational hair.

 

 

 

 

STYLING TIPS

  • Start evenly distributing the cream wax beginning from the inner part of your hair
  • Put a small amount of wax on your hands and press down on your sides and flyaways for a clean finish

 

 

 

 

STYLING TIPS:

  • Split the bang/forehead area and begin drying the hair, giving the hair enough volume
  • Apply the movement wax and begin from the inner part of the split bangs

 

 

 

 

STYLING TIPS:

  • Decide which direction you want to part the hair and begin drying
  • Apply the pomade wax and finish styling

 

 

 

*Spear Wax hair waxes can be used for 2-3 months depending on the frequency.

*Expiration Date: 24 months after its manufacturing date / 12 months after the first date of us
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
  1. Apply on the crown of the head first. Hair may clump if it’s applied on the bangs first
  2. Apply evenly on the top and side hair. Shake in zig-zag lines and apply all the way to the root. If you need more, add a little more on the spear and use
  3. Styling Bangs—Use the comb without any wax on it to style
  4. Push the flyaways with the sub spear that can be found when you open the cap

 

 

 

 

 

 

SpearWax’s story begins in a hair salon by a professional hair stylist, Evan Lee. 

He was only in middle school where he perfected his technique and style at a young age and quickly rose to become an accomplished hairstylist. He worked his way up the ladder to becoming one of Korea’s premier hair stylists.

Eventually having worked with many products available on the market, he was compelled to invent his own products that would be easy to use and help you achieve salon-inspired looks, right in front of your mirror.

He developed a handful of products that really succeeded in the market. Now, he is coming with Spear Wax--a product never seen before in the hair market that transforms you into a professional hair designer.

For:Beaut is different. We are challengers against the cliche, heading to the next level that other competitors cannot be chased on. Top notch ideas are developing followed by countless studies and researches to get on the top of the industry.

For:Beaut is always new. We focus on our customers’ fun and stylish beauty life. For:Beaut will lead customers to make their lives easier and beautiful. Experience the ultimate ‘BEAUTY LIFE’ simply over the product.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our priority is to bring you, our wonderful backers, your Spear Wax in good time so you can start benefiting from it as soon as possible. Our team has put a lot of time, research and care into creating this all-in-one product that will add convenience, efficiency and STYLE to your busy life.

 We are proud to say that Spear Wax production is ready to go, so as soon as you support our campaign, we can manufacture your device and start shipping as promised in January 2021 without any delay.

 

We already have an existing technical and quality control team to quickly start production as soon as the campaign closes. We are confident that we will start shipping as soon as we collect the shipping information from the backers.

 

Of course, there could be unforeseen factors that may cause unexpected delays. However, our team will do our best to resolve the issues as soon as possible and keep our backers updated. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at spearwax@vizstarter.com

story:
Meet the Pink Frog Dog Harness

 

 

Happy Dog = Happy Life

Simple is better.

When shopping for our own pets, we noticed that most of the harnesses on the shelves were difficult to put on. You shouldn’t need special instructions to put on a dog harness! You need instructions to put together IKEA furniture (and maybe a degree in engineering with the patience of a saint), we get that, but putting a harness on your dog before a walk should be simple. This is why our harness is designed to have only TWO steps that you need to follow:

 

 

Step out of the dark

Our team is based in Canada, meaning a lot of short days and long nights during the winter months. Boiled down, our entire year usually looks something like this:

Safety is so important. We wanted to make sure that your dog is visible at night, especially to passing cars. We added super reflective piping in four locations across the chest and the back to ensure that your dog is seen.
 

 

Harness the Power of Social Media!

Like and share our pages to help spread the word!

 

 

Get Comfy

Fit and comfort should never be sacrificed. Not for your favourite jeans or for your dog. We took this into consideration when creating our design. We can’t help you fit into your old jeans (sorry!), but we can ensure that our harnesses are the most comfortable for your dog to wear. We added soft and cushiony neoprene across the chest and back to prevent irritation spots that can be caused by rubbing from basic straps.

We also want to keep your dog dry during less than ideal weather conditions. Neoprene is water resistant and quick drying so it will help keep your best friend dry and happy.

 

All that and a Bag of Bones

Who said you have to sacrifice looks for function?  If you know that person, please put them on a time out. Seriously do it.  

We use 100% nylon strapping with a tensile strength of 2,500 lbs to ensure that  it won’t  tear or rip.  (GEEK stuff: Tensile strength is the measurement of the force that is required to pull something such as rope to the point where it breaks.) So unless your dog has out of this world, super dog strength, we got you covered!

The best part is how good it looks. Forget about boring black and blue (but don’t worry we have those colours too), we offer six amazing colours in all the perfect shades.

Gorgeous RED for your more traditional dogs.

Stunning TEAL for your blue eyed babes.

Beautiful PINK for your heart breakers.                            

Popular PURPLE for your trendsetters.

Eye catching GREEN for your outdoor enthusiasts

Tough dog BLACK in case they don’t want to show their softer side.

 

Dirt Happens

Let’s face it, dogs get dirty.  That is what they do and that is what we love about them. Just not so much the clean up part.

Don’t stress, our PINK FROG harnesses are completely machine washable!  Just toss them in the wash with like colours on a cold or warm temperature setting. Then hang to dry. Like magic* your harness will look and smell like new.  

*It’s not magic, just great design!

 

 

Let’s Get Serious

We don’t mess around with flimsy plastic parts that can crack, break or freeze in the cold weather.  All of our PINK FROG products use only the best metal hardware from clips to slides.

Not only do they look great, they add another level of safety.


Why PINK FROG?

We set out to provide solutions for the everyday needs of both pets and the people who love them.

Pulling from our own personal experiences and a tone of market research, we develop products that are functional and fashionable, without overlooking the smallest details.



 

When designing products, we start at the end and then work our way back. We think about the task first and then create the product. This allows us to create accessories that are more insightful so they work better. We don’t just make a dog harness, we set out to create the absolute best dog harness on the market.

 

 

 

 

We obsess over quality materials and insightful design so that you end up with something exceptional. It's our mission to help you create the best time possible with your best friend.

 

The day a FROG was born

Hi, I’m Renee and this is Max. I have always grown up with pets; cats and dogs mostly and they are a big part of my life. But when I had to shop for them, I was left very disappointed. Either the products that were available were poor quality or bad design. It left me wondering if these companies have ever had owned or even just walked a dog? It just did not make sense to me.   



So I set out to design a line of products that meet my standards. They needed to be designed so that they are easy to use and clean. I don’t believe in throwing money away, so they also had to be built to last. I also wanted products that looked great. I didn’t think that was too much to ask.


 

This is not our First Trip to the Dog Park!

We currently produce other items for dogs that have been in the market since 2016. Our collection of collars and leashes are favoured by many retailers because customers love them. Our desire to create the best damn dog harness came from our customers who kept asking for it. So we listened!

 

Check out these products and more in our online store! 

 

Size Chart

Rewards

Timeline

Risks and challenges

Our factories are ready to go. We’ve worked hard over the last several months to build up these relationships and expect to hit all of our delivery deadlines as planned.

Since we’ve already gone through this process before as we developed other products, we have a lot of experience in these matters. Our team is capable and we know what we’re doing.

With that said, there are inherent risks in the production process that may be beyond control. At any rate we will keep you updated throughout the campaign and manufacturing phase to ensure that we stay as true as possible to the proposed delivery schedule.

We have already produced a small sample run – and some of our lucky friends are already enjoying them.

Stretch Goals

story:
The Merino Tech Line 2.0 is designed for the active, urban and nature dweller. They are busy people making their way through the hustle and bustle to work during the weekdays, exploring in the city or wilderness on the weekend. On cozy Winter days, you can find them in coffee shops, reading a book or the newspaper, sipping on their daily joe. Or perhaps, you will find them lying on the grass with the sun beaming on their freckles on a bright, windy summer afternoon. The Merino Tech Line 2.0 is made for those who make the most of each season.

The 360

Created for the adventurers. Whether you're climbing a mountain in the winter or camping in the summer, The 360 has you covered every step of each day.

Special Note: after voting from the backers, the sleeve opening for 360 Hoodie is now a thumbhole sleeve opening--nylon thumbhole for nylon side and merino thumbhole for merino side.

 

The Minimal

Designed for the weekday warriors, commuting to work and being swift in the process. It is designed with simplicity in mind but functionality at heart. Let The Minimal guide your journey work to date night.

Special Note: after discussing with backers, there will be an optional detachable hood (lined with Merino wool, and with hidden magnets) offered for The Minimal Jackets

 

The Magic of Merino + High Tech Nylon

The Merino Tech 2.0 line is made up of 70% pure Merino wool + high-tech stretchy and water-proof nylon fabric; merino wool is a natural, renewable and biodegradable material that is great for the environment, The natural fibres are lightweight, soft and breathable allowing you to perform in comfort. Merino adapts to your body temperature keeping you warm or cool all year round. A true no-fuss material, Merino wool is odour resistant, machine washable, and can be simply hung for a day to restore its freshness.

Waterproof Nylon: Don't fear the rain! Stay cozy and dry with The Minimal and 360.

 

Water-proof Technique:

Water-proof technology combines fabric and construction to create a resistance: The water-proof membrane part of the jacket allows warmth to remain, while the outer shell propels any liquid.

 

 Both jackets feature waterproof YKK zippers: Keep dry while staying active

Comfort AND Function

Made from Technical Merino and High-tech Stretchy and Ultra-light Nylon fabric, reversible, foldable and created with an innovative pocket system that allows maximum storage for everyday items. Your transit pass will always be handy.

Convenient for Transit

Reversible: For those "Oh no! They saw me in this yesterday!" moments.

 

Foldable: When you just don't feel like tying your jacket around your waist.

 

Maximized Jacket Storage Space: No bags needed. Be swift on your daily commute! This jacket line is perfectly detailed for comfort without compromising style.

 Oversized hood:

 

Built-in microfiber cloth:

Let us take care of you on your next adventure whether you're snowshoeing up Mount Baker, hopping on an airplane, running in the rain or enjoying the summer breeze on top of the Eiffel Tower.

What About Sizes?

There's nothing more annoying than getting a jacket that doesn't fit! Here's a handy chart to help you with sizing.

 

 

 

Timeline:

 

 

 

 

Please Support Our Project

We handpick only the best Merino yarn and Hi-tech Nylon with critical technical properties. And to ensure the best possible quality, we pick the yarn, dye it, and weave it into final fabric ourselves. The entire creation process takes about two months, with jacket production taking an additional three to four weeks. The whole manufacturing process takes up to three months. It's a painstaking process, but the only way we can ensure a perfect final product! We plan to start shipping jackets to our supporters in June.

We already run a successful campaign The Ultimate Merino Running Jacket and have got 100% positive feedback! So the risk for this Merino Tech 2.0 line is minimal. With your support, we can rapidly produce and manufacture more functional and comfortable active wear clothing and accessories.

Stay in Touch

We want to hear from you! Follow our updates here and connect with us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram. You can also send us questions and comments on our Website!

Warranty

1) We accept returns or exchanges if the garment is not dirty or damaged;

2) The customer shall pay the courier cost of sending back the garments to us; we will pay for the courier cost of sending the new garments.

*Please note: Crowdfunding campaigns do not offer returns as the price is already a discounted price compared with regular retail price. However, we will offer returns for our community.

story:
“Smart Tracker 2 GPS tag smashes crowdfunding target...again”

http://www.wareable.com/crowdfund/crowdfunded-gps-smart-tracker-2-will-keep-everything-safe-1425


"The best GPS locators, finders and trackers"

http://www.zdnet.com/pictures/the-best-gps-locators-finders-and-trackers/11/


"According to social media research by Opinium, Indiegogo’s Smart Tracker, a device which allows you to track the whereabouts of anything, is the most talked about social media crowdfunding project this week with 3,226 tweets."

http://news.sky.com/story/1470095/crowdfunding-spotlight-from-website-to-market


“In less than 3 weeks, the device has raised over $180,000 and has reportedly become quite the hit on social media”

http://www.immortal.org/13321/smart-tracker-2-gps-indiegogo-campaign


“Smart Tracker 2 lets you listen in on what's around it”

http://www.trustedreviews.com/news/smart-tracker-2-lets-you-listen-in-on-what-s-around-it



UPSTARTED

List & Hunt #38: New Startups & Tech Millennials Care About

http://www.content-base.co/upstarted/list-hunt-38-new-startups-tech-millennials-care-about/


"follow anything from anywhere in real time with a deadly precision"

http://en.belzino.com/products/smart-tracker-2-the-optimized-gps-tracker


“Smart Tracker 2 that has been designed to be the best real-time GPS tracker created”

http://www.geeky-gadgets.com/smart-tracker-2-raises-over-180000-on-indiegogo-24-07-2015/


“If the cost of the device can be made Indian consumer friendly, without a shadow of a doubt, the device will be picked up by millions around the country. For those of you who can afford it the device is an absolute must to go in the backpack of your child.”

http://www.venturegali.com/2015/07/23/smart-tracker-2-solution-child-safety-india/



"It’s discrete profile makes the device very hard for the untrained eye to identify"

http://onlineheraldnews.com/smart-tracker-2-announces-launch-of-indiegogo-campaign-offering-a-way-to-crowdfund-the-best-real-time-gps-tracker-ever/




http://www.statusmexico.com/w0614p/tec/rastrea-cualquier-cosa-en-cualquier-momento-y-en-cualquier-parte-del-mundo-videos/


https://www.ridble.com/smart-tracker-2-ufficiale/



http://clapway.com/2015/04/16/gps-tracker123/



http://completeworldnews.com/2015/07/indiegogo-to-bring-smart-tracker-2-to-market/



http://androidworld.nl/accessoires/smart-tracker-2-communiceer-met-je-verloren-spullen/


http://blog.atmel.com/2015/04/17/29214/


http://www.hardwaregazette.com/news/smart-tracker-2-announces-launch-of-12136.htm

http://www.gadgetify.com/smart-tracker/

http://gadgetsin.com/smart-tracker-2-with-a-pre-installed-sim-card.htm


“5 New Inventions That Will Blow Your Pants Off”

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SqTCsttWER0







 






















Does SmartTracker  2 works in my country ?

We invite you to check your local network provider, Smart Tracker 2 require a GSM/GPRS network. 

Do I have to pay a subscription?

No,  you will benefit as early contributor of a free web interface. You can also track your Smart Tracker 2 for free with your phone (Working with Google map, compatible Android/iOS/Windows Phone).

Do I need a SIM card ?

Smart Tracker 2 come with a SIM, you don't need to buy your own SIM or pay any fee. Everything is included.

Moreover, SmartTracker 2 has a BlackBox function, if you need passive tracking without real-time tracking you don't need a SIM.

However, if you want real-time tracking, it will use the SIM installed and included. Smart Tracker 2 only use a minimum data and is cost-effective. There is no miracle for this type of technology, Tracker without SIM only give you a coverage of maximum 1km : Smart Tracker 2 works EVERYWHERE.

What will happen after 2 or 3 years ? How can I recharge it ?

You will be able to recharge your SIM. After two (Smart Tracker 2) or three (Smart Tracker 2 Plus) years.

Does the product come with a Warranty?

1.    All orders will be in perfect quality, package condition and will be strictly checked before shipment. 

2.  All orders enjoy 2 years of quality warranty since shipment. We always offer free repairs, whether it’s within or outside of warranty period, but buyers need pay for the accessories cost and shipping cost.

How long does the battery last?

It depend of tracking mode frequency, for example in every 30sec report, battery will last approximately 10h, every minute 20h, every 5 minutes 180h.

Can you get real time updates every 5 seconds or is it only 30?

Yes you can define you real-time tracking mode in 5 sec minimum.

I have contributed for more than one Smart Tracker 2 and want different design? How to do?

The registration form only allow to register one by one your Smart Tracker 2. If you have contributed for example for TWO Smart Tracker 2 and want two different design, you have to register two time with the same pledge ID. If you only register one time, we will consider you want the same design for both tracker.

Is there an alert if it is tampered with?

There is shake alarm function that will alert you if the tracker shake or move.

Can you disable the panic button feature to avoid false alarms for young children?

It's possible.

Can you set a specific MPH or KPH alert notification or is it preset?

You can define a speed alarm limit. When the tracker will exceed the limit, it will alert you.

Does it uses SMS or Data when returning the real-time geographic location so users can see it on Google Map?

You can send an SMS to the tracker to have a Google Map link with the position. Also, you can view in real-time one or more Smart Tracker 2 with your mobile phone or via or web platform (DATA).

Which map software does it use? Will it integrate with google maps?

We will use our own web platform where you will be able to log in with your trackers ID, yes it will be integrated with google maps.

Can the location interval be changed on demand or does it need to be set via a USB cable? For example, we would want the polling to be every 5 minutes but may want to change to 30 seconds if the item is lost or stolen.

Yes it's possible.

How can I recharge the battery inside my Smart Tracker 2 device?

Smart Tracker 2 Plus come with a dock station or you can charge it via USB.

Does it uses SMS or Data when returning the real-time geographic location so users can see it on Google Map?

SMS and DATA, both option are possible.

Can I be refunded ?

Yes, we do accept refund.

What about geocaching for the tracked object/person enter/leave a certain predefined area and will trigger an event/action?

You have can define one or more geo-fenced zone and if the tracker go outside this zone, it can alert you by mail or via mobile app.

What happen if the battery runs out?

Battery is rechargeable and replaceable.  If the tracker doesn’t have battery, it will simply stop working.

Does it still use GPS? A-GPS? Cellular Signal? Or combination of some?

Smart Tracker 2 uses QuecLocator Technology which use cellular signal.

Children can hit anything, can panic button being disabled?

Yes it's possible.

Do you have app for iOS and Android and Web?

Yes, we will provide a powerful web platform, as well app for Android, iOs and Windows Phone to track in real-time one or more trackers.

Can the design be change/mask as a toy watch, so kid is willing to wear it and not obvious to everyone?

No It’s impossible.

Is your product Chinese, I saw similar product in Alibaba ?

No. we have fully designed Smart Tracker 2, it's an unique and high quality  product and have nothing to do with  any tracker you can find in Alibaba or anywhere else.

Is there a fool-proved design for it to not fall ? Kids can get it fall with a clip.

There is not full proved design against fall but final product should be strong enough for usual fall. 

What are the Shipping Costs?

There is an additional small cost incurred for international shipping, which varies depending of your country. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country. You will be invited to register on BackerKit to update your information and pay your shipping cost.

Will you consider giving the option to choose a product without a logo or any other external feature that will apply that this is tracking device?

We now offer choice of design for your Smart Tracker 2 , one of them has an audio player design, it can be used for discreet spy purpose. 

You will be able to choose your design and check your information before shipping with BackerKit. 

It’s possible to specify how often will update it’s position to better lifetime battery?

Yes. For example in every 30sec report, battery will last approximately 10h, every minute 20h, every 5 minutes 180h, etc.

We will give detailed information soon, please check our update!

Is the battery replaceable? 

Yes battery is replaceable. 

Will it be compatible with ifttt.com?

Not at the moment.

Can you provide the product specs? Can you provide images of the internal product (PCB)?

PCB model preview :


Specification/features : 


Does it use a lot of data ?

No, Smart Tracker 2 is very economic and any standard cheap sim would work without any problems for real-time tracking. If you don't use real-time tracking, you can still get position by simply sending an sms (no need of internet data).


Is the Smart Tracker 2 device water resistant? 

Yes, it's IP65 which mean :

1) Totally protected against dust ingress.

2) Protected against low pressure water jets from any direction. Limited ingress permitted.


Feel free to ask us any questions you may have, we will update our FAQ once we received more questions.

story:
Help Support Our New York Runway Show

Qwear, the premier fashion blog for queer women, trans people, and nonbinary individuals, is celebrating our next fashion show in New York at Rainbow Fashion Week on June 23rd! The Show, Dismantle Me, will document the vibrant interaction between traditional fashion aesthetic and the queer experience. 

Every Dollar Counts

We are very gracious to have recieved partial funding from Topman and housing assistance from the amazing staff at Posture Magazine, but we still need to raise an additional $1,000 to cover travel costs and accomodations for the designers and models who are coming to New York from out of state. 
Perks include the chance to win a $50 Everlane Gift Card, or personal Skype fashion consultation with our founder, Sonny!

The Impact

Your help is enabling us to provide a queer space within the fashion world and uplift voices that until now haven't been heard. By giving queer people the stage, we are changing the heteronormative fashion narrative and empowering a marginalized community. 

Queer and trans communities across the world are at risk because of the danger of being themselves, particularly in how they dress. Positive media images are a key strategy in ending violence and systematic oppression towards queer people and queer people of color.

Can't Donate? Please Spread the Word!

Tell your friends and family how much Qwear means to you and ask for their help, big or small!

Thank you for your support.

The Impact Your help is enabling us to provide a queer space within the fashion world and uplift voices that until now haven't been heard. By giving queer people the stage, we are changing the heteronormative fashion narrative and empowering a marginalized community. 
Queer and trans communities across the world are at risk because of the danger of being themselves, particularly in how they dress. Positive media images are a key strategy in ending violence and systematic oppression towards queer people and queer people of color.
 Can't Donate? Please Spread the Word! Tell your friends and family how much Qwear means to you and ask for their help, big or small!
Thank you for your support.

story:
Designer T-shirts, an interesting game, original gift, the development of a sense of style, fun - it's all about T-shirts from BiBi Club!

We, as professional designers, appreciate the world for its beauty, originality and variety.

One day we decided to do something special for the kids.

Something that will bring them joy and, at the same time, will develop a sense of style, creativity and independence.

We are creating and producing limited edition t-shirts for little fashionistas -  T-shirts with removable dresses.

 

We've created three different collections.


Bright and cheerful author's prints are made to bring fun and joy while wearing 
a T-shirt. You can select the handmade dresses you like and change them every time you want!

Please, let us know which print (choose by name) and dresses (choose by number) you prefer.


You can find more dresses on different prints on our website.



Especially for fashionistas. Handmade dresses are miniature copies of those that movie stars are wearing. Looks great when worn by mom and daughter as a family-look outfit. Print is made on the fabric, and then the fabric is sewn to the T-shirt. Looks very stylish.

Please, let us know which print (choose by name) and dresses (choose by number) you prefer.

You can find more dresses on different prints on our website.


Designed specifically for those who appreciate the beauty for its simplicity. For those who choose pastel colors and enjoy the naturalness. T-shirt, print and handmade dresses are made from natural materials.

Please, let us know which print (choose by name) and dresses (choose by number) you prefer.

 



Table of sizes in centimetersTable of sizes in inches

While designing BiBi Club’s T-shirts and dresses we realize, that we have muchmoreto teach children. Magic play book was created to teach girls to put everything on its place. Magic play book has soft Velcro on its pages, so while playing with T-shirts, girls will be able to put dresses in wardrobe and to learn how to maintain cleanliness.




  • Special delicate Velcro  
  • Original handmade dresses
  • High quality cotton T-shirt
  • Print is made of permanent inc on water base




More than a year later, we are creating and producing limited edition t-shirts for little fashionistas - T-shirts with removable dresses.

During this time, we have established a reliable technology, found the right high quality materials and created several series of t-shirts.

We, by ourselves are creating designs, printing and making dresses. Moreover, as we do our job diligently and with big pleasure, we create high quality products, which are also enjoyed by parents.

As we are doing everything ourselves, we can guarantee the quality and the production time.

Now we are ready to offer you something that will please your little girls, to give them an opportunity to feel like a real stylist and to learn to select clothes. 

It is possible not only to dress the doll on a T-shirt, but also to pick up the right color and the dress style to fit the shoes or bows.

But, in fact, the main drive for the children is the game. When we see happy, admiring eyes coming from the girls when they get T-shirts from BiBi Club, and how they enthusiastically pick up dresses, we realize that we have done it well, fun and beneficial!


As was said, we produce t-shirts in small quantities. On the one hand, it is good (exclusivity is a good thing), but the world is so big and it would be great to make more children happy!

So we started this project on INDIEGOGO, in the hopes that we could get the funds that will allow us to add the necessary equipment to produce more T-shirts from BiBi Club (optimal quantity is 1000 T-shirts per month). 

We want children from the entire world to get the joy and inspiration from the game. 

We know how to surprise! We still have many ideas!


There is another important reason why we turned to INDIEGOGO.

We are trying to help the kids in orphanages of Ukraine. We are conducting master classes for girls, teaching them to sew on our dresses. We teach them the culture of design and style. Sometimes we give them presents: the kits of T-shirts and dresses. 

With the resources received on INDIEGOGO we will produce more T-shirts and will be able to transfer them to orphanages.

According to our estimates, by receiving the claimed amount, we will be able to transfer 200 T-shirts for girls to the orphanages in Ukraine.


We'd like to thank our friends that supported us and helped to bring our idea to life!

    


Since BiBi Club have been created, we participated in various exhibitions, festivals and ceremonies.

We've conducted many master-classes for kids to teach them to sew, combine right materials and colors.  

As T-shirts with removable dresses are new and unusual products we had to show people, the way it works and why it could be used not only as clothes, but also as a funny educational game.
